Text: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
Translation: 仿生人會夢見電子羊嗎？

Text: Had a Dome populated by at least 50 Biorobot Colonists
Translation: 已擁有一座住有至少50位生化人殖民者的蒼穹頂

Text: Have a Dome populated by at least 50 Biorobot Colonists
Translation: 擁有一座住有至少50位生化人殖民者的蒼穹頂

Text: Had a citizen that was reconstructed by Project Phoenix
Translation: 已擁有一位藉「鳳凰計畫」重建的殖民者

Text: Have a citizen that was reconstructed by Project Phoenix
Translation: 擁有一位藉「鳳凰計畫」重建的殖民者

Text: Provides living space for Colonists. Cramped quarters grant less Comfort during rest.
Translation: 提供殖民者居住空間。休息時，狹小的房間舒適度增加較少。

Text: Provides living space for numerous Colonists, granting high Comfort.
Translation: 提供眾多的殖民者居住空間，給予高舒適度。

Text: A place to create and enjoy authentic Martian works of art. Consumes Polymers on each visit.
Translation: 一個創造和享受真實火星藝術品的場所，每次造訪時消耗聚合物。

Text: This marvel of Martian engineering produces colossal amounts of Power. It provides light for nearby solar panels during the night in addition to heating the surrounding area. Consumes vast amounts of Water on startup.
Translation: 這個火星工程的奇蹟生產無比巨大的電力。 它在夜間為週邊太陽能板提供光源， 並加熱週邊區域。 啟動時會消耗大量的水。

Text: Stores Power. High capacity and max output, but charges slowly.
Translation: 儲存能源。 高容量與最高輸出， 但是充電慢。

Text: A small Dome suitable for the early days of the Colony.
Translation: 一個適合殖民地早期的小型蒼穹頂

Text: A place of luxurious entertainment and questionable morals, helping to bring out the best of humanity.
Translation: 一個充滿奢華娛樂與道德挑戰的地方，可以引導出人性的光輝！

Text: Creates Clones over time. Cloned Colonists grow and age twice as fast.
Translation: 持續生產複製人， 複製的殖民者有兩倍成長跟變老速度。

Text: Stores <concrete(max_storage_per_resource)>. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 存放 <concrete(max_storage_per_resource)> 無人機會自動將滿出來的資源送到範圍內的其他存放區。

Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Production as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. If not supplied with Fuel, the building will continue to operate but will lose the bonus.
Translation: 只要供應建築物燃料就會 +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% 產量。 如果未提供燃料， 建築物仍會繼續運作， 但將失去加成。

Text: Extracts sulfurous rich regolith from Concrete deposits and produces Concrete. All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 可以從混凝土資源區挖掘並處理成可用的 混凝土資源。 所有的挖掘站工作時都會揚起地面上的粉塵， 粉塵將會影響附近的建築物外觀。

Text: A safe place to store Black Cubes.
Translation: 一個安全存放黑立方體的地方

Text: A laser-targeting defense structure. Protect nearby buildings from meteors. Can attack enemy vehicles at extreme range.
Translation: 一種雷射防禦工事， 保護附近建築免於隕石擊中， 可在極遠距離攻擊敵人車輛。

Text: Serves the finest dishes on Mars. Now featuring non-plastic tableware.
Translation: 提供火星上最好的餐點， 現在主打非塑膠餐具

Text: Produces Drones Prefabs which can then be used to order new drones in Drone Hubs multiplying the obedient workforce of the Colony. Probably not a threat to humans.
Translation: 生產無人機預製件， 可用在無人機中心訂購新的無人機， 使殖民地服從勞動力增加。應該不會對人類造成威脅。

Text: Controls Drones and allocates them to different tasks.
Translation: 控制並分派不同任務給無人機

Text: Stores <wasterock(max_amount_WasteRock)>. Waste Rock is produced as side product of different mining activities.
Translation: 存放 <wasterock(max_amount_WasteRock)>。 廢棄碎石是挖掘資源的副產品。

Text: Stores <electronics(max_storage_per_resource)>. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 存放 <electronics(max_storage_per_resource)> 無人機會自動將滿出來的資源送到範圍內的其他存放區。
用稀有金屬製造電子零件

Text: Buy the latest and greatest gadgets Mars has to offer! Consumes Electronics on each visit.
Translation: 購買火星上最感心的小工具！ 同步提供地球上最潮的電動玩具與遊戲機。 每次造訪時消耗電子零件

Text: Stores <food(max_storage_per_resource)>. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 存放 <food(max_storage_per_resource)> 無人機會自動將滿出來的資源送到範圍內的其他存放區。

Text: Stores <fuel(max_storage_per_resource)>. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 存放 <fuel(max_storage_per_resource)> 無人機會自動將滿出來的資源送到範圍內的其他存放區。

Text: This building no longer requires Workers and operates at <upgrade2_add_value_2> Performance.
Translation: 此建築物不再需要人員操作，且維持工作效率為 <upgrade2_add_value_2>

Text: Generates significant amounts of Power but requires Workers from a nearby Dome.
Translation: 生產大量的能源， 但是需要來自附近蒼穹頂的工人。

Text: A slice of Earth on Mars, this Dome increases the Comfort of all Residences within. It also increases the Sanity of its inhabitants every Sol.
Translation: 非常巨大的蒼穹頂，簡直看起來就是另一顆小地球。 可以提供居民非常好的舒適度， 而且逐日恢復理智。

Text: This building no longer requires Workers and operates at <upgrade1_add_value_2> Performance.
Translation: 此建築物不再需要人員操作， 且維持工作效率為 <upgrade1_add_value_2> 。

Text: Distributes hot meals and fresh produce.
Translation: 銷售熱食與新鮮農產品

Text: A beautiful park complex. Increases the Comfort of all Residences in the Dome.
Translation: 一座美麗的複合式公園， 增加所有蒼穹頂居民的舒適度。

Text: Produces Food. Consumes Water depending on crop type.
Translation: 出產糧食，消耗的水量視作物種類而定。

Text: Improves Service Comfort. Colonists can visit for Relaxation.
Translation: 改善服務品質，殖民者會為了放鬆而造訪。

Text: Visitors will recover Health and Sanity as long as they are not starving, dehydrated, freezing or suffocating. A Dome with a Medical Building has lower minimum Comfort requirement for births.
Translation: 來訪者在未處於飢餓、 脫水、 凍傷或窒息的情況下， 會回復健康與理智。 擁有醫療建築的蒼穹頂會降低生產時所需要的舒適度需求。

Text: A large lake with refreshingly cool water.
Translation: 一座有著清涼湖水的大湖

Text: A decorative monument created from the mysterious Black Cubes. Definitely not a place of worship.
Translation: 一個由神秘黑立方體創造的裝飾性紀念碑，絕對不是個值得崇拜的地方。

Text: Generates Power during daytime. Its effectiveness is decreased by dust accumulation and during Dust Storms. Protected from dust while turned off.
Translation: 在白天產生電力， 其效率因粉塵覆蓋或是沙塵暴來襲而降低， 關閉時可以防塵。

Text: Provides living space. Resting residents recover Comfort faster compared to other Residences.
Translation: 提供居住空間，休息中居民回復舒適度的速度較其他居民快。

Text: Destroys any falling meteors in its range. Has a short cooldown between shots.
Translation: 在其範圍內摧毀任何落下的隕石， 每次射擊的冷卻時間短。

Text: Produces Oxygen. No production during Dust Storms.
Translation: 生產氧氣， 在沙塵暴期間沒有產能。

Text:
MOXIE instruments, which employ MOXIE (short for Mars Oxygen In situ resource utilization Experiment) technology, produce Oxygen from the rich amounts of carbon dioxide in the Martian atmosphere.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Developed in the 20th century but first tested on a rover mission to Mars in the early 20s of the 21st century, that once experimental technology now forms the backbone of life support in our first Colony on an alien world.

These instruments require nothing but power and regular maintenance and, of course, a connection to the lifeline of our Colony.
Translation:
火星氧蒐集裝置儀器， 應用 MOXIE (Mars Oxygen In situ resource utilization Experiment 的縮寫) 科技， 從富含二氧化碳的火星大氣中產生氧氣。 

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

在二十世紀開發， 但在二十一世紀初期首次在火星探測器上進行測試， 在當時的這項實驗技術現在成為我們在外星世界第一個殖民地的維生關鍵。 

這些儀器只需要電力和定期維護， 當然， 這與我們的殖民地的生命線息息相關。

Text: Stores <machineparts(max_storage_per_resource)>. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 儲存 <machineparts(max_storage_per_resource)> 超過的資源會被自動送到無人機範圍內的其它存放區

Text: Trains Specialists using modern remote learning techniques.
Translation: 使用新式遠距學習科技訓練專業技術人員

Text: Increases Birth Rate in the Dome.
Translation: 增加蒼穹頂內的生育率

Text: Improves Service Comfort. Colonists can visit for Relaxation
Translation: 改善服務品質，殖民者會為了放鬆而造訪。

Text: Visitors will recover Health and Sanity as long as they are not starving, dehydrated, freezing or suffocating. Larger capacity and more effective than the Infirmary. A Dome with a Medical Building has lower minimum Comfort requirement for births.
Translation: 來訪者在未處於飢餓、 脫水、 凍傷或窒息的情況下， 會回復健康與理智。 比診所容量更大、 效率更好。 擁有醫療建築的蒼穹頂會降低生產時所需要的舒適度需求。
一座中等尺寸的蒼穹頂設計。

Text: The most advanced and spacious Dome design.
Translation: 最先進而寬敞的蒼穹頂設計。

Text: A gigantic structure made of Black Cubes.
Translation: 由黑立方體製造的巨大結構。

Text: Stores <metals(max_storage_per_resource)>. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 儲存 <metals(max_storage_per_resource)> 超過的資源會被自動送到無人機範圍內的其它存放區。

Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Production as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. If not supplied with Fuel, the building will continue to operate but will lose the bonus.
Translation: 只要供應建築物燃料就會 +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% 產量。 如果未提供燃料， 建築物仍會繼續運作， 但將失去加成。

Text: Extracts Metals from underground deposits. All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 從地下資源點萃取金屬。 所有萃取機均會對週圍建築造成粉塵汙染。

Text: A reflective sphere of unknown composition.
Translation: 一個由未知成分組成的反射球體

Text: Mining deep into the crust of Mars, the Mohole Mine produces Metals, Rare Metals and Waste Rock, while heating the surrounding area.
Translation: 深入火星地殼挖掘礦物，莫霍礦井出產金屬、稀有金屬、與廢棄碎石，同時加熱週圍區域。

Text: Produces Water from the atmosphere. Production lowered when placed near other Vaporators. No production during Dust Storms.
Translation: 從大氣中收集水分，太靠近其他蒐集器會降低產量。在沙塵暴期間無法產出。

Text:
Moisture Vaporators provide a limitless, albeit slower and energy consuming, supply of water once water deposits are no longer a viable option. 

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Moisture Vaporators are based on WAVAR tech (Water-Vapor Adsorption Reactor), a process that extracts water directly from the Martian atmosphere by alternately blowing air over a zeolite adsorption bed and heating the bed to extract the absorbed water. While the water output is less than that of the Water Extractor, there is no end to the amount of water it can generate, and its mechanical simplicity means Water Vaporators can be deployed anywhere on the Martian surface.
Translation:
當沉積水不再是可行的選擇，水氣蒐集站提供了無限的、速度更慢、更耗能的水供應。 

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

水氣蒐集站基於 WAVAR 技術（水蒸氣吸附反應器），通過在沸石吸附床上交替吹氣並加熱吸附床提取吸收的水氣，來從火星大氣中直接提取水的程序。雖然出水量少於水資源挖掘機，但其產生的水總量沒有終點，而且其機構的簡單性意味著水氣蒐集站可以部署在火星表面的任何地方。

Text: Increases the overall Research output of the Dome.
Translation: 增加蒼穹頂的整體研究產出。

Text: Peering beyond the veil of the unknown, this radio telescope gives access to new Breakthrough Technologies and boosts overall Research.
Translation: 窺看遠方未知的迷霧，這座電波望遠鏡衛突破性科技開啟了蹊徑，並加速了整體科技。

Text: Visitors recover a small amount of Health and may become Fit.
Translation: 來訪的人回復少量的健康值，並可能變強壯。

Text: An elongated Dome design which has space for two Spires.
Translation: 一個經過複數螺旋化結構設計、可以容納兩座尖端建築的蒼穹頂設計。

Text: Can be manually activated to cut off Water and Oxygen supply.
Translation: 可以手動開啟以切斷水與氧氣的供應。

Text: Cultivates Perks in Children through special nurturing programs.
Translation: 經由特殊的培育計劃來培養兒童的優點。

Text: Produces Polymers from Water and Fuel.
Translation: 用水與燃料製造聚合物。

Text: Stores <polymers(max_storage_per_resource)>. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 存放 <polymers(max_storage_per_resource)> 無人機會自動將滿出來的資源送到範圍內的其他存放區。

Text: Stores Power. Amount of Power supplied is limited by the battery’s max output.
Translation: 儲存電力，供電量受電池最大輸出值限制。

Text: Can be manually activated to cut off the Power supply.
Translation: 可以手動開啟以切斷電力供應。

Text: With our improved understanding of the human brain we created Project Morpheus. The device uses a combination of psychosomatic triggers and suggestopedic methodology to stimulate the development of new Perks in adult Colonists.
Translation: 隨著我們對人腦的理解日益改善，我們創造了莫菲斯計劃。這個設備結合了自身心靈觸發以及暗示教學法來刺激成年殖民者發展新優點。

Text: Make the Martian night a little brighter.
Remote-controlled exploration vehicle that can analyze Anomalies.
Translation: 用於探索分析地表上發現之 觀察點 的遠端遙控車輛

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that transports, commands and repairs Drones.
Translation: 用於運輸、指揮與維護無人機的遠端遙控車輛

Text: Remote-controlled vehicle that transports resources. Use it to establish permanent supply routes or to gather resources from surface deposits.
Translation: 用於運輸、採集地表資源的遠端遙控車輛

Text: Stores <preciousmetals(max_storage_per_resource)>. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 存放 <preciousmetals(max_storage_per_resource)> 無人機會自動將滿出來的資源送到範圍內的其他存放區。

Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Production as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. If not supplied with Fuel, the building will continue to operate but will lose the bonus.
Translation: 只要供應建築物燃料就會 +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% 產量。如果未提供燃料，建築物仍會繼續運作，但將失去加成。

Text: Extracts Rare Metals from underground deposits. All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 從地下資源點開採稀有金屬，挖掘站會對附近的建築物造成粉塵汙染。

Text: Delivers cargo or Colonists to Mars. Commands nearby Drones. Contaminates nearby buildings with dust when landing and taking off. Requires Fuel for the return trip to Earth.
Translation: 運算貨物或移民到火星。控制附近的無人機。起飛和降落時會有粉塵汙染附近建築物。到地球的回程需要燃料

Text: The landing site of a Rocket.
Replaces flaws with Perks for visitors.
Translation: 用優點取代訪客的缺陷。

Text: Treats Colonists for flaws through advanced and (mostly humane) medical practices.
Translation: 用先進的（大多是人道的）醫療手段來治療殖民者的缺陷。

Text: Cultivates desired Perks in children using modern remote learning techniques.
Translation: 使用新式遠距學習科技培育兒童所期望的優點。

Text: Generates Research faster than a Research Lab.
Translation: 產生研究點數的速度比研究實驗室更快。

Text: Counters crime created by Renegades and reduces Sanity loss from disasters for all residents in the Dome.
Translation: 對抗由叛徒所製造的犯罪行為，並減少所有蒼穹頂居民在災難下的理智損耗。

Text: Boosts scanning speed, especially for nearby sectors. Extends the advance warning for disasters.
Translation: 加速掃描速度，尤其是鄰近的地圖區塊。擴大災難預警範圍。

Text: Houses and refuels Shuttles that facilitate long-range resource transportation between Depots and resettling of Colonists between Domes.
Translation: 提供客貨機停靠與加油的服務站，客貨機可用來長途運輸載運資源或者是兩地之間的乘客

Text: A beautiful park with alleys and benches.
Translation: 一座有小徑與長椅的美麗公園。

Text: A place for relaxation and recreation.
Translation: 一個放鬆和娛樂的地方。

Text: A recreational area with cultivated vegetation.
Translation: 一個種植植被的休閒區。

Text: A decorative monument created from the mysterious Black Cubes. Probably harmless.
Translation: 從神秘的黑色立方體創建的裝飾性紀念碑。 可能無害。

Text: Provide a very comfortable living space for Colonists. Residents will recover additional Sanity when resting.
Translation: 為殖民者提供一個非常舒適的生活空間。 居民在休息時會恢復額外的理智。

Text: Provides a very comfortable living space for Colonists. Residents will recover additional Sanity when resting.
Translation: 為殖民者提供一個非常舒適的生活空間。 居民在休息時會恢復額外的理智。

Text: Generates Power during daytime. Its effectiveness is decreased by dust accumulation and during sand storms. Protected from dust while turned off.
Translation: 在白天產生電力。它的有效性會因積塵和沙塵暴而降低。 關閉時防塵。

Text: A faster way to reach space, the Elevator speeds up cargo shipments to orbit. Exports Rare Metals to Earth and offers resupply materials and prefabs at a discount.
Translation: 一種更快進入軌道的方式，電梯可用更快的速度將貨物送入軌道、出口稀有金屬到地球，並且可以用更優惠的價格購買各式補給與預製零件。

Text: This building no longer requires Workers and operates at <upgrade1_add_value_2> Performance.
Translation: 此建築物不再需要人員操作，且維持工作效率為 <upgrade1_add_value_2>。

Text: Provides space for R&R and fancy cocktails.
Translation: 替太空提供休閒娛樂空間和花式雞尾酒。

Text: "In honor of the Founders of Mars."

Translation: 開啟時 +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% 額外電力產量。

Text: Generates Power. While closed the generator is protected from dust, but produces less power.
Translation: 產生電力。關閉圓頂罩的時候可以避免入塵的損害，不過發電效率將會下降許多。

Text: A tastefully arranged stone garden, following strict Zen rules.
Translation: 一個高雅的石頭花園，遵循嚴格的禪規。

Text: Increases the local temperature in cold areas and protects nearby buildings from Cold Waves.
Translation: 提高寒冷地區的溫度，並保護附近的建築免受寒流侵襲。

Text: Using advanced extraction technology, allows for production of Concrete directly from the Martian soil without the requirement for a deposit.
Translation: 相當先進的研究計畫產物，就算附近沒有混凝土資源，也可以從火星地底中挖掘到混凝土。

Text: Emits pulses which reduce the Dust accumulated on buildings in its range.
Translation: 發射脈衝減少積聚在其範圍內建築物上的粉塵。

Text: The tunnel entrance and exit can connect power and life support grids at different locations and different elevations. Rovers can travel along the tunnels to reach places they otherwise couldn't.
Translation: 隧道入口和出口可連接不同位置和不同高度的電力和維生系統網路。漫遊者可以沿著隧道前往那些他們無法到達的地方。

Text: Stores <resource(max_storage_per_resource)> units of each transportable resource. Excess resources will be delivered automatically to other depots within Drone range.
Translation: 儲存每項資源各 <resource(max_storage_per_resource)> 單位。 剩餘資源將自動發送到無人機範圍內的其他存放區。

Text: +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>% Production as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. If not supplied with Fuel, the building will continue to operate but will lose the bonus.
Translation: 當建築物使用燃料當成動力的時候，產能將增加 +<upgrade1_mul_value_1>%， 如果未供應燃料，建築物仍會繼續運作，但將失去加成。

Text: Extracts Water from underground deposits. No production during Cold Waves. All extractors contaminate nearby buildings with dust.
Translation: 從地下礦藏中提取水份。在寒流中無法生產 所有的挖掘站都會污染附近的建築物。

Text: Recycles up to 70% of the Water used in the Dome.
Translation: 回收高達70％的蒼穹頂用水。

Text: Stores Water. Doesn't work during Cold Waves.
Translation: 存儲水資源。在寒流中不起作用。

Text: Generates Power. Increased production during Dust Storms and at high elevations.
Translation: 產生電力。在沙塵暴和高海拔地區增加發電量。

Text:
Wind turbines generate electrical power from the Martian winds. The amount generated depends on how powerful the winds they are exposed to are, so proper positioning is essential as higher ground tends to be windier.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

While wind speeds on Mars are generally mild, they can reach incredible speeds during dust storms. Still, the thin Martian atmosphere dictates that the average wind turbine would need winds around six times more powerful than those on Earth to create the same amount of thrust.
 
This technological challenge to take advantage of what little wind there is on Mars was solved by opting for vertical axis wind turbines, which are capable of catching the wind from all directions, instead of simply horizontal.  The materials used are light enough to self-start on much weaker forces than those most commonly used on Earth.
Translation:
風力發電機從火星風中產生電力。產生的量取決於它們暴露的風力有多大，所以適當的定位是必不可少的，因為更高的地面往往有更多的風。 

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

雖然火星上的風速一般較低，但在沙塵暴期間可以達到令人難以置信的速度。儘管如此，薄薄的火星大氣讓風力發電機平均需要比地球上風力發電機強六倍的風力，才能產生相同的推力。 
 
通過能夠從各個方向捕捉風的垂直軸風力發電機，而不是單純地使用水平風力，解決了利用火星上的小風的技術挑戰。所使用的材料輕的足以在比地球上弱得多的力量下自行啟動。

Text: - Drones are gradually optimized to work and construct faster until Sol 100 - Bonus Tech: Autonomous Hubs (Drone Hubs no longer require Power or maintenance)
Translation: - 無人機工作能力與建築速度逐步優化，直到第 100 個太陽日。 - 加成科技： 無人機中心自主化升級 （無人機中心不再需要能源與維護）

Text: - Fuel production increased by 25% - Bonus Tech: Arcology (unlocks a residential spire)
Translation: - 燃料生產增加 25% - 加成科技： 雅卡蘿之城 （解鎖雅卡蘿之城）

Text: - Start with a Water deposit revealed - Domes consume 25% less Water - Bonus Tech: Water Reclamation (unlocks a spire which reduces Water consumption)
Translation: - 起始揭露一個水資源點 - 降低蒼穹頂 25% 水消耗 - 加成科技： 水資源回收塔 （解鎖一個可以降低水資源消耗的尖端建築）

Text: - Minimum Comfort required for birth lowered by 15 - Bonus Tech: Stem Reconstruction (colonist lifespan is increased)
Translation: - 生育舒適度需求降低 15 點 - 加成科技： 幹細胞重建與治療 （增加殖民者的生命週期）

Text: - Colonists recover 5 additional Sanity while resting in their homes - Bonus Tech: Behavioral Shaping (unlocks a Sanatorium spire which treats colonists' flaws)
Translation: - 殖民者在家休息額外恢復 5 點理智 - 加成科技： 深層心理治療服務 （解鎖尖端療養院，治療殖民者的缺陷）

Text: - All Funding gains are increased by - Bonus Tech: Martian Patents (repeatable tech that grants Funding)
Translation: - 所有資金收益增加 - 加成科技： 火星專利 （可重複研發的科技，增加資金）

Text: - Breakthrough techs are researched faster - Bonus Tech: Autonomous Sensors (Sensor Towers no longer require Power or maintenance)
Translation: - 突破性科技研發速度增加 - 加成科技： 掃描塔自主化升級 （掃描塔不再需要能源或維護）

Text: - Service Comfort of decorations increased by 10 - Bonus Tech: Hanging Gardens (unlocks a spire which improves residences in the Dome)
Translation: - 設施的裝潢增加 服務品質 10 點 - 加成科技： 空中花園活動中心 （解鎖尖端建築，可以改善蒼穹頂中住宅的舒適度）

Text: - Start with a Rare Metal deposit revealed - Extractor production increased by 10% - Bonus Tech: Deep Scanning (allows the scanning of sectors for deep deposits)
Translation: - 起始揭露一個稀有金屬資源點 - 加成科技： 深層掃描 （可以掃描地圖區塊的深層資源點）

Text: - Start with an extra Rocket - Bonus Tech: CO2 Jet Propulsion (unlocks Shuttle Hub and long-range transportation)
Translation: - 開始時擁有一個額外的火箭 - 加成科技： CO2噴射推進系統 （解鎖 客貨機服務站 與 長距離運輸）

Text: Low yield and slow growth, but require less Water
Translation: 產量低，且成長緩慢，但需要的水較少。

Text: Low yield but grows very fast
Translation: 產量低，但成長非常快速。

Text: Extract the cure for the Wildfire Infection from these potatoes.
Translation: 從這些馬鈴薯萃取野火感染的治療藥劑。

Text: Good yield but grows slowly and depletes the soil, causing reduced yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量佳，但成長緩慢，且會耗盡土壤，導致下一個作物的產量減少。

Text: Low yield and grows slowly but improves the soil, increasing the yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量低，且成長緩慢，但會改良土壤，增加下一個作物的產量。

Text: Low yield but grows fast and requires less Water
Translation: 產量低，但成長快速，且需要的水較少。

Text: Very low yield but produces Oxygen
Translation: 產量非常低，但會產生氧氣。

Text: Very low yield but increases soil quality significantly, improving the yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量非常低，但會顯著提升土壤品質，改善下一個作物的產量。

Text: Great yield but grows slowly and requires more Water
Translation: 產量絕佳，但是成長緩慢，且需要更多水。

Text: Good yield and grows slowly but requires less Water
Translation: 產量佳，成長緩慢，但需要的水較少。

Text: Average yield but grows very fast and produces Oxygen
Translation: 產量平均，但是成長非常快速，且產生氧氣。

Text: Great yield but grows slowly and depletes the soil, reducing the yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量絕佳，但生長緩慢，且會耗盡土壤，降低下一個作物的產量。

Text: Good yield and grows very slowly but improves the soil, increasing the yield of the next crop
Translation: 產量佳，生長緩慢，但是可以改良土壤，增加下一個作物的產量。

Text: Average yield but grows fast and requires less Water
Translation: 產量平均，但是生長快速， 且需要的水較少。

Text: Rice engineered on Ganymede. Grows very fast and has high yield.
Translation: 在蓋尼米德培育出的水稻品種，生長快速且產量高。

Text: The Martian Colony is made up of a variety of buildings which provide power, life-support, comfort, protection from the weather, information, resources and a lot more - all things without which humans cannot exist on the red planet. Buildings are built by using Martian resources while some can be brought from Earth as prefab buildings. All buildings, however, require a resource upkeep for maintenance. A construction site must be within the Service Area of Drones (relative to their control hubs) in order to receive the resources needed and then erected. Some buildings require Power to operate, other are staffed by Colonists living nearby. The Performance of any building indicates how effectively the building is performing its primary function. It depends on many factors such as researched technologies, upgrades and the current individual performance of the specific colonists working in the building. Qualified specialists and workers with high Morale will increase the performance of a building, while empty work slots, Renegades and workers with low Morale or other issues will be detrimental. Buildings can be set to operate in three Work Shifts - first, second and night. Turning off some Work Shifts will conserve power and workforce.
Translation: 火星殖民地由各式各樣的建築物組成，它們提供電力、維生、舒適、免受天氣威脅、訊息、資源、和許多其他人類在這紅色星球上生存必要的事物。 建築物利用火星資源建造，有些也可以以預製建築型式從地球買來。但是，所有建築物都需要資源來維護。 建築工地必須位於無人機的服務區內 (與其控制中心相關)，以便接收所需的資源來興建。 有些建築物僅需要電力來運作，其它則是需要住在附近的殖民者進行操作。 任何建築物的性能都表現建築物的主要功能如何有效。這取決於許多因素，例如研究科技、升級和當前在建築物中工作的特定殖民者的個人表現。具有高士氣的合格專家和工人將提高建築物的性能，而空崗位、叛徒和士氣低落或其他問題的工人將會對效能有害。 建築物可設置三個工作班次來運作 - 早班、中班、和大夜班。關閉一些工作班次將節省電力和勞動力。

Text:
Mars is a harsh environment and human life is only made possible due to incredibly durable structures - designed specifically to resist it.

Every now and then, however, extremes will appear that will test the resilience of the colony on a much higher level.
Translation:
火星是一個惡劣的環境，人類的生活只有通過令人難以置信的耐用建築才有可能 - 專門設計來抵抗它。 

然而，不時出現的極端現象將會檢驗殖民地的高度復原能力。

Text:
Mars is infamous for its large and sometimes quite lengthy Dust Storms which raise so much dust that they can be seen with telescopes from Earth. While the wind speeds reached during these storms are not quite dangerous, taking into consideration that Mars’s atmosphere is but 1% of Earth’s, the sheer amount of dust raised can knock field machinery out of order until fixed.

Another issue is that Mars’s fine dust particles are extremely dry and slightly electrostatic, which can cause damage to our electrical grid if a dust storm with more electrostatic properties appears.

MOXIEs and Moisture Vaporators do not function during dust storms.

Dust Storms suspend air traffic - all shuttles will finish their final courses and then return to their hubs until the storm passes.

Electrostatic Dust Storms are a rare occurrence. Lightning strikes during such storms can shutdown buildings for a time or drain the batteries of our drones and rovers. 

The greater the risk the Dust Storm is flagged to pose in an area, the higher the chance is for an Electrostatic Dust Storm to appear. Dust storms can also be a seasonal event, happening routinely in the most high risk areas.
Translation:
火星上巨大且有時相當漫長的沙塵暴非常惡名昭彰， 它產生的粉塵多到甚至可以用地球上的望遠鏡看到。 雖然風暴期間達到的風速並不是那麼危險， 但是有鑑於火星的大氣只是地球的 1%， 光是升起的粉塵量就能讓野外的機器故障， 直到被修理好。

另一個問題是， 火星的細小粉塵顆粒極度乾燥且帶點靜電， 如果出現帶有更多靜電的沙塵暴， 就會對我們的電力網路造成損害。

在沙塵暴期間，MOXIE 和水氣蒐集站不會運作。

沙塵暴會讓空中交通停擺 - 所有客貨機會完成他們的最後航程， 然後返回它們的服務站， 直到沙塵暴過去。

靜電沙塵暴很少發生。 在這種沙塵暴中的雷擊， 會使建築物關閉一段時間， 或是耗盡無人機和漫遊者的電池。

標記沙塵暴風險越高的區域， 出現靜電沙塵暴的機會就越高。 沙塵暴也可能是季節性的事件， 在風險最高的區域定期發生。

Text:
Meteors are extremely common in the solar system. Every day, small to medium sized meteors hit the Earth but most burn out quickly in the atmosphere without ever reaching the surface. Mars, on the other hand, has a very thin atmosphere and most meteors reach the surface. This is, sadly, a constant threat, and must be taken into consideration when designing our colonies. Domes can mostly withstand direct hits with manageable damage, but all buildings outside the protection of Domes are vulnerable. 

Redundancy in vital lifelines such as Water and Oxygen support is one way of risk management.
Translation:
隕石在太陽系中非常普遍。 每天都有中小型隕石撞上地球， 但大多數都在大氣中迅速燃燒殆盡而沒有到達地面。 另一方面， 火星的大氣非常稀薄， 大部分的隕石都會到達地面。 不幸的是， 這是一個持續性的威脅， 在設計我們的殖民地時必須列入考慮。 蒼穹頂可在可控的傷害內承受大多數的直接撞擊， 但所有在蒼穹頂保護之外的建築物都是脆弱的。 

多儲存一些水和氧氣之類的重要生命線資源，可以降低風險。

Text: Martian surface temperatures are freezing at best while being extremely cold most of the time. Although humans can’t withstand the Martian cold outside Domes (not without protective gear), most of our machinery is designed to function effortlessly in the cold. This, however, is subject to change when a weather event known as a Cold Wave appears. The low-density Martian atmosphere allows for rapid and dramatic temperature drops – drops so low, that all field buildings have to spend increased amounts of electrical Power to keep from succumbing to the cold. Cold Waves appear with a short warning period and also may be e seasonal event in areas of Mars flagged as being especially cold. During a Cold Wave all Water Tanks freeze solid - rendering the colony somewhat vulnerable to water shortages if more unfortunate events overlap. Out-dome buildings left without power also run the risk of freezing until the cold wave subsides or the area is heated via a Subsurface Heater. Buildings that have an inactive shift are very likely to freeze during that shift.
Translation: 大多時候火星表面極度寒冷， 最好的狀況也是冰點以下。 雖然人類無法承受蒼穹頂外的火星冰冷 (沒有防護裝備的話)， 但我們大多數的機器都設計成能在寒冷中毫不費力地運作。 然而， 當寒流來襲時， 這可能會發生變化。 低密度的火星大氣層讓溫度迅速且劇烈的下降 - 溫度低到所有的野外建築都必須耗費更多的電力來避免在寒冷中掛點。 寒流來之前只有短暫的警告期間， 而且在標記為特別寒冷的火星區域， 寒流也可能成為季節性事件。 在寒流期間， 所有的水罐都會凍成固態 - 在禍不單行的狀況下， 這讓殖民地更容易受到缺水的影響。 蒼穹頂外沒有電力的建築物， 也會冒著被凍結的危險， 直到寒流消退或該區域被地質加熱器加熱。 有停工班別的建築物， 在該班別的期間很可能會結凍。

Text:
Dust Devils form when hot gases near the ground rise quickly through a small pocket of cooler, low-pressure gases above it. They become a vortex of the dust and particles caught by these gases and form a visible pillar that moves and twists.

Martian Dust Devils can be up to fifty times as wide and ten times as high as dust devils on Earth, and they pose a threat to any technology within their vicinity as they tend to cover everything around them with dust.
Translation:
當靠近地面的熱氣體快速上升， 通過上方一小塊較冷的低壓氣體時， 就會形成塵捲風。 這些氣體捕捉了粉塵微粒變成漩渦， 形成會扭曲和移動的柱子。 

火星塵捲風可以是地球塵捲風的五十倍寬十倍高， 而且會對附近所有的技術造成威脅， 因為它們往往會用粉塵覆蓋周圍的一切。

Text: Resources are either gathered directly from Mars, or later manufactured in resource production buildings – most commonly from other resources. They keep the Colony operational by being used for life-support, construction and building upkeep. There are two types of resources; grid and non-grid. Grid resources use Pipes and Cables for distribution, while non-grid resources have to be moved around with Drones or RC Rovers.
Translation: 要在火星上蒐集資源有兩種方式，一種是直接採集，而另一種則是透過設備採集。 有了這些資源我們才能確保殖民地的正確運作，以及持續維護。 目前資源可以分為兩種類型：通道形式 與實體形式。 通道形式的資源指的是必須由管線或電線運送的資源，而實體形式的資源則必須透過無人機或者運輸車運輸的物品。

Text:
Concrete is made by building Concrete Extractors on regolith deposits found all over the Martian surface. It is a basic building material and is used in a wide range of building types.
On Mars, water is a rare and difficult to obtain commodity. As such, turning the Martian regolith into traditional, water based concrete was deemed unpractical very early on during the planning stages. Luckily, Mars is rich in another element with which a different type of concrete can be made – sulfur. Sulfur-based, waterless concrete is literally the foundation for every aspiring Martian city. Concrete Extractors placed on spots rich in sulfur in the Martian soil, dig up the sulfur-rich regolith and store it as ready to use mix. It is later transported and heated by our Drones on construction sites, turning it into strong and enduring concrete.
Translation:
混凝土 由蓋在火星地表混凝土資源點上的混凝土挖掘站製成。 混凝土是廣泛用在各種建築物上的基本建築材料。
火星上， 水很稀有且難以取得。 因此， 在計劃的很早期就知道， 要將火星土壤變成傳統的水基混凝土是頭殼壞掉。 幸運的是， 火星富含製造另一種混凝土的材料 – 硫。 硫基無水混凝土真的是每個火星城市的基礎。 混凝土挖掘站放在火星含硫土壤點上， 挖掘含硫土壤， 儲存成立即可以使用的形態。 隨後，我們的無人機會將它送到建築工地加熱， 將它轉化成堅固耐用的混凝土。

Text:
Power is generated from several power generation facilities and is then spread throughout the colony by cables. Excessive power can be stored in batteries for emergency situations.
Electrical power on Mars comes mostly from renewable and cheap sources such as wind power (Wind Turbine) and sunlight (Solar Panel), but also from fission (Sterling Generator) and fusion based sources (Fusion Reactor) as the technology available advances. It is then distributed via an extensive and durable cable network. Power Switches can be used to dynamically manage the flow of power in case of damaged cables or low power situations.
Translation:
電力 可以透過許多種不同的發電設施獲得，並且透過建設電線與其它設施連結以達到電力供應的效果。為了避免緊急情況發生而電力中止，可以透過建立多個蓄電站儲存電力，以備不時之需。
火星上的電力大多來自於可再生的便宜來源， 如風力 (風力發電機) 和陽光 (太陽能板)， 科技進步後， 則有核分裂 (斯特林發電機) 和核融合 (核融合反應爐) 的電源。 再藉由廣泛耐用的纜線網來配置電力。 萬一有纜線受損或是電力不足的狀況， 可以用電源開關來動態管理電流。

Text:
Electronics are manufactured in Electronics Factories from Rare Metals and are mainly used for vehicle operating buildings, like Drone Hubs and Shuttle Hubs.
Technology and electronics go hand in hand on Mars the same way as they have, and will continue to for centuries to come, on Earth.
Translation:
電子零件 在電子零件工廠， 使用稀有金屬 製造。 主要用在操控車輛的建築物，如無人機中心和客貨機服務中心。
在火星上， 科技和電子零件攜手並進，而且會持續好幾個世紀，如同在地球上。

Text:
Food is grown on Farms and Hydroponic Farms, which are placed inside Domes, and also Fungal Farms which are placed outside of Domes. Farms and Hydroponic Farms can grow different crops with different cycle patterns. Furthermore some crops, like Algae, also generate oxygen for the Dome they are grown in.
Making the Martian soil fit for farming, even within the protection of Domes, takes heavy alterations. First, toxin removers are applied to rid the Martian regolith of toxic substances like perchlorates. Then, the use of chemical decompressors to break down common Martian compounds and make nutrients out of them is employed. And finally, specifically designed bacteria to further modify all nutrients made into a more plant-use friendly form, is introduced. Growing food on Mars greatly decreases costs and dependency on Earth.
Translation:
食物 可以透過放置在蒼穹頂內的農場或水培農場，以及放置在蒼穹頂外的真菌農場種植採收獲得。 農場和水培農場種植不同的作物， 所需的成長天數也不同。 而且有些像藻類的作物會在其生長的蒼穹頂內製造氧氣。
即使在蒼穹頂的保護下，火星土壤還是需要大量的改造，才能適合用來種植作物。 首先， 要用祛毒劑來移除火星土壤中的有毒物質，如次氯酸鹽。接著， 使用化學減壓劑分解常見的火星化合物，補充營養素。 最後， 特別培養的細菌會將營養素進一步變成植物更容易使用的形式。 在火星上種植食物大大的降低了花費及對地球的依賴。

Text:
Fuel is synthesized in Fuel Refineries and is used to for refueling Rockets bound for Earth, for keeping Shuttle Hubs operational and for polymer production.
Using the CO2 from the Martian atmosphere and hydrogen (from water) we can produce fuel to fly our rockets back to Earth. The process uses a series of relatively simple chemical reactions to produce methane and oxygen which are used as propellant for both our rockets and shuttles.
Translation:
燃料 在燃料精煉廠 合成。 可以替火箭補給燃料以供返航，或者供應給客貨機服務站維持運作。同時也是生產聚合物的材料之一
使用火星大氣的二氧化碳和氫氣 (從水) 可以產生燃料，讓我們的火箭飛回地球。 這程序使用了一系列相對簡單的化學反應來產生甲烷和氧氣，用來推進我們的火箭和客貨機

Text:
Machine Parts are manufactured in Machine Parts Factories from Metal and are mainly used in both the construction and maintaining of the sophisticated resource Extractors on Mars.
Back on Earth, we humans are dependent on machines to sustain our advanced way of life; to power our industries and make possible our vast transportation systems. Here on Mars machines are also tasked with making life possible to begin with, on top of potentially maintaining all of their previous obligations. Smart design processes and accepted standards have made possible the stockpiling of Machine Parts that could be used in an array of instruments upon demand. Machine Parts could be delivered from Earth to meet the needs of any fledgling colony. But a hefty and reliable supply, one obtained only by having them manufactured on site, will be the foundation to bringing our Earthly way of life to the Martian dream city.
Translation:
機械零件 可以製造於機械零件工廠，材料則需要金屬，主要用在火星上高階資源挖掘站的建造與維護上
地球上， 人類依賴機器來維持先進的生活； 給予工業動力，成就巨大的運輸系統。 在這邊的火星上， 機器也被用來讓生命可以開始， 盡可能維持之前的義務 智能設計和標準規格， 讓一堆的機械零件可以根據需要， 應用在一系列的儀器上。 機械零件可以從地球運來， 滿足新生殖民地的需求。 但是只有在當地製造的機械零件可以有大量且穩定的供應， 才可以將地球上的生活方式帶到火星上的夢幻城市

Text:
Metal is readily found on the Martian surface, deposited from ancient tectonic activity and meteor blasts. Further deposits can be found beneath the surface (by either Orbital Probes or Sensor Towers) which can be then mined with Metal Extractors. Metal is a basic building material and is used in a wide range of buildings. It is also used for manufacturing Machine Parts.
Since very early in human history, metals play a vital role in the art of creation. From simple copper tools and nails, to iron decorations to entire structures made out of steel. It would seem their role is not exhausted only on Earth, but will continue to serve as an accessible and vital resource for all our needs on Mars as well.
Translation:
金屬 很容易在火星的地表上發現，他們通常是古代地質運動和隕石墜落而積存在火星的地表上。 地底下還有更多的蘊藏量 (可以由軌道探測器或者掃描塔探測到)。 透過設置金屬挖掘站並由人員操作取得地下金屬資源 金屬是基本的建築材料， 廣泛的用在建築物上。 它也用來製造機械零件
從人類歷史早期， 金屬就在創造工藝上扮演重要的角色。 從簡單的銅製工具和釘子， 到鐵裝飾品，在到整個鋼構結構。 看來他們的角色不只在地球上發揮的淋漓盡致， 在火星上也是我們所需的重要可取得資源

Text:
Oxygen is essential for humans to linger and call Mars their home. It can be produced using the sophisticated MOXIE buildings, and later on naturally generated from crops.
Oxygen is the most short term life support resource. If colonists are left without oxygen they will die extremely fast. And while Mars’s atmosphere has little to no Oxygen, what it does provide is an abundance of Carbon Dioxide, which our brilliant MOXIE technology can convert to the much needed Oxygen. Like water, it is supplied and distributed via pipes networks, in fact, sharing the same pipes used for water distribution.
Translation:
氧氣 是人類是否能把火星稱為家園的關鍵資源。 可以透過火星氧蒐集站生成， 之後會透過作物自然產生。
氧氣是最短期的維生資源。 殖民如果缺氧馬上就會死去。 火星大器的氧氣非常稀薄， 只有非常豐富的二氧化碳， 還好我們卓越的火星氧收集科技可以將之轉換為所需的氧氣。 氧氣跟水一樣，使用相同的管線網路配置供應。

Text:
Polymers can be naturally obtained from obsidian scattered on the Martian surface and, once colonists have settled, can also be synthesized in Polymer Factories. It is mainly used for the construction of power accumulators, Domes and Spires.
Some of the most important and widely used materials on Earth are made from polymers. While the dependency on such materials on Mars is artificially circumvented as much as possible due to the scarcity of the molecule (unlike Earth, Mars has no fossil fuel reserves to act as a polymer source), their importance cannot be avoided all together. Plastics, rubbers and more advanced isolations have a fundamental role to play in creating and maintaining pressure differentials between habitats and external areas.
Translation:
聚合物 可以在火星地表上的黑曜石中取得，透過科技的發展，也能透過聚合物工廠合成。 主要是用來建設蓄電站、蒼穹頂、及尖端建築
地球上有些廣泛使用的重要材料是由聚合物做成的。 因為火星上缺乏一些分子 (不像地球， 火星並沒有可以做為聚合物來源的化石燃料)， 所以人為地盡可能減少對這種材料的依賴， 但還是沒辦法完全避開它們的重要性。 塑膠， 橡膠， 和一些先進阻絕材料仍需被用來產生和維持居住區和外部區域之間的壓力。

Text:
Rare metals are found only in underground deposit sites and need Rare Metal Extractors to mine them. They are mostly used for manufacturing electronics and for exporting back to Earth.
After millennia of acting as a status symbol, in modern times rare metals are widely used in electronics and for medical procedures. Still, although one of the vital elements of the Information, and subsequently the Space Ages, precious metals still retain their monetary role.
Translation:
稀有金屬 只能在地底找到的資源，必須使用稀有金屬挖掘站並由人員操作取得。 主要用來製作成電子零件和透過火箭出口回地球換成資金。 不同的任務贊助商及遊戲難度會影響到兌換的金額
經過數千年來被當作身分的象徵之後， 稀有金屬在現代被廣泛地用在電子零件和醫療上。 雖然在資訊時代和之後的太空時代， 珍貴金屬是重要元素之一， 但是他仍然保留了作為貨幣的角色

Text:
Water on Mars can processed with Moisture Vaporitors or harvested from subsurface permafrost deposits via Water Extractors. It is distributed via a pipe network, which it shares with the distribution of Oxygen. Apart from being essential for supporting life inside Domes and field buildings that have human operators, water is used for the synthesizing process of polymers and rocket fuel.
The most important ingredient for life as we know it to exist is by no means scarce on Mars. However, it is mostly frozen and underground, making it difficult for acquiring. As bringing the water needed to sustain a city on Mars back from Earth will be a huge burden on every craft and far from efficient, constructing a steady water supply solely by harnessing water ice found on Mars is absolutely essential for the survival of any colony.
Translation:
水資源 可以透過水氣蒐集站於火星大氣中蒐及取得， 或者使用水資源挖掘站於水資源處挖掘取得。 水資源跟氧氣一樣， 透過管線運送至所需要的設施。 兩者是可以同時存在於管線中的 水資源同時也是維生系統中重要的一環，同時也能使用來提煉聚合物以及火箭燃料
做為生命最重要的成分， 我們知道水在火星上並不稀有。 然而，它大多凍結在地底而難以取得。 從地球帶來維持火星城市所需要的水會造成太空船巨大的負擔，　而且非常的沒有效率。 單獨從火星上找到的水冰取得穩定水資源供應絕對是任何殖民地生存所必需的

Text: Conditions on Mars are utterly hostile for humans to roam and work freely outside of Domes. This is why heavy-duty vehicles have been designed to tackle the tasks that humans can't. Vehicles are either remote-controlled Rovers or semi-autonomous Drones and Shuttles.
Translation: 有鑑於火星的狀況非常的不適合人類在 蒼穹頂外移動和工作， 所以設計這些重型車輛來處理人類無法處理的工作。 車輛泛指為遠端遙控的車輛或者半自動化的無人機和客貨機

Text:
Rockets are used to deliver supplies all the way from Earth, or bring colonists which have applied for a life on Mars.

They are re-usable, and once having refueled on Mars, can bring Rare Metals back to Earth for monetary gains.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Space rockets have far a greater role to play in the mission of establishing a permanent colony on Mars, than merely bringing the first colonists there. Until the colony can truly sustain itself, it will always be dependent on Earth for vital resources and the flow of colonists.

Although quite expensive, re-usable rocket technology has already been mastered to a degree that can have a rocket back in space within the same day of landing on either world.
Translation:
火箭用來運送從地球來的補給品，以及應徵要到火星生活的新殖民者。

它們可以重複使用， 一旦在火星上加滿油， 就可以將稀有金屬帶回地球換取資金

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

太空火箭在建立火星永久殖民地的任務中扮演了重要的角色， 而不僅僅帶來第一波的殖民者。 一直到殖民地可以真的自給自足之前， 都要依賴地球的重要資源和殖民者。

雖然相當昂貴， 重複使用火箭的科技已經被掌握到一定程度， 讓火箭可以在登陸的同一天馬上回到太空中

Text:
Drones are the backbone of the Martian colony’s work force. They are tasked with distributing resources, gathering resources from surface deposits, building and maintaining structures as well as repairing damaged structures and vehicles. Although mostly autonomous, drones operate within the service range of whatever control hub they are assigned to, such as Drone Hubs, Rockets or RC Rovers. Drones run on batteries and need to charge up frequently. They may do so only at RC Rover and Charging Stations which in turn can be built individually or are found attached to Drone Hubs.
All the heavy lifting and most of the field tasks are left to Drones. Drones are powerful, semi-autonomous utility vehicles which are equipped with state of the art instruments – fit for a wide range of manual labor. Built to be resilient against most of what the Martian environment can throw at them, the arch-enemy of all man-made technology on Mars, dust, will eventually incapacitate drones if not cleaned regularly.
Translation:
無人機是火星殖民地的勞動力骨幹。 它們的任務是分配資源， 從地表資源點收集資源， 建造和維修建築，以及修復損壞的建築和車輛。 雖然幾乎是全自動化的， 但是無人機需要在被指派的控制中心的服務範圍內運作， 像是無人機中心、火箭、或是漫遊者號。 無人機使用電池運作， 需要常常充電。 它們只能在漫遊者號或是充電站充電， 而這兩者是分別建造或是附屬在無人機中心。
所有繁重和野外的任務都留給無人機。 無人機是裝配了最先進儀器的強大半自動工具車輛 – 適合廣泛的勞力工作。 即使做的對火星的環境已經有一定的彈性， 但是如果不定期清理的話， 人造科技大敵的粉塵最終還是會讓無人機損毀

Text:
RC Rovers are remote-controlled vehicles which can transport and deploy Drones to remote areas if needed. They can also repair any damage that the Drones have sustained. Rovers are battery-powered and can recharge their batteries at any point along a power cable.
The apex of human transport technology, Rovers have extended battery lives and are incredibly durable, making them resistant to most of the Martian calamities such as cold or dust. They may traverse the Colony site and reach distant spots, limited only by the topography, to tackle whatever they have been tasked with.
Translation:
漫遊者號是遠端遙控的車輛， 可以用來載運、指揮與維護範圍內的無人機。 也可以修復無人機受到的損害。 漫遊者號屬於電力驅動， 可以在任何有效電力網上的電線進行充電。
車輛是人類運輸科技的頂峰， 它們擁有延長的電池壽命， 而且相當耐用， 讓它們可以抵擋火星上像寒冷和粉塵之類的危害。 它們可以穿越殖民地，到達沒被地形限制的遠處，執行被賦予的任務

Text:
RC Transports are remote controlled vehicles which are tasked with the transportation of cargo, mostly from or to places outside of drone operating ranges. Furthermore, RC Transports may set up permanent transport routes, maintaining the flow of specific or non-specified resources from one place to the other. Transport rovers can also extract resource from surface deposit (Metals and Polymers) allowing extraction and transportation of far away deposit sites. Transports are battery powered and can recharge their batteries at any point along a power cable.
The apex of human transport technology, rovers have extended battery lives and are incredibly durable, resistant to most of the Martian calamities - such as cold or dust. They may traverse the colony site and reach distant spots, limited only by the topography, to tackle whatever they have been tasked with.
Translation:
運輸車是遠端遙控的車輛， 主要用在無人機運作範圍之外的貨物運輸。 而且， 運輸車可以設定永久運輸路線， 維護兩個地點之間的指定或非指定的資源流動。 運輸車可以挖取地面資源 (金屬和聚合物)， 讓遠離資源站的地方可以挖掘和運輸。 運輸車是電池動力， 可以在任何有效電力網上的電線進行充電。
車輛是人類運輸科技的頂峰， 它們擁有延長的電池壽命， 而且相當耐用， 讓它們可以抵擋火星上像寒冷和粉塵之類的危害。 它們可以穿越殖民地，到達沒被地形限制的遠處，執行被賦予的任務

Text:
RC Explorers carry with them advanced examination and research apparatus, making them the perfect vehicle to analyze any anomalous reading from anywhere in the region. As all Rovers, they are remotely controlled and can reach far-out locations if the terrain permits it.  

Explorers are battery powered and can recharge their batteries at any point along a power cable.

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

The apex of human transport technology, Rovers have extended battery lives and are incredibly durable, making them resistant to most of the Martian calamities such as cold or dust. They may traverse the Colony site and reach distant spots, limited only by the topography, to tackle whatever they have been tasked with.
Translation:
探索者帶著先進的檢測和研究儀器， 讓他們變成分析區域內所有異常讀值的完美車輛。 就像所有的車輛， 它們可以遠端控制， 而且如果地形允許， 它們可以到達很遠的地方。

探索者是電池動力， 可以在任何有效電力網上的電線進行充電。

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

車輛是人類運輸科技的頂峰， 它們擁有延長的電池壽命， 而且相當耐用， 讓它們可以抵擋火星上像寒冷和粉塵之類的危害。 它們可以穿越殖民地，到達沒被地形限制的遠處，執行被賦予的任務

Text:
Shuttles are a safe and rapid transportation method for Colonists between distant Domes and can also deliver resources reliably wherever needed – distance being irrelevant. When not in use, they are stationed at Shuttle Hubs, where they are maintained and refueled.
Shuttles are optimized to traverse the low-density and low-pressure atmosphere of Mars. Their groundbreaking drives can take off vertically from anywhere, without the need of a runway or a landing platform of any sort.
Translation:
對遙遠蒼穹頂的殖民來說， 客貨機是安全快速的運輸方式，也可以可靠的交遞所需資源 – 無關乎甚麼距離。 沒在使用時， 它們停靠在客貨機中心維修和加油。
客貨機被最佳化來橫越火星的低密度低氣壓大氣。它們的創新驅動器可以從任何地方垂直起降，不需要跑道或任何種類的降落平台。

Text: Hints explain the basic mechanics of the game and will appear contextually as you play. All hints are also available in this Encyclopedia section. Hints can be turned on or off from the Gameplay menu in Options
Translation: 提示這邊解釋了此遊戲的基本機制與一些可以幫助您更快上手的內容。全部的提示內容也可以在選單中的百科找到。 提示視窗可以在選項的Gameplay選單中關閉。

Text: The core mechanics of Surviving Mars explained.
Translation: 解釋了 Surviving Mars 的核心機制

Text: All buildings deteriorate over time. When a building's maintenance bar is filled a drone is dispatched to bring the required maintenance resource and service the building. If the resource is not supplied within a Sol the building will stop operating until the maintenance resource is delivered and the building serviced. Martian dust and disasters contribute to the deterioration of buildings outside of Domes. Extractors, Martian dust geysers, rocket landings and launches spread dust in the area around them causing increased maintenance to nearby buildings. Drones are also susceptible to dust which may result in a breakdown. Recharge Stations clean drones during the charging process.
Translation: 全部的建築物都會隨著時間損壞。當建築物的維護進度條滿的時候，無人機會自動攜帶範圍內可運用的維護資源前往維護設施。如果設施沒辦法得到維護的話，將會停止運作直到維護完成。 火星上的粉塵與自然災害也是造成戶外建築損耗的一大因素。 各式挖掘站、間歇塵噴口或者火箭的起降也會揚起地面的粉塵影響附近建築物。 無人機本身也容易受到粉塵的影響而中斷服務。建造充電站可以協助無人機充電與清理外殼上的粉塵。

Text: Construction of Buildings is the main use of resources on Mars. If a new construction site is placed within the Service Range of a Drone control point (Drone Hub, RC Rover, or Rocket), the Drones assigned to that hub will begin stockpiling the resources needed for construction. IMPORTANT: Said resources also need to be within the Drone’s Service Range, either in Storages or in raw, surface deposit form. Resources are either gathered from deposits or are produced in Extractors, Factories or Farms. Deposits may be surface (Metal and Polymers), underground (Metal , Rare Metals, and Water) or terrain (Concrete). Surface deposits are mined directly by Drones, while underground and terrain deposits require Extractors to be built above them. Resources are stockpiled in Extractors until Drones come to take the extracted resources away where they’re needed or move them to a Depot. Extractors also generate Waste Rock and have limited space to store it. If said facilities are full, the Extractor will stop working until Drones move the Waste Rock to a Waste Rock Dump. Late game deep scanning can reveal deep underground Metals, Rare Metals and Water deposits which require specific techs before they can be extracted.
Translation: 火星上的資源主要被用來蓋建築物。一旦把施工處放置在無人機控制點 (無人機中心、漫遊者、或是火箭) 的服務範圍內時，該中心控制的無人機將會依照優先權，搬運所需要的資源前往施工處。 重點：所需要的資源必須是在無人機服務範圍內的存放區上，或者是地表上可採集的原始資源型態 資源也可以從各式挖掘站、工廠、或農場獲取。 資源點可以是在地表 (金屬與聚合物)、在地底 (金屬、稀有金屬、以及水資源)、或者是表土 (混凝土)。 地表資源點由無人機直接挖掘，而地底和表土資源點需要有挖掘站蓋在上面。 資源會堆疊在挖掘站中，等無人機來將挖出來的資源拿到需要的地方或是拿去存放區。 挖掘站也會產生廢棄碎石，而且只有有限的空間存放它們。　如果地方擺滿了， 挖掘站就會停止運作， 直到無人機將廢棄碎石運到廢棄碎石棄置場。 深層掃描可以找出地底深層的金屬、 罕見金屬、 和水資源。 需要特定的科技才能開採它們

Text:
Anomalies appear all over the map in scanned sectors. Sending a RC Explorer to analyze them will trigger their effects. An anomaly can be one of the following sorts:

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

Event Anomaly <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Event.tga> – These anomalies trigger events, which can be associated with Mysteries or not. 

Research Anomaly<image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Research.tga>  – These anomalies instantly generate Research Points, which then contribute to any ongoing research.

Breakthrough Anomaly <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Breakthrough.tga>  – These anomalies reveal a tech on the Breakthrough tree in the Research Screen.

Tech Anomaly <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Tech.tga>  – These anomalies enable specific techs to be researched, no matter their place on the tech tree.
Translation:
觀察點出現在已掃描區塊的地圖上。 派探索者去分析會觸發他們的效用。 觀察點是下列種類之一：

<center><image UI/Common/rollover_line.tga 2000> <left>

事件觀察點 <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Event.tga>  – 這些觀察點會觸發事件， 有可能跟謎團相關 

研究觀察點 <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Research.tga>  – 這些觀察點會立即產生研究點數， 可以貢獻到正在進行的研究上

突破觀察點 <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Breakthrough.tga>  – 這些觀察點會揭露研究面板中突破科技樹上的一個科技

科技觀察點 <image UI/Icons/Anomaly_Tech.tga>  – 這些觀察點會讓特定科技研究完成， 不論這些科技是在科技樹的哪個位置

Text: Power is distributed along power cables from Power Production buildings (or Power Accumulators) to all buildings connected to the same grid. Power Switches can be constructed along cables, allowing us to connect or disconnect entire sectors of the grid at will. Power cables can sustain Cable Faults (either from Meteors or just because of general erosion) and will need repair every now and then by Drones – provided there are Drones within reach. Cable Faults drain power from the grid. Repairing them requires Metals and may take some time IMPORTANT: Denser power grids develop more Cable Faults.
Translation: 電力從 發電建築 (或是蓄電池) 沿著電線配置到連結上這個電力網路的所有的建築物。 電力開關可以沿著電線蓋， 讓我們可以隨意開關整段電力網路。 電線可能遭受到電線異常 (可能是因為隕石或是一般的侵蝕)， 而且需要無人機一直修復 – 如果附近有無人機的話。 電線異常會讓電力網路洩漏電力。 修復它們需要花費金屬，而且可能要花點時間 重點：越密集的電力網路會產生越多的電線異常

Text: Colonists need Life Support resources in order to survive in the short term. These are Water, Oxygen and Food. Without access to any of these, a Dome will die out, with a shortage of Oxygen being the deadliest. Both Oxygen and Water are supplied to Domes via a Pipe Network which must be connected to Oxygen and Water production buildings to ensure the possibility of using Water and Oxygen Tanks to manage temporary shortages. Pipes are built by Drones and deteriorate over time, resulting in Pipe Leaks which drain Water and Oxygen from the system. Drones repair Pipe Leaks at the cost of Metals. If a Dome is left without power it won't provide heating to Colonists and they may die due to exposure to the intense cold of the Red Planet. Food, which can initially be brought from Earth via Rockets, can be grown later on using Farms, Hydroponic Farms, and Fungal Farms. In contrast to Water and Oxygen, Food is not a grid resource and needs to be transported with Drones.
Translation: 殖民者需要維生資源來在短時間之內生存。 這些資源有水資源、氧氣、和食物。 如果無法取得這些資源，蒼穹頂的人會死光， 其中氧氣的短缺是最致命的。 氧氣和水資源都是透過管線網路提供給蒼穹頂， 管線必須連結到氧氣和水資源生產建築物， 確保可以用水和氧儲存槽來應付臨時的短缺。 管線由無人機建造， 而且會隨著時間劣化， 造成管線洩漏讓水資源和氧氣從系統中洩漏。 無人機花費金屬來修復管線洩漏。 如果蒼穹頂沒電就沒辦法提供殖民暖氣，他們會因為暴露在紅色星球的嚴寒中而死亡。 食物一開始可以由火箭帶來，之後可以使用農場、水培農場、和真菌農場種植。 不同於水資源和氧氣，食物需要無人機運送。

Text:
New technologies will unlock new buildings, upgrades, colonist perks and other benefits for the colony. Standard technologies are divided in five fields with different themes. Researching any technology will make a new technology within its field available for research. Some technologies have fixed positions in their fields, others have randomized positions. Individual technologies are researched by generating research points equal to their costs. The mission sponsor may provide a fixed amount of research point per Sol, but research buildings will be needed to discover the later, more advanced, technologies in a timely manner. Outsourcing research is another option granting a fixed amount of research for a certain period in exchange for Funding. Analyzing anomalies with an Explorer vehicle may grant research points or make new technologies available for research.
Breakthroughs are extraordinary technologies with powerful effects that are discovered only by special means. One way to unlock a breakthrough technology is to discover it in an anomaly on the surface of Mars. Different breakthrough technologies may appear in each playthrough.
Translation:
新科技會解鎖新的建築物、升級、殖民者優點和其它對殖民地的益處。 標準的科技依照主題分成五個領域。 研究科技同時會讓該領域內的新科技可以被研究。 有些科技在它們的領域內有固定的位置， 其它位置則是隨機的。 個別的科技藉由產生所需的研究點數來研發。 任務贊助商每個太陽日會提供定量的研究點數， 但是之後會需要蓋研究建築來及時研發更先進的技術。外包研究是另外一個選項，用資金來交換某段時間的固定研究量。 用探索者車輛分析觀察點可能獲得研究點數，讓新科技可以開始研發。
突破點是有強大效果的非凡科技， 只能用特別的方式發現。 解鎖突破點科技的一個方式是檢測在火星地面上的觀察點。 每次遊戲可能會出現不同的突破點科技

Text: The Founders are the first human pioneers of the red frontier and the first residents of the fledgling Colony. Their initial task is to prove the potential of the Colony and the viability of a permanent settlement on Mars. After the Founders arrive on the planet, the Colony will be under evaluation for a certain number of Sols. No new Colonists will be available until the Colony is evaluated positively. A positive evaluation will be awarded if any Founders survive a certain number of Sols, or if the first child is born on the Red Planet. Since the Founders number is limited to the capacity of the rocket, you may wish to handpick them using the Review command on the passenger rocket screen. Take care to micromanage their priorities during their first days on the Red Planet, using building priority and work slot management to guarantee that the crucial buildings are staffed.
Translation: 創始者是這個紅色邊境的第一批人類先鋒，也是新生殖民地的首批居民。 它們的初始任務是證明殖民地的潛力， 以及在火星上永久移民的可行性。 創始者到達星球之後， 殖民地會被評估幾個太陽日的時間。 評估結果必須是正向的才會有新的殖民者。 如果有創始者存活了一些太陽日，或是紅色星球上誕生了第一個兒童， 就會有正向的評估結果。 因為創始者的數量受限於火箭容量， 你可能會想要用客戶火箭畫面的審核應徵者命令來挑選他們。 當他們來到紅色星球的前幾天，請小心的微觀管理他們的優先權， 用建築物優先權和工作空缺管理來確保重要的建築物有人值班。

Text: Every Colonist is a unique individual defined by his or her name, age category, workplace specialization, traits, and stats. Colonists will automatically staff Residences within their Dome. Take care to provide enough living space for all of them. Children and senior Colonists cannot work, but still require sustenance and residential space. The rest of the Colonists will seek jobs in and around their Domes, according to the building priority and their individual work specialization. Buildings with higher priority will be staffed first. Specialized colonists will prefer to work in buildings corresponding to their individual specializations and will have better performance at such workplaces. Traits define details about the individual Colonists. Traits that provide beneficial effects are called Perks, traits with negative effects are called Flaws. Quirks are neither positive nor negative. Rare traits define truly exceptional individuals. Every Colonist has four stats defining his or her current condition. Health represents physical fitness. Sanity represents mental wellbeing. Comfort represents the quality of the Colonist’s life on Mars. Morale represents happiness, optimism and loyalty. For details about individual stats and a more comprehensive description of their effects, refer to the Colonist’s Infopanel. Be careful - if all Colonists die, the Mars colonization mission will be terminated.
Translation: 每位殖民者都是獨一無二的個體， 有自己的名字、年紀分類、工作專長、性格、和狀態。 殖民者會自動的住進他們的蒼穹頂內的居住區。 請小心的為大家提供足夠的居住空間。 兒童和年長的殖民無法工作， 但是仍然需要營養和居住空間。 其餘的殖民者會根據建築物優先權和工作專長，在他們的蒼穹頂內和附近找工作。 有高優先權的建築物會先被進駐。 有專長的殖民者會優先選擇到符合他們專長的建築物工作， 而且在這種工作地點會有較好的工作效率。 性格定義了個別殖民者的詳細特質。有正向效果的特性稱為優點， 有負面效果的特性稱為缺陷。癖好沒有正向也沒有負面效果。 罕見性格則是真的很優秀的特質。 每位殖民者都有四個狀態來表示他們目前的情況。 健康表示生理的情況。 理智表示心理的情況。 舒適表示殖民在火星上的生活品質。 士氣表示快樂、樂觀、和忠誠。 對於個別狀態的細節和其效果的完整描述，請參閱殖民者的資訊面板。 小心 - 如果所有殖民者都死了， 火星殖民任務就會被終止。
殖民者 - 蒼穹頂間的移動

Text: Colonists may migrate to new Domes within walking distance of their current position, or farther away when Shuttle transport becomes available. Homeless Colonists will travel to another accessible Dome with available residential space. Each Dome can be set up to filter Colonists by age, specialization and other traits. Colonists with ANY of the desired traits and NONE of the undesired ones will remain in the Dome, while others will seek another Dome with available living space and filter that matches their traits.
Translation: 殖民者可能搬遷到步行距離內的新蒼穹頂， 如果有客貨機運輸則可以搬得更遠。 無家可歸的殖民者會跑到有可用居住空間的另一個蒼穹頂。 每個蒼穹頂都可以設定根據年齡、 專長、 和其他性格來篩選殖民者。 有任何一個想要的性格， 而且沒有任何不想要的性格的殖民者會留在蒼穹頂內， 其他人則會去尋找有可用生存空間以及符合性格的另一個蒼穹頂。
殖民者 - 管理專長與性格

Text:
Colonists with no specialization may be educated to receive a specialization in the Martian University. The University can provide needed specializations automatically or focus on a single desired specialization.

Some, but not all, undesirable Flaws may be cured in the Sanatorium spire. Up to three different flaws can be treated in a single Sanatorium.

The School building cultivates desired Perks in children living in the Colony. They have a chance to receive any of the three selected Perks when they grow up. Not all Perks can be trained in School. The Playground building cultivates random Perks in children who visited it.

The University, Sanatorium and School buildings are treated as workplaces - colonists being educated or treated there cannot work a job at the same time. The individual performance of the colonists determines how fast they receive a specialization, cure a flaw or their chance to cultivate a Perk from School. The Playground service building grants its effect to any children who visit it at least once during their childhood.
Translation:
殖民者沒有專業技能時可以到火星大學接受專業教育。 大學會主動提供需要的專長或專注在單一所需專長。

一些 ， 但不是全部 ， 不良的性格缺陷可以在尖端療養院中被治癒 。 在同一家尖端療養院可治療三種不同的性格缺陷。 

學校建築可以讓居住在殖民地的孩童培育優點 ， 他們有機會在長大後獲得三種選定的優點 ， 但並非所有優點都能在學校中習得 。 造訪過遊樂場的孩童可獲得隨機的優點。 

在大學 、 尖端療養院 、 和學校建築都被視為是工作場所 - 殖民者在接受教育或治療時 ， 無法同時工作 。 殖民者的個人表現決定了他們獲得專長 、 治癒缺陷 、 或在學校獲得技能機會的速度 。 遊樂場建築的影響效應給予在童年期至少造訪過一次的孩童。

Text: All Rovers are manually controlled via the commands available in their Infopanels. They can either be given orders to go to a map location or to interact with a contextually specific map object – such as Anomalies or Surface Deposits. Drones are semi-autonomous and will queue up tasks that are flagged only if these tasks are within the Service Area set for each drone. However, the player can take direct control of a Drone if needed. Change your preferred controls and mappings using the Options menu.
Translation: 所有漫遊者都藉由它們資訊面板中的可用命令來手動控制。 可以命令他們去地圖上的點， 或是和指定地圖物件互動 – 如觀察點或地表資源點。 無人機是半自主性的，會依序執行在無人機服務區域內標記的任務。 然而，如果必要的話，玩家可以直接控制無人機。 使用選項選單來改變你想要的控制和應對。

Text: The map is divided in Sectors which need to be scanned to reveal what resources and Anomalies they hold – if any. Sectors can be queued for scanning from the Map Overview. Sensor towers drastically increase the scanning speed of sectors near them and provide a smaller overall bonus to sector scanning. A fast and expensive way to explore the map is to buy Orbital Probes from Earth which instantly scans a chosen sector. Building in unexplored Sectors carries the risk of building directly on top of undiscovered resource deposits.
Translation: 地圖被區分為地圖區塊 需要被掃描才會顯現該區的物資跟觀察點-如果有的話。 地圖區塊可以被安排掃描順序Map Overview. 掃描塔會大幅提升度附近地圖區塊的掃瞄速度並小部分獎勵給該地圖區塊。 有快速而昂貴的探索地圖的做法是從地球購買 探測衛星 將立刻掃描選定的地圖區塊。 在未探查的地圖區塊建設有將建築物直接蓋在未發現的 資源點 的風險。

Text: Wonders are exceptionally advanced and expensive structures that provide major benefits for the entire Colony. They are unlocked at the far ends of the Research Tree. Each wonder is unique and can be constructed only once.
Translation: 世界奇觀是一座相當先進且昂貴的建築物，可以提供整個殖民地巨大的幫助。 將解鎖於 科技樹末期 每座世界奇觀當是獨一無二的，所以他們只能被建造一次。
從火星上發射一艘火箭
完成一個突破性科技的研究
建造一座 巨型蒼穹頂
建造一座 世界奇觀

Text: Difficulty: Very Easy Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - Large Rocket payload ( kg) - Colonists never get Earthsick - Food supply from Passenger Rockets increased (x10) - Rockets synthesize Fuel
Translation: 難度： 非常簡單 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 大型火箭酬載 ( kg) - 殖民者將不會得到思鄉病 - 跟隨客運火箭的食物補給量增加 10倍 - 火箭自行合成燃料補給
建議給首次遊玩的玩家

Text: Difficulty: Easy Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - Large Rocket payload ( kg) - Periodic additional funding
Translation: 難度： 簡單 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 大型火箭酬載 ( kg) - 定期增加資金

Text: Difficulty: Easy Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - Can buy Applicants with funding - Additional Rockets are significantly cheaper - Probes can discover deep Rare Metal deposits - Bonus Tech: Deep Metal Extraction (can extract deep metals and deep rare metals deposits)
Translation: 難度： 簡單 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 可以使用資金購買應徵者 - 購買額外的火箭相對便宜 - 探測衛星可以找到深層珍貴金屬點 - 科技加成：深層金屬挖掘站 (可以挖掘位於地表深層的金屬與珍貴金屬資源)

Text: Difficulty: Easy Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - Passenger Rockets carry 10 additional Colonists - Applicants are generated twice as fast
Translation: 難度： 簡單 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 客運火箭可額外搭載 10 名乘客 - 應徵者將為兩倍的成長速度

Text: Difficulty: Normal Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - All building costs reduced by 20% - Bonus Tech: Low-G Engineering (unlocks Medium Dome)
Translation: 難度： 普通 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 全部建築物花費減少 20% - 科技加成：弱G科技：蒼穹頂工程 (解鎖中型蒼穹頂)

Text: Difficulty: Normal Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - 5 extra starting technologies - Gain Funding every time a tech is researched. Gain double if it's a Breakthrough tech
Translation: 難度： 普通 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 開局增加 5 個額外的起始科技可選擇 - 每次研發完成都可以獲得資金， 突破性研發則可獲得雙倍的資金

Text: Difficulty: Normal Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - Drone Hubs start with additional Drones - 50% cheaper advanced resources
Translation: 難度： 普通 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 無人機中心 可獲得額外的 無人機 - 進階資源花費可便宜 50%

Text: Difficulty: Hard Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - All Colonists have the Religious trait - Birthrate is doubled - Hydroponic Farms performance reduced by 50 (drawback)
Translation: 難度： 困難 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 全部殖民者都擁有信仰性格 - 兩倍的生育率 - 水培農場效率將降低 50 (負向特色)

Text: Difficulty: Hard Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - Bonus Tech: Fueled Extractors (extractor upgrade that boosts production but consumes Fuel) - Fueled Extractors upgrade is free - Fuel Refinery prefab costs less - Rockets have extended travel time (drawback)
Translation: 難度： 困難 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 科技加成：燃料動力挖掘站 (挖掘站將可以透過 燃料升級 加速產能) - 燃料動力挖掘站 將可免費升級 - 預製 燃料精煉廠 花費降低 - 火箭往返需要更長的時間 (負向特色)

Text: Difficulty: Hard Funding: $ M Research per Sol: Starting Applicants: - Discover more Breakthrough Anomalies - Researching a Breakthrough Tech grants Applicants - Rockets require more fuel to launch (drawback)
Translation: 難度： 困難 資金： $ 百萬 每太陽日研究成長： 開局應徵者： - 可發現較多的突破性觀察點 - 研究突破性科技可以獲得額外的應徵者 - 火箭需要較多的燃料補給 (負向特色)

Text: Let's designate a landing site for the rocket! A promising area has already been scanned for resources. Select the Rocket from the highlighted icon at the bottom of your screen.
Translation: 跟行前任務報告上說的一樣，已經有處區域已經掃描完畢了，並且發現了有用的資源。現在就讓我們在這個區塊選定一個火箭降落點。 選擇畫面下方正閃爍的火箭圖示。

Text: Let's designate a landing site for the rocket! A promising area has already been scanned for resources. The Rocket can be selected by opening the quick bar with and pressing .
Translation: 跟行前任務報告上說的一樣，已經有處區域已經掃描完畢了，並且發現了有用的資源。現在就讓我們在這個區塊選定一個火箭降落點。 火箭可以使用並按下開啟快速選單欄。

Text:
Pick a landing site. Ideally this location would be in a large flat area near discovered resource deposits.

<left_click> - land the Rocket
Translation:
決定火箭降落點。火箭必須在平坦的區域並且靠近資源區附近降落。

<left_click> - 降落火箭

Text:
Pick a landing site. Ideally this location would be in a large flat area near discovered resource deposits.

<ButtonA> - land the Rocket
Translation:
決定火箭降落點。火箭必須在平坦的區域並且靠近資源區附近降落。

<ButtonA> - 降落火箭

Text: Pan - , , , Tilt or rotate - hold or Alt and move the mouse Zoom - or PgUp/PgDown Overview mode - Maximum zoom out or M
Translation: 移動畫面 - , , , 旋轉與調整角度 - 按住 或 Alt 然後移動滑鼠 縮放畫面- 或 PgUp/PgDown 地圖切換 - 鏡頭拉至最遠 或M

平移 - <LS>
旋轉 - <RS>
傾斜或縮放 - <RT>+<RS>/<RS>

Text: Permanent buildings are constructed by Drones. Open the Build Menu with or B, select a building, and place it on the desired location with . Suggested Building: A Large Solar Panel will generate electrical Power required for other buildings
Translation: 指揮無人機到預定地建造設施。 打開建築選單 或B， 選擇建築物，並放置在預計建造的地面上後，點擊 。 建議建築：一座 大型太陽能板 可以生產電力並供給給其它建築使用。

Text: Permanent buildings are constructed by Drones. Open the Build Menu with , select a building construction and place it on the desired location with . Suggested building: A Large Solar Panel will generate electrical Power required for other buildings
Translation: 固定式建築可以被無人機建造. 按打開建築面板, 選擇一個建築 並在理想的地點按 。 建議建築: A Large Solar Panel 會產生大量電力給其他建築。

Text: Use the controls on the HUD or the following shortcuts to control the game speed: Space - pause/unpause + key - increase game speed - key - decrease game speed
Translation: 您可以透過畫面下方的按鈕調整遊戲速度，或者使用按鍵： Space - 暫停/恢復 + key - 加速 - key - 減速

Text:
Use the following to control the game speed:
<DPadDown>/<DPadUp> - pause/unpause
<DPadRight> - increase game speed
<DPadLeft> -  decrease game speed
Translation:
利用以下按鍵控制遊戲速度:
<DPadDown>/<DPadUp> - 暫停/恢復
<DPadRight> - 加速
<DPadLeft> - 減速

Text: Probes will instantly scan a Sector of the map, revealing resource deposits and Anomalies in the area. Deploy a Probe with or X.
Translation: 軌道探測衛星可以立即掃描地圖區塊，並快速的可以探索到可用的資源與觀察點。使用 或 X，以部屬衛星。

Text: Probes will instantly scan a sector of the map revealing resource deposits and anomalies in the area. Deploy a Probe with .
Translation: 軌道探測衛星可以立即掃描地圖區塊，並快速的可以探索到可用的資源與觀察點，使用以部屬衛星。

Text: Surface deposits can be exploited by Drones. They will automatically gather the resources and transport them where they are needed. Resources can be stockpiled in Depots or moved in bulk by RC Transports.
Translation: 地表資源可以由無人機或 運輸車 進行開採， 當它們範圍內有需求對應資源的時候，無人機將會自動前往採集這些資源。 資源可以集中堆放在 儲存處 也可利用運輸車來搬運較多的資源量

Text: Concrete Extractors automatically produce Concrete, but they still need Power and Drones to service them. Place a Concrete Extractor near a Concrete deposit indicated by yellow terrain in a scanned Sector.
Translation: 殖民地許多建設都需要使用到混凝土，但基於重量的考量，如果從地球上載運過來使用不但不划算，而且不會是個長久之計。所以我們必須可以在火星上製造混凝土。 混凝土挖掘站必須放置在看似黃白色紋路的資源地表上，建設時挖掘區域必須覆蓋與其上面才能進行挖掘。 混凝土挖掘站同時也需要電力以及無人機器的服務與維護。

Text: Underground Water deposits can be exploited by Water Extractors. Water Extractors need Power and Drones to service them. Place a Water Extractor near a Water deposit.
Translation: 地下水資源處可以利用 水資源挖掘站進行採集。 挖掘站需要電力供應以及 無人機的服務與維護。 在水資源處附近 放置一台 水資源挖掘站

Text: We are not yet ready to exploit underground Metal deposits. When Colonists arrive on Mars, they will be able to operate Metals Extractors.
Translation: 我們現在還沒辦法挖掘這些地底的金屬資源。 這必須要有人員在 金屬挖掘站操作才能進行，所以我們必須等待首批殖民者踏上火星才能開採。

Text: We are not yet ready to exploit underground Rare Metal deposits. When Colonists arrive on Mars, they will be able to operate Rare Metals Extractors.
Translation: 我們現在還沒辦法挖掘這些地底的 稀有金屬資源。 這必須要有人員在 稀有金屬挖掘站操作才能進行，所以我們必須等待首批殖民者踏上火星才能開採

Text: We are detecting anomalous readings at this location. An RC Explorer vehicle can analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 我們在這個地圖區塊發現了一個可疑的觀察點。 指派一台 探索者號 前往調查分析這個觀察點。

Text: The RC Rover serves as a mobile base for your Drones. It can be relocated by the Move/Interact button in its Infopanel or using .
Translation: 漫遊者號 是一台移動式的指揮所，用來傳達命令給範圍內且附屬於自身的無人機。 在控制面板點擊移動/互動 或者使用. 指揮車輛

Text: The RC Rover serves as a mobile base for your Drones. Manage the vehicle with . Relocate it by holding and then pressing .
Translation: 漫遊者號是一台移動式的指揮所，用來傳達命令給範圍內且附屬於自身的無人機。使用 控制車輛 按住 然後按下 重新定位。

Text: To command the selected vehicle, use the buttons in its Infopanel or use <UnitMoveControl()>.
Translation: 可以利用車輛面板上的按鈕進行操作，或者使用 <UnitMoveControl()>。

Text: To manage the selected vehicle press <RT>. Orders can be given quickly by holding <RT> and pressing any of the button shortcuts.
Translation: 若要管理選擇的交通工具請按 <RT>. 可以按押住 <RT> 再按下其他快捷鍵來快速給予指令。

Text: The RC Transport is used to carry resources at long range or gather resources from surface deposits. Orders are given with the buttons in the Infopanel or using . The Transport can establish a supply route between two points on the map.
Translation: 運輸車 通常是用來進行長途運輸資源，或者採集地表資源的工作。 可以利用車輛面板上的按鈕進行操作，或者使用 。 運輸車可以建立一條在地圖上兩點間的補給路線。

Text: The RC Transport is used to carry resources at long range or gather resources from surface deposits. Manage the vehicle with or hold and press any of the button shortcuts to give orders quickly. The Transport can establish a supply route between two points on the map.
Translation: 運輸車 通常是用來進行長途運輸資源，或者採集地表資源的工作。 使用 控制車輛 或 按住 再按下其他快捷鍵快速給予指令 運輸車可以建立一條在地圖上 兩點間的補給路線

Text: The RC Explorer can analyze Anomalies found on the surface of Mars. Orders are given with the buttons in the Infopanel or using .
Translation: 探索者號可以用來調查火星地表上的各個觀察點。可以透過資訊面板中的按鈕進行指揮或者使用。

Text: The RC Explorer can analyze anomalies found on the surface of Mars. Manage the vehicle with or hold and press any of the button shortcuts to give orders quickly.
Translation: 探索者號可以用來調查火星地表上的各個觀察點。 使用控制車輛或按住再按下其他快捷鍵快速給予指令。

Text: Drones are automated workers that gather resources, construct structures and perform maintenance. They are controlled by a Drone Hub, Rocket or RC Rover and will automatically perform tasks in the service area of their controller.
Translation: 無人機是一部全自動化的工務型機器人，可用來採集資源、建築設施與執行維護工作。無人機可以由火箭、漫遊者號以及無人機中心在所允許的服務範圍內進行遙控。

Text: One of your buildings needs electrical Power produced by Solar Panels, Wind Turbines, or another Power generator. Power consumers must be connected individually to producers with Power Cables. Note that Solar Panels work only during daylight hours, so you may want to store the excess energy in a Power Accumulator.
Translation: 您的建築物中有些需要電力才能運作。您可以建造太陽能板、風力發電機及各式的發電機設備來供應電力。 需要電力的建築物可以透過電線來連接這些電力供應設施後才可以正常運作。 提示：太陽能板僅有白天才可以供應電力， 所以您可能還需要額外建造蓄電池並連結太陽能板，盡可能將其電量充足後，在沒有日光的時候才能維持電力供應。

Text: Drones will stockpile all kinds of resources into a Universal Depot. Consider placing a Depot near each of your outposts. You can also construct specialized Depots for resources of a specific type.
Translation: 無人機將會把各種資源都儲存在通用存放區上，所以您可以考慮設置一些存放區在您的各個據點中。 當然您也可以建築各別資源的存放區，獨立存放特定資源。

Text: One of your buildings has malfunctioned. Malfunctions can be caused by lack of maintenance resources or environmental hazards. They can be repaired by Drones if the required maintenance resource is present in the area.
Translation:
您的其中一座設施故障了。
故障的原因可能是因為缺乏維護或者是自然災害引起。這些故障可以由服務範圍內的無人機自動前往修復， 當然前提是需要有足夠的修復資源。

Text: The batteries of this Drone are depleted. It can be recharged by other Drones or rescued by an RC Rover. Consider constructing Recharge Stations where such problems occur to prevent this in the future.
Translation: 一但無人機電力消耗殆盡後，它將無法移動，並在原地等待其它無人機前往支援，或者由漫遊者號前往進行救援。 可以考慮建造一些充電站以減少這一類的問題持續發生

Text: Sensor Towers significantly boost your scanning speed for nearby Sectors. They also give advance warning for disasters. Note that Sensor Towers require electrical Power that must be provided by a Power generating building such as a Large Solar Panel.
Translation: 掃描塔可以加速附近地圖區塊的掃瞄。 同時也提供天然災害的警告。 提是：掃描塔 需要電力才能運作，所以記得使用電線連接至電力供應設備，如 大型太陽能板。

Text: Your first Sensor Tower is now completed. It will significantly boost the speed for scanning Sectors nearby. To add a Sector to the scanning queue, go to the Overview Mode and on the desired sector.
Translation: 您的首座 掃描塔已經搭建完成。 現在它將大幅的加速您附近的地圖區塊掃描進度。 您可以安排掃描區塊的先後順序，打開地圖視角 接著依序點擊想要掃描的區塊。

Text: Your first Sensor Tower is now completed. It will significantly boost the speed for scanning sectors nearby. To add a sector to the scanning queue, go to the Overview mode and press on the desired sector.
Translation: 您的首座 掃描塔已經搭建完成。 現在它將大幅的加速您附近的地圖區塊掃描進度。 您可以安排掃描區塊的先後順序，打開地圖視角然後對理想的地圖區塊按。

Text: The Drone Hub is a stationary command center that can control more Drones than the RC Rover. Consider constructing a Drone Hub in each of your major outposts.
Translation: 無人機中心是一座廣域的指揮控制中心，可以遙控服務範圍內的附屬無人機群。 也因它的服務範圍遠大於漫遊者號，所以可以考慮建造一座在您的主要據點上。

Text: A Dust Storm has started. It will contaminate all your buildings and Drones with dust, potentially causing malfunctions. MOXIEs and Moisture Vaporators will not work during Dust Storms, while Wind Turbines will generate more Power.
Translation: 沙塵暴來臨！粉塵會汙染你所有建築與無人機，可能導致故障。 MOXIEs和水氣蒐集站在沙塵暴期間無法運作，而風力發電機則會獲得更多的電力。

Text: A Cold Wave has started. Power consumption of buildings and Drones will be increased. If a power shortage occurs, buildings may freeze. Frozen buildings can be repaired after the disaster ends. Water Towers will not work during a Cold Wave.
Translation: 寒流來襲！ 建築物和無人機的耗電量會增加。 如果電力短缺， 建築物可能會結凍。 結凍的建築物可以在災難結束後修復。水塔 在寒流中不會運作。

Text: Your Extractors produce Waste Rock as a by-product. Waste Rock can be stored in Dumping Sites or disposed around the Extractors. Extractors will temporarily stop working when there are not enough Drones to carry out the Waste Rock.
Translation: 每座挖掘站都會因挖掘而產生廢棄碎石副產品。 這些廢棄碎石可以被集中存放在棄置場，或者擺放在挖掘站附近。 如果沒有足夠的無人機帶走廢棄碎石，挖掘站將會暫時停止運作

Text: A Cargo Rocket can deliver additional supplies for the Colony, for example advanced resources such as Polymers, Machine Parts and Electronics. Open the Resupply UI to order a Cargo Rocket from Earth.
Translation: 貨運火箭可以從地球載運更多補給品給殖民地運用。像是補給一些進階資源如聚合物、 機械零件、 及電子零件。 打開補給介面，從地球訂購一艘補給火箭。

Text: A Cargo Rocket can deliver additional supplies for the colony, for example advanced resources such as Polymers, Machine Parts and Electronics. Press and open the Resupply UI to order a Cargo Rocket from Earth.
Translation: 貨運火箭可以從地球載運更多補給品給殖民地運用。像是補給一些進階資源如聚合物、 機械零件、 及電子零件。 按下打開補給介面，從地球訂購一艘補給火箭。

Text: Select a Cargo Rocket and load the desired payload up to the Rocket’s capacity and your available funding. Plan carefully, you have a limited number of Rockets and travel times are significant.
Translation:
選擇補給火箭並且裝載要送往殖民定的資源或預製零件。
火箭的酬載量是有限的，而您的資金也是有限的，火箭往返也需要時間，所以請謹慎拿捏每一次的補給內容。

Text: Rockets require fuel to return to Earth. Fuel is produced in a Fuel Refinery building that can be constructed from a prefab or researched. Fuel production requires Power and Water.
Translation: 火箭需要補給燃料才能返回地球。 燃料可以經由燃料精煉廠生產。您可以透過地球訂購的預製零件建造，或者研發對應的科技。 生產燃料還需要水與電力的供應。

Text: Priority is set from the Infopanel of individual buildings and constructions. Drones will try to complete higher priority tasks before lower priority ones. Buildings with higher priority will receive resources and Power in case of shortages.
Translation: 優先權可以從建築跟建設的資訊面板設置，無人機會試著完成優先度高的建設，優先權高的建築會優先得到資源跟電力以避免短缺。

Text: Water can be produced by Water Extractors or Moisture Vaporators. Water Extractors require Water deposits, while Vaporator prefabs must be brought from Earth with resupply ships. Also consider setting up a Water Tower as an emergency storage. Pipes are used to connect all life support buildings.
Translation: 水可以產自水資源挖掘站或水氣蒐集站 。 水資源挖掘站需要水資源點，而水氣蒐集站預製零件必須經由地球補給船補給 。 也可以考慮設置一個水為緊急儲存 。管道用於連接所有的生命維生建築。

Text: Oxygen can be extracted from the atmosphere by a MOXIE. Since it is crucial for the survival of your future Colonists, an Oxygen Tank for storage is highly recommended. Pipes are used to connect all life support buildings.
Too Early to Place a Dome
It might be a good idea to secure some Oxygen and Water supply before building your first Dome. You may cancel construction orders at any time before the building is ready.
Translation: 再建造您的第一個蒼芎頂之前先確保有一些氧氣及水的供應可能會是個很好的點子。您可以在建築物完成之前隨時取消建造的指令。

Text: Domes are habitable mega-structures in which the future Colonists on Mars will live. Their construction will take significant time and resources. Plan carefully when placing your first Dome – it has to be connected to a Water and Oxygen supply and Colonists from it will be able to work in the immediate area around it.

Domes have to be connected to working supply of Oxygen and Water with Pipes. Colonists will not be able to survive within the Dome if life support is not secured, so storage for Water and Oxygen is also recommended.
Colonists live in residential buildings within the Domes. The basic residential building is called Living Quarters.
Translation: 殖民者住在蒼穹頂內的住宅建築。最基本的住宅建築稱為宿舍。

Text: When you are ready you can invite the first Colonists to Mars. Launch a Passenger Rocket from Earth and land it near one of your Domes. The Rocket will carry some Food supplies, but you will have to secure Power, Oxygen, Water and living space in advance.
Translation: 當你準備完成時，你可以應徵第一批殖民者到火星。從地球發射一枚客運火箭並且將它降落在靠近你的蒼穹頂附近。火箭可以攜帶一些供應食物，前提是你已獲得充足的電力、氧氣、水和生活居住空間。

Text: Colonists have several basic stats. You can monitor the condition of each Colonist in their Infopanel. To maintain your Colonist’s good health, you need to provide them with Water, Oxygen, Food and access to operational Service Buildings.
A Research Lab will speed up the discovery of new technologies that will advance and improve the Colony.
Translation: 一個實驗室 會加速新科技的發現以進化和改進殖民地。

Text: To start working on a technology, open the Research screen.
Translation: 欲開始研發科技，請打開研發畫面。

Text: To start working on a technology, press and open the Research screen.

Research will unlock various benefits for the Colony. Researching any technology will make a new technology in its field available for research. Changing your active research will preserve the progress of the previously researched technology.
Translation: 研究會帶給殖民地各種不同的好處，研究任何科技會解鎖新科技，改變你正在進行的研究會保留更改前的進度。

Text: The passenger rocket will deliver Colonists and a minimal food supply to Mars. Use Review to inspect the traits of the arrivals.
Translation: 客運火箭會攜帶殖民者跟少量的食物補給到火星。 用 審核應徵者 來檢視應徵者的性格

Text: Local Food production will be crucial to the survival of your Colonists. Consider constructing a Hydroponic Farm. Keep in mind that the initial Food production may not be sufficient for the Colony, so you may have to rely on Ressuply Rockets carrying Food from Earth.
Translation: 在地食物產量對殖民者的生存影響重大，建議建設一個水培農場。 須留意剛開始的食物產量可能不足以供應整個殖民地, 所以需要仰賴從地球的 攜帶食物的補給火箭。
舒適度 與 服務設施

Text: Colonists will visit buildings to increase their Comfort stat, according to their interests. They may become Earthsick and will want to leave the Colony if their Comfort becomes too low. Service Buildings are essential for the Colonists' Comfort. Suggested Building: Diner
Translation: 殖民者會根據興趣拜訪相對的建築物增加他們的舒適度， 如果舒適度太低他們可能會有思鄉病並想離開殖民地， 服務性建築是跟殖民者舒適度息息相關的。 建議建築: 餐廳

Text: Gardens, parks and other decorations can be visited by Colonists and require no workforce. Suggested Building: Garden
Translation: 花園、公園和 其他裝飾建築可以被殖民者拜訪並無須勞動力。 建議建築: 花園

Text: Healthcare Buildings will increase the Health and Sanity of the Colonists as long as they are not Starving, Thirsty, Freezing or Suffocating. Suggested Building: Infirmary
Translation: 健康照護建築物將增加殖民者的健康度跟理智, 只要他們不是在飢餓、缺水、受寒、或窒息的狀態。 建議建築: 診所

Text: RC Transports are powered by batteries with limited capacity. To recharge them you have connect the vehicle to a Power grid or transfer Power from another vehicle with a charged battery.
Translation: 運輸車由有限的電池電量供電， 要對它們充電你必須將車輛靠近電力區或者從其他有電的車輛轉移電力。

Text: Colonists with very low Comfort will get Earthsick. They will stop working and travel back to Earth at first opportunity. To prevent this, make sure they have access to a variety of operational service Buildings that satisfy their different interests.
Translation: 當殖民者長期處於不舒服的狀態時，可能會患有思鄉病。一旦思鄉病發生後，患者只要一有機會返回地球，馬上就會丟下手邊的工作並狂奔向火箭。 為了避免這個問題，確認殖民地內保有穩定地的舒適度與服務設施，讓居民可以感到生活舒適且安全。

Text: If the Morale in a Dome is too low, Renegades will appear. Renegades have reduced work Performance and will cause trouble. Security Stations can suppress them for a while, but to solve the problem you have to take steps to increase Morale.
Translation: 一旦蒼穹頂內的士氣過預低落時，很可能就會出現叛徒。 叛徒不但會降低工作效率，而且四處惹事生非！ 可以透過 保安站稍微控制狀況，但要徹底解決這個問題還是得提升整體的士氣。

Text: Your Officers in <dome_name> stopped the Renegades!
Translation: 您的保安人員在 <dome_name> 阻止叛徒的犯罪行為！
創始者養成了一個性格

Text: A resupply Rocket has arrived in orbit
Translation: 補給貨船已經抵達降落軌道了

Text: The Space Elevator delivered goods from orbit
Translation: 太空電梯已經將貨物送往軌道了

Text: We have a delivery on the Space Elevator
Translation: 我們有貨物在太空電梯上
即將撞擊至我們的座標
發現一個 突破性科技
