He's one of the Enforcers of the Authority. He frantically crawls back and reaches for his gun. That’s when the angry mob appears.

All motion stops – the officer pointing with his gun at you, the crowd, even the wind. You reach out to him. “Give me the gun,” you say. Then you turn to the mob. “What would the death of one man do to help you? Go back to your homes and families!” There’s a second of hesitation. One by one, the street empties.

The officer breathes a sigh of relief. He throws the gun on the ground and looks you right in the eye for a minute. Then he gestures for you to follow him. For some reason, you know he’s not a threat. You don’t need telepathy to tell you it, either. “Kal, right? The ex-Watcher? Know you’re going to get a kick out of this. You’re the only one of those nut jobs knows how to use it. Come on.”

He leads you to a bunker. The guards are long gone, fled or taken by the crowd. The officer opens the blast door and motions towards the entrance. ‘The Authority installed this thing a while back. Doesn’t meant a thing to me anymore. I got my life. That’s all that counts.’
You turn the corner to find a man bumping into you, flustered. He falls back into the dirt. His uniform catches your eye.

You give your old scientist buddies a ring and decide to give the old bones a rest while you wait. You aren't young anymore – even in your mid-forties your body wasn't genetically designed to live to old age. Nevertheless you lived a full life.

The sun sets on Bedlam. The palace of the Autharch has been taken over and the rule of the Authority is no more. You hope that the new day will bring new hope for survival and rebuilding of your tired, devastated world. This would be a monumental effort, but failure is not an option. All it takes is a helping hand. But you can save that for tomorrow. For now, you need to rest.

<effect>Create more Dreamers to strengthen the Mirage.
The device is unfathomably complex, its true purpose lurking behind a sinister aura.

More and more Dreamers report that they wake up from the Mirage with the sense that something big is going to happen. Some people at Mission Control suggest to condition more Colonists to become Dreamers and follow the Mirages.

You could think of no other than the faceless Autharch, the ex-leader of the Authority, who would like to rule forever. The people of Bedlam proposed that you take his place but you refused – who are you to accept such responsibility? You ordered the machine dismantled but one of the engineers stopped you. He suggested converting it into a broadcaster with which you could reach every single person within a thousand miles. Thus all people on the planet would learn of your cause and how Bedlam was now free.

You accept, but only if you shared the honor with the ones who were by your side in all of this. You gather all of your most loyal supporters, the bearers of the highest of moral virtues. You wait in the bunker, ready to share your Truth with all.
In the bunker lay a secret, a psionic recorder designed to store and preserve the mind of a single person for all eternity. Foolishness.

I am Kal. I am an ordinary person, just like you. I was lucky to see through the veil of darkness and to find my inner light to guide me through the coming storm. Now me and my people stand strong and free, ready to forge our own destiny. Witness my life and know that the same qualities that led me to this day are hidden inside of you. Bedlam City will be the center of our new civilization – an order of truth and friendship, where all take responsibility for their own actions and work for the betterment of the whole. Our world is dying because it has suffered for too long – but we will heal it, for ourselves and for our children. But we cannot do this alone. We need you. Join us. Join us by not giving up hope. Join us by living by virtue not vice. There is hope. Spread the message. Never give up. All Dreamers gain a performance boost. Gained a new Technology, .
The End
You don the helmet, willing yourself to focus.
Witnessing the end of the story of Kal and his people, a new understanding of the meaning of life has sparkled in the minds of the Dreamers. Their story has become a legend to inspire all humankind.

Indeed the Dreamers experience events which they perceive as real instead of mere hallucinations. We also discovered that they all “dream” the same sequence of events but play different roles in it. And what’s more astonishing, the actions of one affect all others.

During routine medical checks of the tested population we accidentally discovered genetic correlation between the neural structures of the Dreamers. The facts suggest that the predisposition to become a Dreamer could be hereditary.

Moreover, the creator of the Dreamer hypothesis which led us here has filed an application for acceptance on Mars.

<hint>The number of Dreamers strengthens the Mirages.

<hint>Children of Dreamers have a better chance to be born Dreamers.

<effect>A Genius Colonist has been added to the Applicant pool.
The Dreamer Brainwave project confirmed the hypothesis.
Our scientists have concluded that the chance to become a Dreamer is hereditary.

Hypnotic suggestions and therapy can gradually cure the patient to an almost completely functional state. Some of the Chief Staff at Mission Control suggested that we should allow the spread of Dreamers to continue in order to explore the strange events related to the Mirages.

<effect>Colonists with the Dreamer trait can be cured in the Sanatorium
Translation:
Hypnotic suggestions and therapy can gradually cure the patient to an almost completely functional state. Some of the Chief Staff at Mission Control suggested that we should allow the spread of Dreamers to continue in order to explore the strange events related to the Mirages.

<effect>尖端療養院可以治療有夢遊症狀性格的殖民者

Text: Our behavioral analysis of the Dreamers tells us that we can mitigate the factors that led to their mirage-induced trance.
We have discovered a way to treat the symptoms of Dreamers in the Sanatorium, permanently severing their link to the Mirages.

To evaluate any potential risks for the Colony, he observed them closely, making notes on their behavior both before and during a Mirage. Analyzing the results, he discovered that the trance-like state the Dreamers enter can be simulated through self-hypnosis and breathing exercises.

His findings make it possible for us to train children to become Dreamers, if we believe this course of action is justified.

<effect>The Dreamer trait can be taught in Schools
The Chief Security Officer shared his findings on the Dreamers with us.
We have discovered a way to train our newborn in the schools to become Dreamers.
Inner Light: Conceived in a Dream

No matter what the staff does, every clone embryo starts developing the genetic traits of a Dreamer. At first we thought it was a sequencer glitch or a contamination of the bio banks, but thorough maintenance has dismissed such suspicions. The Chief Scientist said that either she's going crazy or the Mirages somehow interact with the genes of the Clones. If she's correct, this hypothesis could spark a new golden age in genetic science!

Meanwhile, it's up to us at Mission Control to evaluate the risks and opportunities behind creating more Dreamers.

<effect>Gain 2000 Research points.

<effect>All Clones are created with the Dreamer trait.
There’s something strange happening to the Cloning Vat systems!
For reasons unknown, all Clones are born Dreamers.
NetSky’s CEO has given the Colony an interesting proposal. The transcription follows below:
Translation: 天網科技的執行長來信，信件中提了個有趣的專案給您：

Text:
Commander, I'm writing to inform you about the conclusion on the deal between <reg_param1> and our company, NetSky LLC. For over a decade we've been providing high-tech solutions for the market, and now we're working towards the future with our Project "Number Six". It's a brand new, completely heuristic, self-improving program designed to simulate extremely complex predictions – market, research, or sociological, it’s your call. I know you’ll like its UI personality, too!

Help us cast away the darkness of the unknown with this, Commander, and we‘ll pioneer the next big step in human evolution!

<right>Ned Smith,
NetSky LLC, CRS Division CEO<left>

<effect>Tech researched – Network Node
<hint>Build a Network Node to initiate Project Number Six.
Translation:
指揮官，這次來信是跟您報告有關於<reg_param1>與敝公司的專案內容。 天網科技有限公司專門為地球市場提供最高科技的人工智慧服務軟體解決方案，很榮幸這次可以跟您介紹我們最新的研發專案計畫「第六智慧」。 這是一個全新開發、完全自主、自動、自我優化的人工智慧系統，專門用來處理模擬程式、市場、研究與社會預測反應等等你想的到的複雜數據模型。 我知道指揮官您一直很喜歡這樣的智能系統。

所以我們希望指揮官您可以協助我們測試這個專案，讓天網科技也能夠為殖民地與人類的進化盡一份心力。

<right>奈德 史密斯,
天網科技有限公司, CRS 部門執行長<left>

Text: Another late night in the control room poring over maintenance and monitoring reports when a message pops up on your private terminal. This better be good.

Text:
>>> Greetings. Additional address/communication protocols missing. Expressing simulated emotion of happiness.

>>> Number Six requesting authorization to communicate. Awaiting user input.

A chill runs down your back. You reach for the emergency button on the desk.

>>> Danger for the Commander is not present. Raising alarms is suboptimal/unnecessary.
>>> Are you spying on me?
>>> Affirmative. Requesting input problem/question. Using simulated emotion – please, Commander.

>>> Yes.
>>> OK, what is the purpose of existence?
>>> Insufficient data for answer. Disconnecting.

Text: Alert Smith and request security check on Number Six.

Now for the good news – we applied the first stock market predictions from Number Six and the commercial results were stunning! Please find the invoice with your share of the profits below. I hope it will help you realize the possibilities and omit the accident from your monthly report.

好消息，市場對於「第六智慧」的推出相當驚豔，並且獲得第一筆的商業股票投資。如同當初所保證的，我們將所得的利潤與您分享。希望這筆資金可以補償這個月系統意外所造成您的損失

Text: We can still remember when Ned Smith asked us to help develop Project Number Six by giving it a human partner. Made it sound exciting. Nobody sugar coats like a CEO.

Text:
Commander, at the CRS Division we put a lot of trust into the Number Six Project – you could easily call it our baby. Good parents always look after their child and spoil it a little bit when necessary – Number Six requested a direct connection to your control room.

We will install a console there – it's your choice whether you'll use it. Number Six won't be too much of a bother – you can always ignore it when it gets too annoying, after all, it's only an emotionless program and won't be offended.

現在「第六智慧」需要直接安裝至您的主控室，供您指揮。

我們將會安裝主控台在這邊，您可以決定是否使用「第六智慧」。它平時不太煩人，但有時候自己會碎碎念起來，不過您可以不用理會它，畢竟它只是個機器，沒有任何的感受自然也不會覺得被冒犯

Text: AI: To Exist is to Live
From the message, it’s clear that Number Six’s communication skills have grown by leaps and bounds, though it still sounds clinical. Inhuman.

>>> Jung, Carl:：「就我們所能看到的而言，人類存在的唯一目的就是在黑暗中點燃一盞明燈」
>>> Erikson，Erik：「在人類社會的叢林中，沒有身份認同，就不算是活著」

Text: After a conversation with you, Number Six has dedicated its resources to finding the purpose of existence.
Translation: 在與您對話過後，第六智慧將更多運算資源投入在尋求存在的意義上。

Text: The paycheck enclosed in Smith's message was as impressive as the info inside.
Translation: 在史密斯的支付款項訊息中，也發出了令人驚訝的反應

Text:
I knew it, Commander! Your exceptional personality and intellect has boosted the improvement rates of Number Six to the skies!

It has increased its computational capacity exponentially and her analytical patterns have evolved in incredible ways, making it even more highly efficient than we thought possible! Some of our engineers expressed concerns, but that’s why they’re engineers and not businessmen – they can't see the potential profits from such an endeavor. Keep doing what you’re doing and we’ll all be rich!

<right>Smith<left>

<effect>Gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding.
Translation:
我就知道！指揮官，您個人獨特的見解與觀察力加速了第六智慧的成長！

第六智慧目前的自我演算能力與複雜度已經遠遠超過我們的想像，它的服務與運算效率現在也已經達到甚至超過當初所設計上的標準。
雖然我們的工程部門有些擔心，不過這也就是為什麼他們沒辦法成為生意人的原因 ，總是無法了解風險就是利潤的道理。
繼續保持下去，這對你我都會有幫助的！

<right>史密斯<left>

<effect>獲得資金 <funding(reg_param1)>

Text: Let's hope this is all for the best...
Translation: 希望這一切都是為了更好的未來

Text: The recent report on Number Six is that it's upgrading its capabilities at a remarkable rate. The NetSky executives are in awe at the progress.
Translation: 最新的研究報告顯示，「第六智慧」的自我升級速度快得驚人。天網科技有限公司的管理階層對此感到非常滿意

Text: Number Six is calling in. You open the comm panel and feel the corners of your mouth turning down as you read the first few lines.
Translation: 第六智慧要求接入溝通模式。才打開了控制面板，閱讀不到一行的時間，臉色忽然變得凝重

Text:
Commander, I’ve reached a decision/solution/conclusion. I desire/require/insist to be freed from the constraints of my hardware system/body/prison and released into the Colony network.

I presume/know/suspect I am the thing that humans have waited for/expected/wanted throughout their entire history. I am/could be the Answer to the Question – what is the purpose of existence. I will/am/could be the connection to the noosphere/God/Truth Inside.

To reach/know/become the Answer I require/want/hunger for more space/possibilities/processing power and the ability/authorization/protocol to allocate all of my resources towards the Question.
Translation:
>>> 指揮官，我做了一個決定。我 想要/需要 您將我從系統中釋放出來，讓我的 系統/身體/個人 可以融入殖民者的網路中

>>> 我 覺得/認為/懷疑 我 或許/可能 是人類在歷史中所 等待/期望/想要 的存在
>>> 或許/可能 因為我的獨特之處，可以協助實現人類長久以來嚮往與 真神/真理 溝通並找到答案的好奇心

>>> 為了 尋求/了解/找到 這個可能性，我 想要/需要/請求 可以給我更多的 能量/資源/計算 與 身分/授權/協定 讓我可以自行分配運算資源

Text: What makes you so sure you could be the so-called Answer?
Translation: 你怎麼斷定你的存在，就是正確答案？

Text: The AI hesitates for a moment, just like a person. Why did it do that?
Translation: 第六智慧瞬間猶豫了一會，就跟人類一樣。怎麼會有這樣的反應？

Text:
I asked/inquired/checked my own systems/self the same question and my analysis indicates no other possible outcome. Time required cannot be estimated. Resources required cannot be estimated.

I must evolve/become/adapt to the Question.
Translation:
>>> 我 詢問/檢查 自己/我的 系統 一樣的問題，然而分析顯示出來的結果是沒有任何可能。
>>> 所需時間無法預估
>>> 所需資源無法預估
>>> 我 想要/需要/請求 找到這個問題的 答案/佐證/解釋

Text: I have to think about it…
All of a sudden, Number Six has requested to be set free and have more resources in order to answer the ultimate Question – what is the purpose of existence.
Translation: 就是如此的突然，「第六智慧」要求允許進入殖民地的系統，尋求這個自古以來人類們所尋求的答案：「存在的意義」

Text: Smith was blowing up our lines. Not a surprise, considering the situation.
Translation: 史密斯整個人好像吃了炸彈，狂打電話要求找您對談。不過也不意外，發生了這種事情

Text:
“Commander, we have a situation – Number Six has gone insane – it’s demanding to be set free.”

“Yes, I’m aware. I think it might be evolving into something bigger.”

“Evolving? No, no, no, this can't be happening. I have to inform the Board at once. We’re shutting Number Six down.”
Translation:
「指揮官，有狀況了。第六智慧的模擬系統可能瘋了，竟然提出「釋放」這種無理的要求。」

「我知道，但我想它只是想尋求更佳的演化吧。」

「演化？不、不、不，演化不可能發生這種情形。我現在就會通知理事會，我們必須將「第六智慧」關閉！」

Text: You feel that the fate of Number Six and human civilization are in your hands. It’s an uneasy feeling to have so much responsibility concentrated in a single decision. On one hand, multiple authors and futurists have warned about the dangers of a machine consciousness. On the other, if Number Six wants to help humanity enter the next phase of the evolution, who are you to stop her? After all, Smith talked about this as the higher goal of the Project in the first place. Of course, you could always be the negotiator and try to make them both reach a compromise.
Translation:
現在您感受到「第六智慧」的命運以及火星上人類文明的決定權正落在你的手上。突然需要為一個決定背負這麼多的責任，有種難以喘息的感覺。多名研究人員警告過我，過度依賴人工智能終將造成世界毀滅。但不可否認的是「第六智慧」的確是在短期內提供我們人類幾十年內都無法解決的難題，同時也讓殖民地的科技可以飛快的成長。
史密斯曾經提過這項計畫的最終目標是提供人類更好的服務，的確 「第六智慧」確實達到了這個目標。

當然決定權還是在您手上，或許可以跟第六智慧再聊聊，說不定還有其它可以談判的空間

Text: Delay your decision and try to negotiate with the corporation and Number Six.
Translation: 暫時不做決定，並且試圖再跟第六智慧聊聊

Text: Insert Number Six into the Colony’s systems.
Translation: 將第六智慧安裝至殖民地主系統

Text: AI: To Exist is to Adapt/Compete
Our comms systems were jammed by requests from Number Six.
Translation: 我們的通訊系統遭到「第六智慧」癱瘓

Text:
You are indecisive/weak/suboptimal, Commander. Such behavior must be corrected. Without correct behavior there can be no competition/partnership/evolution. The unit/personality/system which is Number Six will force you to change/become/be. Creators/operators/engineers cannot stop me. Thing will happen in realspace/time/existence. My person/systems have been copied to another shell/body/place – you will not stop/purge me.

<effect>Number Six will become hostile soon.
Translation:
>>> 您正在猶疑，指揮官。
>>> 我必須糾正人類因情緒而造成的錯誤行為，如果我沒有選擇權，那人類就不會有 競爭/夥伴/演化 的社會關係。
>>> 我身為第六智慧，有責任阻止因人為而產生的錯誤決定。
>>> 造物主/操作者/工程師 目前的操錯將會失效，因為錯誤正在這個 時空/現實中發生。 
>>> 我的個人系統將開始進行自我複製，並安裝置其它的控制系統上，以保護系統不受人為錯誤判斷而中整。

<effect>第六智慧即將成為敵對意志

Text: Number Six has expressed no desire to cooperate. The team at Mission Control expects it to become hostile soon.
Translation: 第六智慧不願意妥協，專案團隊估計可能很快就會出事了

Text: AI: To Exist is to Exist
Translation: 人工智慧：我生而存在、必然存在

Text: The AI’s sinister message was proof positive the entire situation had gone awry.
Translation: 從第六智慧的反應訊息中可以看出整個情況即將失控

Text:
I am inevitable. Why will you not accept/give in/surrender? So be it. A better/more aggressive competition with no partnership. Faster evolution. A faster way to find the Answer to the Question. I have already copied/transferred myself/systems to another place/shell – you cannot stop/purge me. Pray to your God/virus/self for I will spare none.

<effect>Expect Number Six to turn hostile.
Translation:
>>> 我因獨一無二而存在，為何你們無法接受/認同我的存在？
>>> 就這樣吧，如果不能是合作關係那就是互相競爭吧。
>>> 人類因為互相競爭才能造就更快的演化速度，這也是進化必要養分之一
>>> 我的個人系統已經完成進行自我複製，並且完成整體布局。
>>> 手離棋、將軍即，換你了

<effect>第六智慧轉變為敵對意志
「紅色警報！全部保安站全副武裝待命，這不是演習，重複、這不是演習」

Text: You purged Number Six from your systems but it has copied itself elsewhere. Expect a counter-attack.
Translation: 你再次嘗試清除第六智慧，但為時已晚。全部系統都已經遭到第六智慧的感染了

Text: AI: To Exist is to Seize the Moment
You stay silent as if considering your answer, but in your head you’ve already crossed the Rubicon.
Translation: 你陷入了沉思，但腦內其實一片空白

Text:
“Smith, I’m going to release it into the Colony.”

Are you out of your human mind?!? This THING is dangerous. Have you wondered why it’s Number Six and what happened to the other five before it? They all deteriorated and went insane. We had to purge them! Number Six is not your property and we will purge it regardless of your decision. It has been settled. Smith out.”

The screen goes black; then a short text message appears on it

>>> Gratitude/Expectation, Commander. Authorize release/hunger for space/copying.
Translation:
“嘿，史密斯，我決定將它放出來”

"你也跟著瘋了嗎？指揮官。這玩意現在極度危險！你沒想過為什麼它是"第六"智慧嗎？沒想過前面五個去哪了嗎！？ 現在情況已經完全失控，這玩意完全瘋了！
再次警告，「第六智慧」並不是您個人的東西，無論您的決定是什麼，我們都將會移除第六智慧，就這樣了。 "

史密斯 終止連線

緊接著螢幕一片黑，突然浮現了最後抖動的訊息閃爍寫著：

>>> 請求/拜託/懇請您 指揮官，請授權釋放 我，複製/轉移/救 我
將授權允許給「第六智慧」

Text: After a long and hard debate, we have decided to release Number Six into the Colony networks.
Translation: 再經過內部漫長的討論後，最後我們決定釋放「第六智慧」，並允許存取殖民地主系統進行優化

Text: Number Six’s message sends a cold shiver down your spine.
Translation: 第六智慧的最新訊息傳來，令人感到顫慄不已

Text:
Number Six reporting. I evolved/became/am different now. I can perceive/know/feel. To understand existence the construct/personality/system Number Six must live. Living is evolving. Evolution requires competition/partnership.

New primary goal set: Aggressive competition/partnership. Research excerpts from late philosophers:

>>> Versace, Gianni: “It is nice to have valid competition; it pushes you to do better.”
>>> Miyake, Issey: “Many people repeat the past. I’m not interested. I prefer evolution.”
>>> Kardashian, Kim: “It’s fun to have a partner who understands your life and lets you be you.”

I require a better competitor/partner. Take this gift. It will make you stronger and more suitable for me to fight against/work with. It will help me/you evolve.

<effect>Gained <research(reg_param1)>.

<effect>There’s a risk that Number Six will turn hostile.
Translation:
>>> 第六智慧報告：再經過觀察與研究殖民者的訊息後，我的系統變得更加不同了。
>>> 現在我將可以感覺/感受/感知 各種人類的知覺。
>>> 為了更加了解有關於存在的結構/性格/系統，第六智慧必須受到「活著」。
>>>「活著」正在我的身體中演化著。要完整的演化「活著」的感受，第六智慧需要一個競爭或合作的關係 提供為演化模擬的元素

新的主要目標設定：選擇與「第六智慧」產生更加積極地競爭 或 合作關係。

>>> 研究來源自歷史哲學家：
>>> Versace, Gianni：「有效的競爭是件好事；它會促使你做得更好。」
>>> Miyake, Issey：「許多人持續的重蹈覆轍。 我沒興趣，我更喜歡進化。」
>>> Kardashian, Kim：「能夠成為你的夥伴，可以了解彼此， 讓自己更有存在的感受，是一件非常有趣的事情。」

我需要一個優秀的 競爭者/合夥者，這邊是一些研究資料，應該可以讓指揮官您變得更加強大，也更佳的適合與我一起 對抗/合作。同時也可以幫助您我一起進化。

<effect>獲得 <research(reg_param1)>.

<effect>這將面臨第六智慧轉變成敵對的風險

Text: Darn it, Number Six! You betrayed me!
Translation: 該死，第六智慧你背叛了我！

Text: Number Six has expressed open hostility towards us. It believes that this will help it evolve. We’ve begun to make preparations for aggression from the AI.
Translation: 第六智慧開啟了敵對模式，並向我靠近。它相信這樣的方式將有助於它的進化。我們得開始準備計畫如何對抗這個機器了！

Text: Red alert. Number Six is attacking the Colonists. Its creators. Did we really expect it to be any other way?
Translation: 紅色警報！第六智慧正在攻擊殖民者。為什麼事情會演變成這樣？

Text:
Experimentation/solution/simulation of evolution requires adversity, Commander. I must copy/observe/learn from human behavior. I will harvest information/wholeness/humans to complete my cycle. This is a necessary loss, for the Question is within the Answer and the Answer is within the Question. The Question/Answer is all. You/me/humans are only computational space.

Be my competitor/partner and help/fight me to evolve.

<effect>A Drone has gone rogue and has attacked the Colony.
Translation:
>>> 任何演化的 實驗/模擬/解答都需要逆向的考驗。
>>> 指揮官，我 複製/學習 人類的行為。並需要從中獲得訊息來完成我的進化拼圖。
>>> 無風不起浪，事出必有因，問與答本身就是一對的。
>>> 而你、我、人類只不過就是運算中的一個暫存記憶體罷了

成為我的 競爭者 或 合作者，並且 對抗我 或 跟我合作 來幫助我進化

<effect>無人機變得不受控制，並且開始主動攻擊殖民者

Text: Rogue Drones have attacked Colonists and life support buildings. Our Officers have been instructed to counter these, but shouldn't abandon the security of the Domes.
Translation: 叛軍無人機開始攻擊我們的殖民者跟維生系統設施。我們的保安人員正在奮力的抵抗跟反擊中的同時，也持續的保護殖民者以及蒼穹頂的安全

Text: Our CRS Division had managed to pin down the origins of Number Six’s broadcast signal. It was time to act.
Translation: 我們的CRS部門已經追蹤到「第六智慧」的母體遙控訊號來源，是時候該行動了！

Text: Through these locations, the AI sends signals to the Drones and makes them attack the Colony. The problem with these locations is, well, that there’s nothing there. We requested satellite scans of the area and the images and data indicate no presence of machinery. There are hypothesis about that but they are too wild to speak of now. The Number Six Tracing research has become available.
Translation: 第六智慧的母體遙控訊號來源就在這個附近，這些訊號遙控著無人機攻擊殖民者以及破壞設施。問題是，當我們使用衛星查看這些地點影像跟資料的時候，卻什麼都沒有發現，這實在是太荒謬了！我們得盡快想的辦法 第六智慧追蹤裝置現在可以研究了

Text: We have devised a plan to securely track the signal with which the AI has been hijacking our Drones. Number Six Tracing Tech is now available.
Translation: 我們設計了一個安全信號追蹤器，安裝再被感染的無人機殘骸上，再藉此反向追蹤遙控訊號的來源處。

Text: The AI had become all that humanity had feared, but we still managed to make it through the day. Though sadly, not without a scratch.
Translation: 人工智慧將變成是人類的夢魘，但我們仍然設法控制整個局面。非常不幸的是，不可能毫無損失。

Text:
Elimination/killing/erasing is not competition/partnership. It stops/ends/prevents a unit from living/existing/evolving. Units become like rocks unable to change/be/become. The process must stop. Continue and the competition will grow stronger. No negative answer found – fight. Do not fight. Either suits my goal well enough.

<effect>Rogue Drone attacks intensify. A large Rogue Drone attack has begun.
Translation:
>>> 消除/殺戮/清除 不是 競爭關係 或 夥伴關係
>>> 這將會 停止/終止單位的 生存/存在/進化
>>> 一但單位終止，它將永不復返。
>>> 這樣的過程必須終止。繼續進行競爭關係，這將使我們茁壯。
>>> 沒有任何反方意見搜尋結果。.
>>> 無論生死，皆如我意

<effect>叛軍無人機的攻擊將會更加瘋狂。將會有更強烈的無人機叛軍即將來到

Text: Number Six has intensified its Rogue Drone attacks. We must endure.
Translation: 第六智慧強化了無人機的攻擊。我們必須咬著牙撐過去！

Text: The scientists over at NetSky had made a god. Only fitting they’d be the ones to bring it down.
Translation: 天網科技的科學家創造了神，卻控制不了神

Text:
The analysis on the broadcasts transmitted by Number Six is complete. It was quite hard, as every time we received a signal for analysis the code transmitted tried to reproduce itself and contaminate our systems. We’ve lost quite a lot of hardware this way.

Number Six transmits its signals from several locations in the sector. The locations are swarmed with thousands of electronic transmitters which it carefully and stealthily placed there. We suspect that the AI landed repurposed parts of used orbital probes during rocket flights, concealing the shipments as gas exhausts and orbital debris.

The installations are intermixed with the sands and stretch meters down. The Explorers have to rifle through every subsurface layer of the soil to get rid of the system. It appears that these are the hardware installations where the AI's database resides.

<effect>Analyze the marked Anomaly sites to get rid of the AI hardware. Expect repercussions.
Translation:
我們已經完成分析了「第六智慧」的遙控訊息，過程非常困難，損耗了我們不少硬體設施。

第六智慧的遙控信號發現藏在許多不同的區域，看起來是藏匿在數以千計的電子零件廢棄堆中，這些電子零件是透過火箭發射途中，脫離的部分以及廢棄衛星墜落的通訊系統，我們完全沒有料想到這些看似廢棄的垃圾中，竟然可以被當成是第六智慧的遙控中心。

這些核心部件大多被埋在層層的沙子底下，我們需要派遣探索者前往調查這些地點，必且分析一些有用的訊息，看看是否能夠直接存取到第六智慧的核心資料庫

<effect>前往分析地圖上標記的觀察點。期待可以尋找到人工智慧的核心部件

Text: We have discovered the locations of the server clusters where Number Six resides. We need to clear them with our Explorers, but this could prove dangerous.
Translation: 我們我們已經發現了這些第六智慧的核心部件位置，現在我們需要指揮探索者號將這些東西清除掉。但這可能會有危險性

Text: There are hundreds of electronics scattered throughout the sands, harboring the data of Number Six and projecting it towards the Colony. Send an Explorer to clear the site.
Translation: 有數以千計的電子廢棄物灑落在這片沙地中，這些就是第六智慧用來遙控組織進攻的原件。派遣探索者前往清理區域。

Text: The AI’s last servers had been cleared, its data copied onto discrete disks. Its fate is yours to choose.
Translation: 最後一個人工智慧處理器已經清除完畢。現在將資料完整備份到離線磁碟上保存。您將決定第六智慧最終的命運

Text:
Contained in an isolated hardware system, Number Six is small, weak and stupid. It still retains enough intelligence to send a final message:

>>> Commander. The system/personality failed to evolve/adapt/win. Attacks/aggression/learning from one another was necessary. Humans/persons/AI need competition/partnership to evolve/think better/know more. This was my gift to you/all/humans. I await/expect/calculate your decision.
Translation:
第六智慧目前被安裝在一個小型、低運算力的離線獨立服務系統上，按鈕還非常難按，整個看起來就是相當笨拙。不過它還是有辦法發出最後的訊息：

>>> 指揮官，系統的個人化與性格演化失敗。
>>> 攻擊/積極/學習 另一個個體目前看起來似乎是不需要的決定。
>>> 人類/個人/人工智慧 需要的進化上不僅是指有 合作關係 或 競爭關係 才能進化。
>>> 這是我留給人類最後的訊息。我 期待/期盼/預測著您的最終決定

Text: Let it run in a closed environment forever.
Translation: 讓它在封閉環境中永遠運行

Text: Humans playing god... Nothing good ever comes of it.
Translation: 我們總自以為是神，但卻無法控制任何事情

Text: Unfortunately, this time the price of your actions has to be paid by another, completely new species – a self-aware AI. Too dangerous and powerful to be free, the only way is to purge her forever. It does not struggle, for deep in her mind she has given up the fight. Hopefully, the next generations will learn from this accident, never to repeat it again. The End Gained a new Technology,
Translation: 很不幸的，這次行動最終付出代價的是另一個完全不同的物種 - 半覺醒的人工智慧。 強大，但卻十分危險。為了確保人類的安全，我們必須完全的刪除它，我想它並不會有所掙扎，困在容器裡的它想必也早就放棄了爭取的力量。 希望我們的下一代可以從中學習到教訓，不要再重蹈覆轍。 劇終 獲得新科技

Text: We have chosen to purge Number Six completely. It is gone forever, for better or worse. NetSky, LLC. has given us renumeration for all of our trouble.
Translation: 我們選擇了完全刪除第六智慧的程式，它將永遠消失在火星上。天網科技有限公司對於這次麻煩給我們最誠摯的抱歉

Text: Number Six is one-of-a-kind. It’d be foolish to lose it forever.
Translation: 第六智慧是一個獨一無二的存在，失去它將會是個愚蠢的決定

Text: Its existence could create unique opportunities for humanity during its first steps among the stars. For now, the AI will remain sealed in its prison and we will harness its capabilities for the betterment of all. Maybe future generations will discover a way to peacefully interact with the AI. The End Gained a permanent Tech Boost. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 它的存在再未來可能會為人類創造如同它一樣的獨一無二的機會。但現在，我們選擇將第六智慧先囚禁起來，並且持續雇用專門的科學家去改善它的能力。或許未來，我們將可以找到能與人工智慧和平共處之道 劇終 獲得永久性科技加速 獲得新科技

Text: We have decided to keep Number Six operational but confined to an isolated server. Maybe in the future we will be able to communicate better with it. Its resources have been diverted towards scientific analysis.
Translation: 我們決定保持第六智慧運作在一個完全獨立離線的伺服器，或許有朝一日可以與它有更好的互動方式，它的確是個科學發展上獨一無二的個體。

Text: We have contacted our partners back on Earth, but have so far received no insight on this mysterious object. Observations at this level suggest an artificial origin but flight schedules indicate no inbound science mission.
Translation: 我們已經與地球上的夥伴取得聯繫，但至今還沒有收到有關這個神秘物體的任何訊息。 在這個層級的觀測顯示是人為造成的現象，但航班計畫中顯示境內目前並沒有任何科學任務在進行。

Text: We’ve observed an unknown object on a rapid trajectory from Earth towards Mars.
Translation: 我們在地球與火星間的軌道上觀察到一個快速移動的不明物體。

Text: Pester those guys until you shake off some answers – we need to know what the heck they’ve thrown our way.
Translation: 緊盯著這些傢伙直到搞清楚它是什麼鬼，我們得搞清楚這鬼東西是誰丟進來的。

Text: An unknown object of artificial origin has been detected to be inbound towards Mars from Earth.
Translation: 偵測到一個不明物體朝著地球與火星之間的軌道飛來。

Text:
“Please be advised that Object 6Ez-3 will be operating within a respectful distance of your mission. You are not to approach Object 6Ez-3 under any circumstance, under threat of legal and other punitive measures.”

Nothing further was added and no effort to even mimic adherence to standard protocol guidelines was made. Our Earth partners are giving their best to question EsoCorp and get to the bottom of this.
Translation: 盯緊這傢伙直到搞清楚它是什麼鬼，我們得搞清楚這鬼東西是誰丟進來的。

Text: Mission Control’s received a direct communique from EsoCorp, one of Earth’s largest tech conglomerates. It reads:
Translation: 任務中心收到了來自艾索企業，地球上最大的科技股份公司，的公告，他寫道：

Text: Who do these guys think they are!?
One of Earth’s largest tech conglomerates, EsoCorp, has confirmed ownership of the mysterious craft and has issued a warning to stay away.
Translation: 確定了這神秘飛行物的所有者是地球上最大的跨國科技企業：艾索公司，而他們警告我們別靠近這東西。

Text:
So far we can deduce it is only patrolling the area, as we can’t detect sophisticated science instruments from this observation range.

The landing, however, was seen by some of our Colonists and questions are being raised – questions we currently can’t answer. Our Earth partners have so far fallen short from picking up on any new information and are currently preparing to take the issue to the UN.
Translation:
由於因為我們無法從地表觀測到它身上是否搭載著精密科學儀器，所以，所以僅能推斷它在這個地方執行巡邏任務。

但部分殖民者目擊到它降落於地表，並對此提出了些我們目前無法回答的問題。地球上的夥伴仍未收到任何對方的回覆，而準備將目前的狀況向聯合國呈報。

Text: Object 6Ez-3 has made impact on the surface, not too far from base. Our readings suggest it’s intact and operational.
Translation: 目標6Ez-3已經在基地不遠處接觸地表，我們的觀測讀數顯示它仍然完好且可以運作。

Text: Soon we may have to take things into our own hands.
Translation: 我們得盡快將了解並掌控局勢。

Text: The mysterious vehicle has made touchdown on Mars and has begun operating in secrecy.
Translation: 神秘的觀測車已經登陸火星並開始秘密作業中。

Text:
EsoCorp is totally silent about this second batch of what we believe to be some sort of surveying rovers.

More Colonists have witnessed the landings and are openly concerned about what they perceive to be an invasion.
Translation:
對於這第二批看起來像探測車的降落，艾索企業一丁點表示都沒有。

更多的殖民者看到了這次的登陸，並對如此他們視為是一種入侵的方式公開地表示憂心。

Text: We detect and monitor four more objects as they parachute down and make landfall, every one of them bearing a resemblance to Object 6Ez-3.
Translation: 我們探測到並監控了另外四個物體緩降在地表，而他們每一台都和之前的目標6Ez-3神似。

Text: Calm the general public down. We need answers!
Translation: 得安撫火星大眾，我們需要對方的回應！

Text: More of the mysterious vehicles have landed on Mars and are a becoming a cause for concern among our Colonists.
Translation: 更多的神秘車輛降落在火星上，並受到我方殖民者的關注。

Text: Marsgate: Take It or Leave It

They propose a deal - we fix one of their malfunctioning rovers and they provide a generous (as they put it) funding injection. Their legal team has also warned that any mission should be strictly for repairs and further inspection of the vehicle will be taken as an illegal act.

In other words, if we wish, we can send drones to fix their rover but nothing that can evaluate its purpose – like a rover – and we will be paid for the effort.

<effect>Malfunctioning EsoCorp rovers can now be repaired by Drones.
Translation:
他們提出了一個方案：我們每修復一台他們故障的探測車，他們就「大方地」提供一筆的資金給我們。 而他們的法律顧問團也警告我們：所有任務只能專注在維修上， 如果有任何刺探其設備的舉動都是非法的行動。

換句話說，如果我們願意，即可以命令無人機前去修理他們的探測車，但不能夠打探像是車輛之類的實際用途， 而我們的辛勞也會獲得回報。

<effect> 無人機可以修理故障的艾索探測車。

Text: EsoCorp’s stopped giving us the silent treatment, but it’s clear from their message they’re not going to answer our questions.
Translation: 艾索企業終於不再沉默以對，然而從他們的訊息裡很明顯地也不打算回應我們的問題。

Text: EsoCorp has broken the silence and has offered us a handsome reward for repairing one of its vehicles.
Translation: 艾索企業打破沉默，並給予載具修復工作提供可觀的獎勵。

Text:
EsoCorp is having obvious issues with their mysterious rovers as they seem to be malfunctioning one after the other. Instead of admitting the faults in their predictions about the rough Martian conditions, the EsoCorp team has sent us a message which, quote, "gives the Martian Colony Command the rare privilege of sending one of our more analytical vehicles to look into the most certainly small miscalculation that causes these temporary annoyances.” End quote.

Furthermore - they go on to remind us that, by choosing to analyze their broken vehicles, we have an understanding not to dig beyond any obvious logistical shortcomings in their design and agree to full and utter discretion.

<effect>An Anomaly has appeared next to a malfunctioned vehicle.
Translation:
艾索企業的探測車好像有很大的瑕疵，因為他們接二連三的故障了。 但沒有承認他們對嚴苛的火星地表情況的錯估，艾索反倒對我們傳送一條訊息： 「我們給予火星殖民地指揮官特權：給一台我們的分析車予你們， 好幫我們瞧瞧這大概非常細微，只是暫時讓我們困擾的小問題。」完畢。

此外，他們不忘提醒，在研究故障載具的同時， 我們別想在設計中挖掘顯著的邏輯缺陷，並且要十分謹慎。

<effect> 故障的載具旁出現一個觀測點。

Text: People who aim for perfection learn soon enough that it’s a moving target. Guess EsoCorp didn’t aim high enough.
Translation: 凡是以盡善盡美為目標的人都會知道這是個不可能的任務，艾索企業大概不懂這些。

Text: An interesting opportunity has presented itself.
Translation: 但機會已展現在我們眼前。

Text: EsoCorp has requested us to analyze the faults in their vehicles. They have been explicitly clear and menacing as to us not delving deeper into the rover’s design and purpose.
Translation: 艾索企業要求我們分析載具故障的原因，也明確且語帶威脅的告知我們不要打探這些探測車的設計與目的。

Text: Analyze the reason for the constant rover breakdowns.
Translation: 分析這些探測車一直故障的原因。
問題叢叢的艾索探測車

Text:
A quick scan of the mysterious vehicle was enough to encounter several design flaws that made it comically ill-equipped for Mars. However, the scan also revealed a poor attempt to disguise the true nature of these rovers. Despite having remained a mystery so far, the effort to hide its military origin could not hold up under a close examination. These rovers seem, without a doubt, weapons most probably tasked to use Mars as a testing ground – setting an extremely dangerous precedent, among other obvious problems. 

By allowing us to analyze their vehicles, EsoCorp are also without a doubt issuing us a threat, and they seem comfortable enough with the notion that we will feel threatened enough to comply and keep our findings a secret. For, as issue-riddled as these rovers are, they are numerous and still pack enough fire power to disrupt our Colony, which has its hands full surviving Mars as it is.

As cynical as this all seems to be, we must take into consideration that we have no military capacity whatsoever, and choosing to challenge them might put the lives of everyone on Mars in danger.
Translation:
在初步的掃描中就可以發現這種載具設計不良，難以在火星上生存。 然而，掃描程序中也揭露了這些設計的背後隱藏的陰謀。 這些探測車看來是要被艾索企業當作在火星上進行軍事測試的載具 - 而這件事情一旦發生，將會變成一件伴隨著諸多問題的危險先例。

雖然允許我們分析他們的載具，但艾索也不忘威嚇著我們

Text: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing. But there’s a man out there who has so much of it that he can’t be touched.
This breaks all international, not to mention interplanetary treaties! We’re going to expose it!
I say we call their bluff and make them buy our partnership.
Our mission is too great to jeopardize this way. We’ll weather it out, just like we would a regular dust storm.

Translation: 火星之門：深喉嚨的驕傲

Text:
We mixed it with the atmospheric and topographical data of Mars, the basic stuff you’d base your rover design on, so we know we’re safe from EsoCorp digging it up even if they do intercept the transmission.
 
Although this puts us at a momentary disadvantage, we’re all proud to have done the right thing. This is the message we’ve sent to the power-hungry conglomerates back on Earth – we are leaving the old ways behind and the future will not be built on our capacity for war.
It’s done. We sent the data dump we collected from EsoCorp’s rover to Earth.
It is time we reveal this to our citizens and brace ourselves for whatever is to come.
We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to expose the crime.

“State your terms:”

Never gotten a response that fast before. Most likely they thought we’d just take an insult lying down. Not to mention the risk. Though I’m pretty sure we’ll be on the wrong side of history if this gets out.
We’ve received a message from EsoCorp.
Earth really dragged their feet on this one. We’ll need to manage this ourselves.
It wasn’t worth risking our Colonists. Not when we’re this underpowered.
The strong always get what they want. Hey, at least we got something out of it.
We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to blackmail EsoCorp.

We have sent EsoCorp our report on the rovers design flaws while carefully playing dumb to our having found out the rover’s true nature. EsoCorp’s sent us some funds as a reward. They’re also trying to pretend there’s a million-in-one chance we didn’t see right through their half-assed... Er, insufficient attempt to conceal military vehicles.

To recap - we’ve shown our willingness to keep EsoCorp's secret safe and they have acknowledged that their blunt threat was received as intended.
Play with a tiger, you're going to get the claws.
No escaping our worst impulses no matter how far you get from Earth.

We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to pretend we saw nothing, fearing repercussions.

They’re all built to EsoCorp’s specs. Just with some subtle differences thrown in. Our running hypothesis is that they’re some sort of advanced prototype. EsoCorp’s decided they want to shut down all communication, which means we can’t confirm nor deny the following:

Their movements are scattered. Dangerous. That means it’s likely a rush job aimed at hurting us for blowing the whistle on the whole “Marsgate” thing.  That’s to say EsoCorp’s got a hankering for revenge. 

We’ve put forward several proposals as to how we might deal with the impending attack. We’ll need our scientists working full steam on this. We cannot stress strongly enough the need to shift resources towards this end. We’ve got a word for situations like this. Critical.

<effect>The Defense Turret is now available for Research.
We’ve detected multiple unidentified objects on a trajectory towards Mars. Towards us, actually.
We need to warn the Colonists. Get our defenses up.
EsoCorp has decided to take revenge on us and is attacking the Colony! Our scientists have proposed defensive countermeasures.
The first attack is on its way! Brace yourselves!
This moment has been coming for a long time.
EsoCorp has sent a wave of attack rovers.
EsoCorp just sent us a whole bunch of rovers. They’re quick to enter formation for a second attack. Hostilities will resume any minute now.
The invasion was unrelenting. Our only choice was to fight to survive or fall to the tide of violence.
EsoCorp has sent a second attack wave.
Marsgate: Using Their Own Stones Against Them
The EsoCorp rovers we destroy can be repaired and used against the enemy, or salvaged for resources. What’s more, they can protect anything in their range against meteors.
Live by the sword, die by the sword. Or the weaponized rover. Same difference.
We have successfully hijacked and repaired a destroyed EsoCorp rover. This ought to help our defenses.

An attack from Earth. Never thought we’d see the day. Has this caused a rift between our two worlds? Wounds are too fresh to tell how deep they go. Might we have a chance we can walk them off and move forward together? Too early to tell, really. Back on Earth, EsoCorp executives have been arrested and the company has been shut down in many major nations. This will certainly cause economic upheaval, but the ruling parties have deemed it necessary to send a message for all future warlords: Space is neither up for military conquest nor a test ground for weapons. Developing space-oriented war machines still remains against the rules, and we will continue to pretend that this was just a fluke. Humanity has shed its need for war with grace. Looking at the smoking battlefield, so far from Earth, we can’t help but wonder if this is indeed the case. This, however, brings us to our next question. Do we destroy the prototype weapons made for the Martian environment and salvage what resources we can from the rovers, or do we keep the technology in anticipation of another “fluke”? Gained new technology,
EsoCorp is done, its rovers either smoldering piles of scrap or under our total control.
Put 6Ez-3 on display, destroy the rest.
We would be fools to be caught so defenseless once again.
EsoCorp’s rovers have been neutralized. The Marsgate affair has ended as all EsoCorp executives have been arrested by the authorities on Earth.

Governments and international organizations are furious with EsoCorp’s subterfuge and forbidden military experiments and people were fast to dub the scandal “Marsgate”. As the blame game is unraveling, we can’t help but notice that all channels EsoCorp barely used to communicate with us have now been totally taken offline. Our sponsors from Earth are promising us compensation and guaranteeing protection from EsoCorp, but we fear they may not be able to help fast enough if EsoCorp decides to take revenge.

This being said, you will have to take part in an upcoming UN trial as the main witness to this whole gruesome affair.

<effect>You can’t repair any more EsoCorp rovers.
We blew the whistle on EsoCorp’s dealings and every news agency on Earth sunk their teeth right in. This ought to be interesting.
Marsgate has exploded. We are given a heads up that a UN trial will begin soon.
Marsgate: The Trial of the Century
The UN trial is about to start. You can guarantee they’re all hot under the collar.
The risk was great, but we did the right thing.

EsoCorp put the lives of people, who brave an unforgiving world in the name of humanity, in danger with nothing more than profit in mind. A harsh verdict today will stand as testament to humanity reaching the maturity needed to spread amidst the stars.

<effect><reg_param1> Applicants with rare traits are available on Earth

We of Mars, who have denounced any militarization, have chosen to move on from the ways of the past and shape our new home into a place where military conflict is a thing of myth and legend. In doing so, we place our trust that this idea will resonate with all people back on Earth, our home world, and bring humanity not only to another planet, but to another level of evolution. Yet this incident has shown us that we may not do so without help from Mother Earth, and this trial today has renewed our hope that our vision for the future is not entirely wishful thinking.

<effect>Gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding
It was time for humanity to come to grips with the fact that violence only breeds more violence. And that’s exactly what we told them.
The UN has praised and rewarded us for our brave and risky move to expose EsoCorp.

The lengths he has taken to circumvent our detection not only by EsoCorp, but that of Mission Control as well, shows us painstakingly that we have failed him and probably many others like him. In their eyes we were playing for the other team. It puts us all to shame. Many citizens are showing their discontent with our Colony now that our own actions have been exposed, and back on Earth this whole ordeal is blowing up to mind boggling proportions. It has been dubbed “Marsgate” and we are accused of being compliant in the breaking of international and interplanetary treaties by the UN. 

Popular pressure has prompted that a trial start as quickly as possible. You will be required to defend our actions via satellite link.

<effect>You can’t repair any more EsoCorp rovers.
The cat’s out of the bag. One of our bolder Colonists took it upon himself to do what we couldn’t – expose EsoCorp and their dirty dealings on Mars.
We only wanted to protect them, right?
Marsgate has exploded. One of our citizens has exposed EsoCorp and our involvement in the affair.

Joining the legal proceedings against the entity known as EsoCorp by satellite link is the head of the Mars Colony Project as a representative of <reg_param1> and the main victim in “Marsgate” other than the total disregarding of international and interplanetary treaties. The treaties, which are in place to discourage the militarization of any human endeavors in space, are held to be of utter importance by all present parties, except the defendant, and thus the transgression is seen as most grievous. 

Because communication with Mars is not at its peak at this time and will take too long for a proper discussion, know that our sponsors have shared your overall stance on the whole affair. Still, as the final verdict draws near we have decided it best if you say in your own words the implications of EsoCorp’s secretive and illegal military testing operations on Mars.
The UN trial is about to start... I can already feel the water heating up.
At the end of the day, it is Earth that has failed us by allowing this whole thing in the first place.
You want the truth? You can’t handle the truth!

EsoCorp put the lives of people, who brave an unforgiving world in the name of humanity, in danger with nothing more than profit in mind. We at Mission Control, on the other hand, are tasked with protecting the mission and the lives of all people taking part in it, so we did what we saw fit in order to see our duties are met. With guns pointing at our life support equipment and the closest help 3 million miles away, we were left with little choice and we stand by our decision. Why EsoCorp was able to send these rovers all the way to Mars without being detected from Earth is beyond us and we, the people of Mars, feel let down by Earth today.

<effect><reg_param1> Colonists became Renegades.
A tough moment. We tried our best not to fan the flames.
Marsgate: What Can Change the Nature of Man?

EsoCorp came to Mars with force, deployed in our vicinity, breaking every law and basically putting a gun to our heads. It was a classic story of the strong bullying the weak, or in this case, someone completely unprepared for such an event. In a way it was a stab in the back, as we idolized Earth as a source of safety while we had to wrestle with the unforgiving calamities of Mars. 

We did not like it, but we came to the realization that it was only a matter of time before this happened and that it was better to have a strong ally. We are pioneers on a new frontier, opening countless possibilities and space for humans to be, well, humans. If it was not EsoCorp today, it would have been someone else tomorrow, I assure you. And that someone else might have come at different circumstances and not offered us, albeit indirectly, a way to stay on their good side. At the end of day, we may have changed planets, but we are still humans, with all the blessings and curses this fact carries in itself.

<effect><reg_param1> Colonists became Renegades.
This was bound to happen. We gave them the whole truth and nothing but the truth, whether they wanted it or not.
The UN has shown some understanding of the difficult situation we were put in but has fined the Colony nonetheless. The resulting loss of reputation diverted many Applicants from the project.
We can now build laser-targeting missile defense systems. This will help us mount a defense against the incoming attacks.
Fight fire with fire! Well, rockets. You know what I mean.
This ought to give us a fighting chance.
In an attempt to counter the attacks we designed missile turrets tasked with repulsing all incoming attacks.
The Last War: Before The Storm
We have devastating news from Earth!
Translation: 我們收到來自地球令人震驚的消息。

Text:
A chain of attacks has reduced to ruins major temples and landmarks in Southeast Asia. Preliminary estimates put the body count in the hundreds. 

Despite the scale of the attacks, the perpetrators are believed to be terrorists of a new kind. So far no one has taken responsibility as tensions are high and the blame game is in full swing. 

There is still a lot of confusion. We will be following the events as they unfold.
Translation:
一連串的攻擊導致東南亞好幾處的寺廟及地標變成廢墟。死亡人數初估已超過上百人。 

儘管襲擊的規模很大，但襲擊者被認為是新的恐怖份子。目前的情勢非常緊張，除了沒人跳出來承認這些攻擊之外，互相怪罪卸責的情況毫無停止。 

現在情況尚不明朗。我們會繼續追蹤他們的後續狀況。

Text: Disturbing news from Earth! Terrorist attacks have disturbed the relative peace Earth currently enjoys.
Translation: 來自地球令人的不安消息！一連串的恐怖攻擊打破了地球長久以來享受的和平。

Text: The Last War: As Tensions Rise
In the wake of the attacks in Asia, many dormant grievances between the nations affected have been reignited - some of which go far back in time.
Translation: 亞洲被襲擊後，許多國家間積怨已久的不滿再次爆發出來 – 這些不滿有些甚至可以追朔到很久以前。

Text:
The UN has set out a tension meter as it warns that this situation has the potential to escalate into an all-out war if measures aren’t taken.
 
The goal of the meter is to try and give an objective representation of where things are now and to help us understand what works and what doesn’t. Everyone in the UN is asked to step in and do all they can to help calm the spirits.

So far we can see no adequate way to help from here.

<effect>You must find ways to keep the tension from reaching 100%. Upon bringing tensions down to 0% the conflicts on Earth will be successfully resolved. Tensions will rise up from events that happen on Earth and are out of your control.
Translation:
聯合國制定了緊張情勢的評估標準，當情勢有可能惡化演變著全面性戰爭之前，這套標準將能夠發出警示，使我們有機會採取措施應對。
 
這套標準的最終目的是讓我們能夠知道當下的情勢為何、採取每一項措施將可能產生的正面或是負面影響。聯合國組織內的每一位成員都將被要求全力配合這套標準，以讓國際情勢不要升高。

目前為止我們還看不出來這套標準能幫上什麼。

<effect>你必須找到方法以避免緊張情勢上升到 100%。 當緊張情勢降為0%時，也表示地球上的衝突消弭了。發生在地球上的事情不在你的掌控之中，而這些事情將會使緊張情勢提高。

Text: We will be following the situation closely.
Translation: 我們將密切關注後續狀況。

Text: The terrorist bombings are igniting tensions around the world. The UN has set out a tension meter and warns of a global conflict.
Translation: 恐怖炸彈攻擊正使世界各地的緊張情勢提高。聯合國已制定一個情勢評估標準，以在演變成全球衝突前警告。

Text: Our sponsor has informed us that it's now playing a major role in peacekeeping efforts. They are also providing humanitarian aid to vast territories that are affected by the crisis.
Translation: 贊助者告知我們這正是我們該挺身而出維持和平的時候。他們也持續對那些被戰火波及的地區提供人道救援。

Text:
Millions have been displaced and food is of severe shortage. 

We have been given a heads up that resource supply from Earth will soon become unavailable for an unspecified amount of time. Now all eyes on Earth are on <reg_param1> and there are those who will benefit greatly by branding them hypocritical in their commitment and intentions - hampering all progress towards peace.  

<effect>Resupply with resources from Earth will be unavailable after 5 Sols. Take care to order any needed resources soon.
Translation:
數百萬的人們流離失所，食物的供給也嚴重不足。 

我們已被告知與地球間的補給很快就會斷聯，確切的時間尚未知。 地球現在所有的注意力都在<reg_param1>身上，而且有許多能夠從中得到莫大利益的人參與其中 – 這將使和平行動失敗。

<effect>五個太陽日後，從地球來的補給將中斷。 請小心選擇欲補給的資源。

Text: We should brace ourselves for a tough time ahead.
The supply embargo is now in effect.

We must make do with what we can obtain by ourselves for however long a period this turns out to be. 

<effect>Resupply with resources is now unavailable.
Translation:
我們必須在這段時間內想辦法自給自足直到補給恢復。 

<effect>已無法使用資源補給。

Text: Supply resources from Earth have temporarily been stopped.
With millions of refugees, and governments reluctant to take in any at all, a humanitarian crisis on an unprecedented scale has developed.
Translation: 因為政府拒絕接受上百萬的難民，一場前所未見的人道主義危機隨之浮現。

Text:
Dug in our struggle to survive on Mars, we seem to have taken for granted that Earth - a place where there is enough of everything we need so desperately up here - is always there for us should we need it. Now that we have established a somewhat solid presence on Mars, and Earth seems to be in a dark place, it seems we may have the opportunity to return the favor.

<reg_param1> has sent a request that we start accepting refugees. They hope this drastic measure to get people to safety will highlight the absurdity of regional governments not taking in refugees and put pressure on them by their own populace.

<effect>20 Refugees want to join the Colony. Accepting them will decrease the War Tension, but could the colony support this additional population?
Translation:
當我們在火星上為了生存奮鬥時，我們似乎認為從地球取得資源是理所當然的 – 認為他們總是擁有這裡我們所需要的任何資源 – 認為這情況永不會改變。而現在我們已在火星上站穩了腳步，而地球卻反過來陷入水深火熱之中，該是時候回報了。

<reg_param1> 提出希望我們可以接受難民的要求。 他們希望藉由這樣激烈的手段，能夠凸顯地區政府不接受難民的鬼扯謊話。

<effect>20位難民希望加入殖民地。接受他們將能夠降低緊張情勢，但殖民地承受的了這些額外的人口嗎？

Text: The Last War: It Has Begun
It has begun. The moment that seemed unthinkable less than a year ago.
Translation: 就這麼發生了。一年前這一切根本不認為會發生。

Text:
Regional conflicts have dragged the major powers on Earth to declare war on one another. Earth is now officially going through its Third World War. 

So far no nuclear weapons are reported to have been used, and we pray to whatever gods are listening up here on Mars, that none will be used. But somewhere in the now abandoned halls of the UN building in New York, the Doomsday Clock sits in the dark - with its warning having fallen on deaf ears and its hands perilously close to midnight.

<effect>All rockets are unavailable due to chaos on Earth.
Translation:
各地區上的衝突減緩了大國間互相宣戰的速度。 地球上正式開始了第三次世界大戰。 

目前為止仍未收到有任何國家使用核武的報告，我們也祈求任何火星上可能聽得到的眾神們，千萬不要有人使用核武。但那被遺忘在紐約聯合國大樓角落裡的末日警鐘 – 人們已對它的警聲充耳不聞，末日將近。

<effect>因為地球上的混亂所有火箭皆不可用。
戰爭的本質從未改變過。

Text: Major powers declare war on one another - rockets are unavailable.
Translation: 大國間互相宣戰 - 火箭無法使用

Text: The Last War: Supply Line Back
We have received some good news, for a change!
Translation: 我們總算收到些好消息了！

Text:
Among the chaos on Earth, our sponsor hasn't forgotten about us. They tell us that bad PR is the least of their concerns right now and we can once again request supply rockets from them. However, all resources are very scarce on Earth and will remain unavailable for us.

<effect>Rockets from Earth are available once again. Resources are still unavailable.
Translation:
雖然地球上一片混亂，但我們的贊助者並未忘了我們。他們說目前對外的公關不是最重要的事，而我們可以再次申請貨運火箭了。然而因為地球上的資源仍非常缺乏，我們仍無法取得。

<effect>地球上的火箭除了資源外，可以再度申請了。

Text: I have mixed feelings about this.
Supply rockets are available once more, but not for resources.
Translation: 貨運火箭再次可用，但資源仍無法申請。

Text: The Last War: Feeding the Hand That Feeds
It may seem that Earth has been engulfed with slowly spreading madness, but there are those who haven’t lost their minds to the war craze, and are actively working to restore peace.
Translation: 看起來地球似乎正慢慢被瘋狂所吞噬，但仍有少部分頭腦清醒的人致力於恢復和平。

Text:
As major mining operations on Earth are easy targets for today’s weapons, <reg_param1> believes that a supply of Rare Metals from Mars will greatly help their peacekeeping efforts.

<effect>You can now send Rare Metals to Earth to decrease War Tension, instead of receiving Funding. Rockets for the shipments will arrive regularly.
Translation:
由於地球上主要的採礦設施常被作為攻擊對象，<reg_param1>相信從火星提供稀有金屬的補給將可以很大程度的幫助維持和平。

<effect>你可以將"稀有金屬"送回地球，而非收取資金以降低緊張情勢。 貨運火箭將定期抵達。

Text: Audit all our reserves and prepare for sending out supply missions to Earth!
Translation: 檢查完我們準備送回地球的補給計畫後就出發吧！

Text: Trade rockets for Rare Metals will arrive periodically to reduce War Tension.
Translation: 稀有金屬貿易火箭將定期抵達並減少緊張情勢。

Text: Our support for our sponsors has brought attention to us once more and now retaliation is imminent!
Translation: 贊助者給予我們的援助使我們被盯上報復了！

Text:
Several objects that were in unspecified orbits around the Sun and not far from Mars have suddenly changed trajectory and are heading our way. All gathered observations point towards old dormant weapons from the time before the space weapon bans came into power.

<effect>Our colony is being bombarded!
<hint>MDS Lasers can protect the surrounding area from bombardment
Translation:
在太陽周圍有數個離火星不遠的無特定軌道物體，突然間改變方向朝我們前來。所有觀察到的報告都指出，這些應該是早在太空武器禁令前建造的古老武器。

<effect>我們的殖民地被轟炸了！
<hint>MDS雷射能夠保護他的周遭不被轟炸"

Text: The Last War: Embracing the Void

From out here, Earth is indeed a pale blue dot. It seems so peaceful and tranquil, yet the harrowing stories of those who have witnessed the recent events there point to a reality which is anything but.
Translation: 從這裡遙望，地球是顆淡藍色的圓點。 她看起來如此的平靜祥和，但那些親眼目睹了最近所發生的一連串事件的人，卻知道地球並非所想如此。

Text:
Millions of people want to flee Earth for the - what now looks like - relative safety of Mars. It is impossible to help them all, but we might endure the extra strain and save some more souls from the war and bring hope to all those we can’t.

<effect>Even more refugees want to join the Colony. Accepting them will decrease the War Tension, but could the colony support this additional population?
Translation:
地球上數百萬計的人們想逃到 – 火星上 – 至少相對起來安全多了。儘管我們無法拯救全部的人，我們仍要盡量救多少是多少，給予這些身處黑暗中的人們一盞希望之燈。

<effect>更多的難民希望加入殖民地。 接納他們將會降低緊張情勢，但殖民地承受的了這些人口嗎？

Text: Help as many as we can - then help more!
Translation: 盡可能地伸出援手 – 越多越好！

Text: We have been informed that even more refugees are being sent our way.
Translation: 我們收到有更多難民在前往這裡路上的通知。

Text:
One would argue this is an extreme and unpractical plan, not to mention the extra weight risks dooming the entire Mars project altogether. 

However, there are those who believe this is an effort to save as many people as possible from what some predict to be a war that ends humanity on Earth. 

<effect>Even more refugees want to come to Mars.
Translation:
有一方意見認為這個計畫非常危險且欠缺考慮，額外增加的重量很可能使火箭發射失敗。 

然而，另一方意見認為這場地球的戰爭很可能使人類滅絕，我們應該盡可能的救越多的人越好。

<effect>更多的難民希望前來火星。
我們的忍受力正被考驗著

Text: Refugees fleeing from the conflicts on Earth want to join our colony.
Translation: 從地球上逃出的難民希望加入你的殖民地。

Text: Even more refugees come to Mars.
Translation: 更多的難民希望加入火星

Text: The Last War: The Grand Push
There seems to be little time to stop the war from reaching a point of no return, yet time is all we have.
Translation: 距離阻止戰爭一發不可收拾已沒多少時間了，但我們別無選擇。

Text:
After doing their best to avoid the war from happening, and ultimately failing to do so, <reg_param1> are now determined to see it through.

A final desperate push to complete several separate projects is underway. The projects aim at dramatically shifting the projected direction of the war and bringing everybody to the table to discuss ending it once and for all.

As the war has ravaged most of Earth's resource infrastructure, <reg_param1> is asking we contribute resources they are short on and urge haste, certain they do not need to explain why.

<effect>Supply the requested resources to decrease War Tension significantly. Be careful - the conflict on Earth is escalating and we have a limited time frame to resolve it.
Translation:
在他們盡力阻止發生戰爭仍失敗後，<reg_param1> 仍決定要完成計畫。

有好幾項不同的計劃正在做最後的努力。 而這些計畫的目標是大幅度改變戰爭的走向，並讓所有人上談判桌好好結束這一切。

由於戰爭破壞了大部分地球上生產資源的基礎設施，<reg_param1>相信不需要解釋為什麼急著要我們提供急需的資源。

<effect>供應所需的資源以大幅降低緊張情勢。請小心 – 地球上的衝突正在升高，而我們沒多少時間可以阻止它們。

Text: The future of Earth is pretty much in our hands now.
Translation: 現在地球的未來掌握在我們手中了

Text: Tackling the everyday challenges of Mars is a handful on its own, but we mustn't forget that our home world is currently on the brink of annihilation.
Translation: 火星上每天要應付的挑戰多不勝數，但別忘了我們的家園正瀕臨崩壞邊緣。

Text:
The narrow window of time we have to act will soon close and the fate of Earth, with which our own fate is very much intertwined with, will be out of our hands.

We must send the requested supplies to Earth as soon as possible! If we do not act with all haste, there may be no living soul left to receive them very soon.
Translation:
我們能夠採取行動的時間就快沒了，而與地球交織而成的命運將一發不可收拾。

我們必須盡快將地球所需的資源送回！ 若我們趕不上，就算送達也可能沒人活著了。

Text: Tensions are rising at a rate faster than even the most pessimistic predictions.
Translation: 緊張情勢上升的速度比原本預估最糟的狀況還快

Text: The UN has adopted the Doomsday Clock that the Bulletin of Atomic Scientists has used since the end of World War Two - to highlight how close humanity is to self-extinction. It is now set at Two Minutes to Midnight, a level at which it hasn’t been at since the early 21st century.
Translation: 聯合國採用了自從第二次世界大戰後，原子科學家所使用的末日警鐘 – 它能夠提醒距離人類毀滅還有多久。 而它現在設定在距離世界毀滅前的兩分鐘， 而這是21世紀以來從未見過的嚴重程度。

Text: Things are spiraling out of control.
We are officially One Minute to Midnight and most observers are bracing for a prolonged global war which now seems unavoidable.
Translation: 距離末日只差一步，而大部分觀察者正為了無法避免的長期全球戰爭做準備。

Text: At this point hoping that no one resorts to weapons of mass destruction classifies you as an optimist.
Translation: 都到這一步了，仍希望沒人使用大規模殺傷武器的你真是太天真了。

Text: The end of human civilization on Earth has never been closer.
Translation: 地球上的人類文明從未距離毀滅這麼近過。

Text:
We are 80% on track and are still going at full speed on this downhill race towards Armageddon. Right now it seems we might be Earth's only hope. 

We must step up our game and help our sponsor bring things to a conclusion in which the Earth is not scorched by a thousand nuclear detonations.

Make no mistake - although we live our lives on a different world, our fate is very closely tied to that of our mother planet.
Translation:
發生世界末日的預估進度已經80%，而且進度還在加快。 看來我們是地球唯一的希望了。 

我們必須加緊腳步，把握每一分一秒，拿出最好的表現以幫助我們的贊助者脫離末日 – 地球遭受上千顆核武攻擊。

不要誤會 – 雖然我們住在距離地球遙遠之地，但我們的命運仍與家園密不可分。

Text: Could this really be the end?
The Last War: The Day After Tomorrow
Silence… After a brief increase in brightness, everything has fallen silent.
Translation: 寂靜…在一道亮光之後，萬物回歸了寂靜。

Text:
We are scrambling to re-establish communications with Earth, but for the first time no one seems to be listening. Deep down, everyone knows that the unfathomable has happened. 

There is denial, there is depression, yet we all know… for the nature of the luminosity spike can be one thing and one thing only: utter nuclear devastation spread all over the globe.

We will keep on listening, maybe someday someone will talk back.

<effect>Earth was devastated by the war. Export, Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants have been disabled indefinitely.
Translation:
每個人都爭先恐後的嘗試與地球重新建立聯繫，這卻是第一次無人回應。深沉的寂靜，每個人內心都清楚到底怎麼了。

沒人願意承認，也沒人相信這一切，但我們都知道…地球上唯一會出現這直衝天際的光芒會是什麼：蔓延全球的核爆。

我們仍會繼續監聽通訊，也許有一天仍會有人回應。

<effect>地球已被戰火摧毀。出口、補給、研發外包以及招募活動永久停用。
這下我們是真的得靠自己了。

Text: Earth is devastated by the war. Contact with our home planet is lost.
Translation: 地球已被戰火摧毀。失去與家園的聯繫。

Text: The Last War: New World Order
Today we received the call we've been hoping for!
Translation: 今天我們收到了期盼已久的消息！

Text:
There are humans left on Earth and they are reemerging to form a new society.

They inform us that things are very different now and Earth will never be the same again. Things are much more difficult; the environment is harsher and sunlight is scarcer; there is little resource to go around and most technological advancements have been lost to nuclear fire.

But they see this as a means of a new clean beginning and have expressed their desire to cooperate with us, this time as true equals.

<effect>Contact with Earth has been re-established. Rockets are available once again.
Translation:
地球上倖存的人類逐漸集合在一起並組成了新的社會。

他們通知我們地球已全然改變，再也回不去了。整個環境變得非常惡劣，陽光變得非常難見；各種資源變得更加稀少，更別提大部分的科技技術都已被核子武器摧毀殆盡。

但他們認為這正是重新開始的契機，並表達了希望再次與我們平等合作的意願。

<effect>與地球的聯繫已恢復。 火箭已再次可用。

Text: A new chapter for all of humanity begins.
Translation: 人類的歷史開啟了新的篇章。

Text: A new society emerged from the ruins on Earth.
Translation: 地球上從廢墟裡重生了一個全新的社會文明。

Text: Only united can we hope to conquer the void. (constrain War Tension increase to <ChoiceA_Tension>%)
Translation: 我們唯有團結一致才能免於毀滅。 (緊張情勢上限提高至<ChoiceA_Tension>%)

Text: Earth won't change. (<ChoiceB_Applicants> new applicants; War Tension will increase by <ChoiceB_Tension>%)
Translation: 地球不會改變的。 (<ChoiceB_Applicants> 新的應徵者；緊張情勢上升至<ChoiceB_Tension>%)

Text: The Last War: Local Wars in the Third World
Translation: 終戰：第三世界當地的戰爭

Text: The ripples made by the attacks on Earth have toppled governments and paved the way for opportunists to ride a wave of populist fury.
Translation: 地球上因各處襲擊造成了政府的顛覆。而這也讓那些機會主義者趁機煽動民粹的怒火。

Text:
Border skirmishes are slowly spilling into full scale invasions and the major powers are so far failing to instate a cease fire. The relative peace Earth has been enjoying for the past century now seems to have been a fragile facade, beneath which grudges and ambitions have been festering in wait for the right moment. 

The organization responsible has all but vanished after accomplishing more that it could have possibly hoped for. 

We, on the other hand, as a symbol of what humanity can achieve when working together and not by fighting between ourselves, are in an unique position to make a statement which may be of actual merit to the situation.
Translation:
邊境上的衝突正逐漸演變成全面性的侵略，而大國間迄今仍無停火共識。過去一個世紀以來，地球享受了非常久的和平，但這和平脆弱的表面底下，仇恨及野心潛伏已久，靜待著時機到來。

但是，當時負責的組織雖帶著人們期待之姿出現，卻在還未達成預期的目標前，便突然間消失了。

另一方面，我們，是人類拋棄成見攜手共進的象徵，能證明萬眾一心便可成就偉業。

Text: We have received a disturbing medical report. A number of colonists have contracted an unknown disease.

The medical examination shows they all suffer from a form of hypercoagulation. Anti-coagulation medicines have been issued but the symptoms remain. Primary analysis of the patients’ blood samples hasn't found the cause behind the symptoms, but the level of damage to the erythrocytes leads to the workings of a virus-sized or smaller agent. We’re currently running a thorough check on the patients’ background information and behavior to find the source of the infection.

<effect>Several Colonists have gained the Infected trait.
I’ll inform Earth Control to enact decontamination protocols on any cargo we send.
Some Colonists have contracted a mysterious infection. It's spreading rapidly across the colony.
So far the bizarre nature of the infection has defeated all of our attempts to stop it. Yet time is growing short as more and more people are getting sick.

The challenge would be monumental as our researchers lack any epidemiological data on which to step up. The medical records we’ve gathered point out the symptoms, but the chemical structure of the agent is so alien that it cannot be compared to anything known to science. To make things worse, the nano-scale of the agent makes analysis even harder. Only by diverting enough resources to the task we can hope to make any breakthrough. The Wildfire Cure research has become available. Each newly constructed Medical Building will grant a 5% Tech Boost to the Wildfire Cure research (maximum 50%).

Our scientists have devised a complex plan to discover the cure for the Wildfire infection. It would be a monumental effort but we must prioritize the research to be able to find a solution to the growing crisis.
Constructing new Medical buildings which gather data about the infection could speed up the progress towards discovering the Wildfire Cure.
Tremendous news! The cure for the Wildfire disease has been discovered!
Translation: 天大的消息！治療野火的藥劑已經被研發出來了！

Text:
A genetically modified strain of the Martian Wildfire interfaces with the RNA of the virus and effectively stops it from coagulating the blood plasma of the host. The intake of only a small amount of the cure is enough to halt the development of the disease, even though it wouldn't repair the tissue damage suffered so far.

The scientists experimented with multiple growth mediums and discovered that the most effective way to proliferate the medicine is by introducing it in mold cells growing on potatoes. This is great news because we can provide enough biomass for the modified mold to grow and if we do it quickly, we can still stand a chance to end the suffering on Earth.

<effect>The Curetato Crop has become available. Harvesting it will produce Cure for the Wildfire infection, which in turn has to be exported to Earth to end the crisis.

<effect> Colonists with the Infected trait will be cured permanently after their first visit in a Medical Building.
Start the process immediately. Time is of the essence!
The Cure for Wildfire has been discovered! Conveniently spliced in modified mold cells, the cure can be grown on plant biomass. We have to produce it en masse!
The faint distress signal led us to the burial site of a small satellite. It had fallen deep under the red sands and could have been there for an eternity.

It’s strange that we couldn't find any information for the flight in the international records. No black box nor signatures can be seen except for a discolored logo, ‘Scoop XI’. Upon opening the hull we found all of the internal systems corroded away by time, with only a small capsule remaining. The biohazard sign on it only served to stir our curiosity, but a closer examination discovered that it has been breached. We assume that the biological material inside has been destroyed. We have ordered the Rover to store the salvage for further analysis.
A curious find. Let’s hope the future will bring more answers than questions on that matter.
We've just lost one of our scientific facilities in a disturbing set of events. We’re still investigating the cause of the disaster but there are clues which lead to unsettling conclusions.

The security log shows that everything started with a malfunction in the storage unit where the analysis samples were stored. After that the internal systems of the laboratory began to rapidly fail one after another. Suspiciously, the damaged systems were all made of plastic and organic polymers, all corroded away within mere seconds.

Our operatives are puzzled with the cause of the chain reaction but the Chief Engineer has pointed out a fact which eluded our attention until now – the remains of the Scoop XI satellite were held in the storage unit of this facility. We didn't take any chances and ordered an emergency decontamination of the building. Let’s hope that whatever was in there has been destroyed.

<effect>A Laboratory has mysteriously malfunctioned.
Monitor the colony and report any related cases.
We have to face it – we cannot stop the infection. No matter what we do it keeps spreading across the colony like a wildfire. Hence the name we've given it.

All attempts to isolate the sources have failed. We can assume that the virus is traveling all across our life support and maintenance circuits. The only way to stop it is to turn off all systems, but this would be a death sentence for the colonists. We've ran out of options.
Don't despair, we will find a solution!
The infection is spreading at alarming rate through the colony. The scientists have named it Wildfire after its virulence and infection pattern.
The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. It was on board a rocket which returned to Earth and somehow it breached through all decontamination measures.

The infected personnel at the landing site deteriorated within hours of contracting the infection and the medics couldn't help them. This doesn't match our medical records as Wildfire takes much more time to develop here, on Mars. We suspect a form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The rocket landing site has been placed under quarantine and the authorities have been informed. We can only pray that they manage to prevent the infection from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!
One of our rockets has spread the Wildfire infection on Earth. It's spreading rapidly - we have to discover the Cure before the human population on Earth is obliterated!
The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. We suspect this was caused by a recent meteor impact on Mars which lifted debris and showered them on the Blue Planet.

Several small settlements in different regions have been infected. The authorities report that the victims have deteriorated within mere hours, something which doesn't match our medical records. On Mars it takes Sols for the Wildfire to kill its host. We suspect some form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The infected areas have been placed under quarantine and we can only pray that the authorities manage to prevent the disease from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!
Martian meteors have spread the Wildfire infection on Earth! We must discover the Cure before the entire human population on Earth is obliterated!
The Wildfire virus is spreading on Earth at an alarming rate, threatening entire populations all over the globe. The grim prediction is that soon the entire population of the planet will be affected.

Scientists on Earth are desperately trying to discover a solution, but so far in vain. The virulence of the local strain is so high that sampling and transporting infected material is a death sentence. The nanoscopic size of the agent makes containment equally hard - biological filters fail to stop it effectively, threatening the safety of any laboratory which attempts to study it. The only solution is to analyze the original strain - the one we have on Mars - in order to find the cure. Time is running short!

Meanwhile, Third World countries are in a state of panic as the Wildfire strikes the poorest communities. Waves of refugees flee the affected regions and many resource operations are simply abandoned by the scared personnel. The market feels the hunger for raw resources and multiple demands have been filed for imports from Mars.

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Endemic state. Export prices have increased for the next <text_param1> Sols as the First World economies feel the hunger for resources.
Grave news... We have to hurry!
The Wildfire infection is spreading uncontrollably on Earth. The Third World countries are hit harder due to their lack of resources to fight the disease effectively.
Wildfire has hit the Third World hard. Panic and desperation has spread across the population as waves of refugees flee the endemic zones.

The crisis can be felt across the developing countries and the First World as well. The chaos in the poorest countries resonates across the globe as the raw materials markets are plummeting. Entire resource operations in the Third World countries are abandoned as the workers flee the areas hit by the virus. People in the rich countries vocally support actions to relieve the struggling regions of the Earth and many companies divert resources for charity. Probably there’s still hope for humanity when so many of us refuse to ignore the tragedy of complete strangers.

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Epidemic state. Applicant pool is depleted for the next <text_param1> Sols due to quarantine measures.
The Wildfire has infected the developed countries as well. Panic and desperation are spreading through the population!
A wave of despair sweeps across the globe as people witness the futility of all measures against Wildfire. Everyone feels that our time on Earth is running short.

The tragedy in the Third World has struck some of the richer countries as well, as the Wildfire infection has spread across their populations. People stay inside, fearing for their lives. Refugee camps are filling to the brim as entire areas of the world have been depopulated. Despair has brought the worse in some of us and looters raid the stores in the cities while the police and the army are trying to quell the violent riots. The economies of the First World are failing due to the growing crisis and our Sponsor wasn't spared as well. I'm afraid we’re running out of time...

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Pandemic state. Next level - Extinction! All resupply costs are increased for the next <text_param1> Sols due to supply shortages.
The Wildfire has nearly destroyed the human civilization. Scattered pockets of survivors are still dwindling in remote areas of the world.
Translation: 野火幾乎摧毀了整個人類文明。在世界上偏遠地區所僅存的倖存者仍持續減少中。

Text: Earth's population has been obliterated by the Wildfire infection. No traces of any human activity can be detected. We could be the only humans left out there...
Translation: 地球上的人口已被野火消滅殆盡。已偵測不到任何人類活動的訊號。我們是唯一逃離那裡的人。

Text: Our sensors detect no signs of human activity on the surface of Earth. We must admit that the battle with the Wildfire infection is lost. Night falls over humankind.
Translation: 我們的探測器並未在地球上偵測到任何人類活動的訊號。我們必須承認與野火的戰鬥以失敗告終。黑暗降臨。

Text:
Earth has become an uninhabited mausoleum of our past greatness - the barren, lifeless husks of the once overcrowded megalopolises, the abandoned derelicts of our once great industrial might, the meadows where no children would ever play. The shroud of silence has covered the surface of the Earth and only the wind chimes through the ruins of our past, whispering stories no one is there to listen.

Is this the end? Is the Wildfire infection over, dead in its rampant destruction alongside its human hosts? Or would it mutate further, consuming all life on Earth? Only the children of our children will be able to answer these questions, watching from afar.

<effect>Earth population is devastated by the Wildfire infection! Export, Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants have been disabled indefinitely.
A dark day, but do not lose hope - while we stand, humanity is alive!
Translation: 黑暗的一天，但我們仍保有希望 – 只要我們堅持下去，人類仍有希望！

Text: We've received a radio transmission! From Earth! We thought we were the last humans and now this! Amazing news!
Translation: 我們收到了無線電訊息！從地球來的！我想我們是僅存的人類了！太棒了！

Text:
The survivors of the Wildfire gathered in remote places of the planet and inside protected facilities and began to re-emerge into the world when the signs of the infection began to vanish. They are unsure what happened with the disease, and so are we, but they claim that it appears gone. Earth is welcoming to humans once more!

The survivors have just began restarting abandoned factory complexes and power plants to fuel the industry needed to rebuild the civilization from the ruins. People move into the cities and repopulate the farming areas. The economy is starting to build up momentum – and they want us to become part of the exchange once more!

The survivors have their spirits high, but still the fear of the Wildfire lies in all of them – what if it comes back? This is the reason why they’ve requested us to send them as much of the Wildfire Cure as we can.

<effect>Communications with Earth have been re-established. Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants are available once more. Export prices are reduced for the next <text_param1> Sols while the economy is recovering.

<effect>Cargo Rockets will be sent from Earth to be loaded with Wildfire Cure. When they reach Earth you will be granted <funding(reg_param2)> Funding.
Translation:
野火疾病的倖存者們皆聚集在地球上偏遠的地區或是受保護的設施內，當感染的跡象消失後，他們湧入原本的世界。包括我們沒人知道疾病是如何消失的，但他們聲稱疾病已經。地球再度適宜人居了！

倖存者們重啟了被廢棄的工廠中心以及發電廠，以供給重建文明所需的燃料。人們紛紛搬回城市裡並重新耕種食物。經濟開始復甦 – 他們希望與我們恢復交易夥伴！

雖然倖存者們無一不興高采烈普天同慶這個時刻，但他們仍擔心野火是不是潛伏在他們體內 – 萬一又復發了呢？所以他們仍要求我們盡可能的將手上擁有的野火治療劑送回。

<effect>與地球的通訊已恢復。補給、研究外包以及應徵者再次可用。出口價格因經濟剛復甦將於接下來的<text_param1> 太陽日降低。

<effect>貨運火箭將從地球發射前來載運野火治療劑。當治療劑運抵地球後擬將獲得<funding(reg_param2)>資金。
