Text: A cargo rocket is on its way to gather the Wildfire cure. People on Earth depend on our efforts to create a steady supply chain for the cure.

The amount of Wildfire Cure we have to return to Earth depends on the severity of the situation there. If the situation demands it, we should expect potential future requests for the cure.

<effect>Load Cargo Rockets with the Cure and Fuel and send them back to Earth until the Wildfire infection is completely eradicated.
The authorities on Earth have sent a Cargo Rocket to gather Wildfire Cure and return it to the struggling population on our homeworld.
Translation: 地球當局已派遣貨運火箭前來取得野火治療劑，以送回我們的家鄉治療那些受苦的人們。

Text: Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to relief Earth from the Infection.
Translation: 補充燃料並裝載野火治療劑以將地球從感染中復原。

Text: Authorities all over the Earth report that no cases of the Wildfire infection have been detected. Earth is freed from the yoke of the worst pandemic in history.
Translation: 全球當局的報告都顯示已沒有再偵測到野火感染的跡象。地球已從歷史上最嚴重的流行疾病中痊癒了。

Text: People all around the world celebrate, but the consequences of the Wildfire crisis remain. We have decades – maybe even centuries before us – to cope with the damages caused, with the fear and desperation which reverberate inside all of us. But we remain optimistic that, given time, people will return to their everyday lives. The Wildfire crisis has shown us how fragile we are, how the ivory towers we’ve built could crumble in mere days. Maybe it’s the perfect moment to step back and reconsider the way we lived our lives. To rebuild our civilization, but build it better than before. The Wildfire Cure remains our hot lead towards the way the disease worked. By studying it we will be able to delve in the mystery of its structure and origin, preparing for worse days ahead. The infection on Earth has been eradicated! All Infection Level effects have been removed. Cargo Rockets will be sent from Earth to load Wildfire Cure. Upon return, each rocket will grant you Funding. Gained a new Technology, .
The Wildfire infection has been eradicated on Earth! People all over the globe rejoice and praise your adequate actions!
Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to sell to Earth and gain Funding.

Our brave colonists waited for their brethren on Earth to be cured before they have received relief from the burden of the disease. The colonists would surely be happy to hear that the threat is eliminated – it will raise their spirits high!
Today marks the moment when our colony is free from the threat of the Wildfire infection!

Our efficient medical program has managed to cure all cases of the Wildfire infection. Mars has become a much safer place. We informed Earth and after a careful selection and medical checks they are ready to launch an emergency flight with healthy survivors aboard.

These are ordinary people who survived the Wildfire crisis somehow and managed to get to safety. None of them has passed the initial training required for arriving on Mars so we expect them to have a hard time acclimating to the life in the colony. But at least they would be safe from harm with us.

<effect>A rocket with <text_param1> Refugees aboard is inbound to Mars.
We’ll make sure these poor souls get the best reception.
Now that Mars has become a safe haven from the Wildfire infection the authorities on Earth have sent a rocket with non-infected refugees to be sheltered in your colony.
Refugees on board are fleeing the infected Earth.
Beyond Earth: Vision of the Future
“No, aliens did not build the pyramids – human beings built the pyramids because we are clever and hard workers.

And in this day and age, when we value the strength of a civilization not by its ability to wage war - but by its ability to prevent it, our hard work and cleverness have only one place left to take us – up.

Up towards the stars - above our superficial segregations and competing with ourselves. Up towards a united humanity spread out on many worlds… possibly even stars.  

I am more than certain that the last several thousand years of our history are but the bumpy road towards a version of humanity where there is no hunger, no war, no needless suffering and where the future holds nothing but opportunity and wonder.  And I also believe we are quite close to the end of this turbulent road. I make it my mission to help take us through this last stretch and today I announce my plan in investing the vast majority of my considerable fortune to this endeavor. “

Rede Goddenberry, one of the wealthiest and most powerful people on Earth, addresses the UN General Assembly
Rede Goddenberry gives out a speech at the UN.
Beyond Earth: A Deluded Old Billionaire
Greetings from Earth! I’ve wanted an audience with the founders of the first human settlement away from our dear blue planet for ages now.

You see, in you I find kindred souls, souls who do not view my speech at the UN as the ramblings of a deluded old billionaire. I’m certain my vision resonates with all of you up there; after all - you are a part of it.

My Beyond Earth initiative is pushing several separate projects simultaneously - all aimed at bringing prosperity and peace to a human race spread across the Solar System.

One of the projects in question is currently in a ditch - the planning of a Moon base to mine Hydrogen 3, called Aldrin Base. I’m certain I don’t need to tell you what an abundance of the material would mean energy-wise. I’d kindly implore you, if your situation permits it of course, to contribute some research capacity and quite frankly know-how to the Beyond Earth initiative.

<effect>Beyond Earth Initiative tech unlocked. Research the tech to help the Aldrin Base project.
Rede Goddenberry contacts the Mars colony with direct request for research contribution towards his Beyond Earth initiative.
The Beyond Earth initiative needs your help! And not with know-how this time around.

Currently we are falling behind schedule at our Rubicon Station front - a deep-space shipyard tasked with expanding our space-faring capabilities - and would kindly request you to contribute Metals towards bringing the construction back on track.

We ran the numbers and have come to the conclusion that using Mars for firing raw materials towards our separate projects could prove far more effective than doing this from Earth and will speed up the whole process of bringing the project to fruition. 

A rocket to pick up the resources has been sent towards Mars. Every now and then more such rockets will arrive. If you have the materials to spare, please do!

<effect>A rocket requesting supplies for the Rubicon Station megaproject is headed towards Mars.
See what resources we can spare.
Rede Goddenberry requests the export of materials for the construction a farm hub on Ganymede.

Translation: Aldrin Base (加乘：<MoonResearchReward> 科學家應徵者)

Text: Port Vesta (bonus: Reduced cost of Robotics Techs by <AsteriodReserachReward>%)
Translation: Port Vesta (加乘：減少機器人科技數的花費<AsteriodReserachReward>%)
Spring City (加乘：<GanymedeResearchReward> 植物學家 與 <GanymedeResearchReward> 地質學家應徵者)

Text: Our contributions towards the Beyond Earth project have been received and we have Rede Goddenberry’s everlasting thanks – on behalf of humanity’s future.

We are given a choice to contribute research to a project of our liking next, partially advancing progress on any of the following:

Aldrin Base - a settlement on the Moon to mine the Lunar soil for Hydrogen 3.

Port Vesta - a mining hub situated in the Asteroid Belt.

Rubicon Station - a shipyard in deep space.

And finally, Spring City - a farming hub on water-rich Ganymede.
Rockets to supply resources to Beyond Earth projects begin arriving. Each will partially advance a specific project.
The Beyond Earth initiative needs more materials for the completion of its various projects.

We are being asked to pick a project we are willing to contribute resources to next. Each time we choose and send supplies towards a project it will advance a certain amount towards completion. The Beyond Earth projects are:

Aldrin Base - a Hydrogen 3 mining facility on the Moon tasked with powering up all of humanity’s activity in the entire Solar System.

Port Vesta - a mining operation in the Asteroid Belt guaranteeing humanity never wages war over resources again.

Rubicon Station - a shipyard situated in deep space tasked with considerably expanding humanity's space fleet construction capabilities.

Ganymede One - a farming settlement on Ganymede with the potential to feed humanity spread across an entire star system with capacity to spare.
This rocket is tasked with brining construction materials for the Hydrogen 3 mining base being built on the Moon - Aldrin Base.
This rocket is headed out for the Asteroid Belt to bring resources for the Port Vesta mining facility.
This rocket is tasked with bringing construction materials for the completion of the Rubicon Station - a deep space shipyard.
This rocket is headed out for Jupiter's largest moon - Ganymede - where a project to create the breadbasket of humanity is under way.
Aldrin Base has been completed! The Hydrogen 3 mining facility is fully functional and has begun exporting energy to Earth.

Earth celebrates a full independence of fossil fuel based energy sources and has a now virtually endless power supply coming from the Moon available for everyone. 

The technologies needed to transit power to far off posts like our colony is still a ways off, but we are given schematics to improve on our Fusion Reactors, based on the perfected design used at the Aldrin Base.

We have helped bring humanity closer to Rede Goddenberry’s utopic vision.

<effect>+<reg_param1>% Fusion Reactors Power production.
The Moon Hydrogen 3 mining base - Aldrin Base - has been completed and Earth now enjoys limitless clean energy.
An extraordinary feat has been completed – an unparalleled  milestone in humanity’s history!

Port Vesta has begun operations.

At the heart of the Asteroid Belt, the mining base is predicted to end poverty on Earth and bring an abundance of materials for all needs far and wide across the Solar System. 

The first shipments are already Earthbound, and while free and endless materials may await us in the future, for now we have been given the know-how to upgrade all of our extractors and make them more productive.

The megaproject envisioned by Rede Goddenberry has been completed.

<effect>+<reg_param1>% Extractor production.
Humanity is conquering the Solar System.
Port Vesta, a mining base situated in the Asteroid Belt has been completed, virtually ensuring an abundance of resources for all of humanity.
What was until recently pure science fiction has now become a reality. Rubicon Station has been built and is already receiving its first permanent residents.

A shipyard built in deep space, the Station is expected to grow humanity’s space faring capacity a thousandfold.

The unique location of the base is also perfect for fringe research purposes, boosting humanity’s understanding of the universe.

This project may have never been completed without our help and guidance.

Rede Goddenberry’s vision has become more real than ever.

<effect>Reduced cost of Physics and Engineering Techs by <reg_param1>%.
Translation:
A shipyard built in deep space, the Station is expected to grow humanity’s space faring capacity a thousandfold.

The unique location of the base is also perfect for fringe research purposes, boosting humanity’s understanding of the universe.

This project may have never been completed without our help and guidance.

Rede Goddenberry’s vision has become more real than ever.

<effect>降低物理學與工程學科技的花費 <reg_param1>%.

Text: The Solar System just became a smaller place.
Rubicon Station has been built. Space vessel construction will never be the same.
From the idealistic vision of one eccentric old billionaire, to a farm world meant to feed all of humanity’s current and possible future needs – Spring City has now begun food production.

Many heated regions on Earth where hunger and strife are rampant will now be saved.

Our role in the realization of this project is far from overlooked and we have been sent new crops which are a extremely tough, healthy and nutritious to use on our own farms.

The Beyond Earth initiative brings humanity closer to a place where hunger and poverty will become nothing more than the woes of yesterday.

<effect>New Ganymede Rice hydroponic crop available.
Translation:
Many heated regions on Earth where hunger and strife are rampant will now be saved.

Our role in the realization of this project is far from overlooked and we have been sent new crops which are a extremely tough, healthy and nutritious to use on our own farms.

The Beyond Earth initiative brings humanity closer to a place where hunger and poverty will become nothing more than the woes of yesterday.

<effect>水培農場新作物 蓋尼米德水稻 可以使用了

Text: Can't wait to see what this does for the salad quality down here!
Spring City - the breadbasket project of humanity - has been completed.
Beyond Earth: The Dream Lives On

A time of change is befalling the human race – a time of unity and hope for a brighter future that most couldn’t have imagined just a short few years ago. A massive push - by thousands of people and the best that two worlds had to offer - has become a reality. Our role will never be forgotten and the everlasting gratitude of a space fearing humanity will always be a factor. And spearheading the whole affair - the vision of an eccentric old billionaire who did not live to see how this vision uplifted the entire human race to conquer the Solar System with no reasons for strife and competition. May he rest in peace and forever be remembered a visionary of Mankind. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: A time of change is befalling the human race – a time of unity and hope for a brighter future that most couldn’t have imagined just a short few years ago. A massive push - by thousands of people and the best that two worlds had to offer - has become a reality. Our role will never be forgotten and the everlasting gratitude of a space fearing humanity will always be a factor. And spearheading the whole affair - the vision of an eccentric old billionaire who did not live to see how this vision uplifted the entire human race to conquer the Solar System with no reasons for strife and competition. May he rest in peace and forever be remembered a visionary of Mankind. 獲得新科技 .

Text: Rede Goddenberry will never be forgotten.
Although Rede Goddenberry did not live to see his vision become a reality, his legacy will forever live on for all of humanity to prosper from.
Beyond Earth: In Time to Witness
The Beyond Earth initiative has been deemed a success. Already the efforts of this massive endeavor are bearing fruit.

A time of change is befalling the human race - a time of unity and hope for a brighter future that most couldn’t have imagined just a short few years ago. A massive push - by thousands of people and the best that two worlds had to offer - has become a reality. Our role will never be forgotten and the everlasting gratitude of a space fearing humanity will always be a factor. And spearheading the whole affair, the vision of an eccentric old billionaire who wished to see the bright future of his kind before his passing. History will remember Rede Goddenbarry a visionary of Mankind. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: A time of change is befalling the human race - a time of unity and hope for a brighter future that most couldn’t have imagined just a short few years ago. A massive push - by thousands of people and the best that two worlds had to offer - has become a reality. Our role will never be forgotten and the everlasting gratitude of a space fearing humanity will always be a factor. And spearheading the whole affair, the vision of an eccentric old billionaire who wished to see the bright future of his kind before his passing. History will remember Rede Goddenbarry a visionary of Mankind. 獲得新科技 .

Text: A new era for humanity has dawned!
Rede Goddenberry's dream becomes reality with him still alive to witness it unfolding.
We have received grave news from Earth. It seems Rede Goddenberry has fallen ill and doesn’t have much time left.

The billionaire has sent a special request out to us:

“It seems I can no longer hide the fact that I am and have been dying in these recent months. Although this may explain my push for haste in the completion of the Beyond Earth initiative to some, the reality is that it's badly needed with or without my condition in mind.

People are suffering and dying on Earth - in war, from deceases, from malnutrition. All of this is not necessary and my vision will remedy all of it, once complete.

So I convey this message to you, whom I have come to see as my closest partners in this endeavor: Please redouble your efforts, for it would please a dying old man greatly to see the plan bearing fruit before his death. But if not to warm my old heart, do it because you believe in what the initiative represents as I know you do.“
I am at loss for words.
Rede Goddenberry reveals he is ill and dying.
Beyond Earth: Rede Goddenberry has passed away
Today we received news of Rede Goddenberry’s passing. We are all deeply saddened by this loss.

But we are still inspired by his vision - a vision where humanity travels free amidst the worlds of a unified Solar System. 

Although Goddenberry’s death will dissuade many of his current partners to see the completion of the Beyond Earth initiative, we just may bring the plan to full or at least partial realization before other parties quit their involvement.
Beyond Earth: The Dream is Dead
Following Rede Goddenberry’s death, all of his former partners from Beyond Earth have since abandoned the initiative.

We have failed to persuade them without the uniting effect of his utopic vision spearheaded by himself alone. 

The different gains in space exploration and asteroid mining will not simply disappear but are being bought off and pushed towards partial completion by various Earth-based corporations that will exploit them for personal profit and show no signs of desire to contribute to what was Rede Goddenberry’s vision of a united humanity.

In the end, history will remember him as an old eccentric billionaire who tried to swim upstream for humanity’s sake but ended up solidifying the rule of massive corporations that are more interested in profits than in an idealistic future.
Rede Goddenberry's plan falls apart as previous partners leave the initiative after his passing.
There was a terrible accident at the Port Vesta project site.

A strong solar flare erupted without a sufficient head warning. There are 23 confirmed casualties.

The solar flare erupted during a short window of vulnerability, when Port Vesta had no operational means of shielding against such an event. If it had happened just a bit later, the defenses would've been operational.

Sadly the damage is massive in scale. The project suffered a major setback.
A tragedy indeed, but we will overcome this setback.
News of sabotage at the Aldrin Base mining facility on the Moon has just been made public. Luckily, there are no fatalities.

The project has suffered a major setback. Below is Mr Goddenberry’s statement:

“What the Beyond Earth initiative is striving to ultimately achieve is change - change that will make inter-human rivalry a thing of the past. 

As with all change, there will be resistance. There are those who prosper from wars, from suffering. And they see a united humanity as a threat, for they will be left behind.

To them I have to say: the world is moving on. Try as you might, you have only slowed down an irreversible process.”
A setback. We will overcome it!
The Biotech field deals with Food production, life support and medicine.
Translation: 生物科技主要發展 食物 生產、維生系統 和 醫療系統相關的研究
吸入式 水氣蒐集模組

Text: Moisture Vaporator Upgrade (Hygroscopic Coating) - Water production increased by %. With its mechanical simplicity and applicability to any point on Mars's surface, the Water-Vapor Adsorption Reactor technology can extract water directly from the Martian atmosphere.
Translation: 水氣蒐集站 升級 (吸入式 水氣蒐集模組) - 水資源產量提升 %. 將原本被動的水氣蒐集片升級更換成主動的蒐集大氣的吸氣裝置，也提高整體的產量

Text: New Building: Farm () - Produces Food. Large in-Dome building which is more work-efficient and requires no Power. "They say once you grow crops somewhere you’ve officially colonized it." Andy Weir – The Martian
Translation: 新建築: 農場 () - 生產食物。蒼穹頂中的大建築，更有工作效率，且不需要電力。 "俗話說，種植作物就代表正式殖民。" Andy Weir – 火星人

Text: New Building: Fungal Farm () - An out-Dome building that produces Food. "All fungi are edible. Some fungi are only edible once." Terry Pratchett
Translation: 新建築: 真菌農場 () - 蒼穹頂外的生產食物建築。 "所有的菌類都可以吃。有些菌類只能吃一次。 Terry Pratchett

Text: MOXIE Upgrade (Magnetic Filtering) - Oxygen production increased by %. Magnetic filters block ferromagnetic metal contaminants as well as weakly magnetic particles from the Martian atmosphere when inhaled by our MOXIEs, greatly increasing their efficiencies.
Translation: 火星氧蒐集裝置升級 (磁性過濾) - 氧氣生成增加 %. 當我們的火星氧蒐集裝置吸入火星大氣時，磁性過濾會阻擋大氣中的磁性金屬汙染和弱磁粒子，大大的增加裝置效率。

Text: New Spire Building: Water Reclamation System () - drastically reduces the Water consumption of the Dome. Water on Mars is abundant, yet it is mostly underground and in a frozen state – making it, while within reach, still difficult and expensive to mine. This makes recycling necessary to ensure a steady water supply.
Translation: 新尖端建築：水資源回收塔 () - 有效的減少蒼穹頂中的水資源消耗 "人類含水量高達百分之六十， 而且人類每天都會生產各種液體， 如果可以把人類集中管理，應該就不用擔心水資源了..." 第六智慧

Text: Unlock new crops in Farms and Hydroponic Farms that provide Oxygen and improve soil quality. From the salad you eat to the air you breathe, plants have a fundamental role to play for humanity well beyond Earth.
Translation: 解鎖農場 跟 水陪農場的 新作物，可以提供不錯的氧氣生成 以及 土壤營養品質 從你吃的沙拉到呼吸的空氣，植物永遠都扮演的關鍵的地位，就算來到了火星也是.

Text: Martianborn Colonists graduate faster in Universities and Sanatoriums and have higher chance to gain Perks from Schools. Certain restrictions that still persist on Earth derived from religion and general conservatism are absent here on Mars. As a result, we have the freedom to genetically enhance our newborns and hone their already-sharp minds to a sharp point.
Translation: 火星之子 將可以更快的從 教育系統 與 尖端療養院中 完成課程。 且更容易在教育中學習得優點 火星上沒有地球上多餘的文化、宗教與誘惑，沒有了這些負擔，自然擁有更多機會學習到更多專業知識與技能.

Text: Farms increase the Comfort of all residences in the Dome. Seeing something green against the endless reddish barrens of Mars can be quite therapeutic.
Translation: 農場 現在將不只提供食物，還同時可以提升蒼穹頂中住宅的舒適度 有天我們的植物學家阿儒不知道哪根筋不對，把花椰菜當成帽子戴在頭上跑去全國電子火星店打遊戲之後，頓時帶起了頭帶花椰菜的流行風潮

Text: Residences in Basic Domes have improved Comfort. “One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.” William Shakespeare
Translation: 基本蒼穹頂 中的住宅可以獲得更好的舒適度 "嘿，我們把菜園搬上去如何？花椰菜那區” 望著穹頂的植物學家阿儒

Text: New Spire Building: Medical Center () - has larger capacity and is more effective than the Infirmary. “The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.” William Osler
Translation: 新尖端建築：尖端醫療中心 () - 擁有更多的容量，且服務效率會比診所要來的好 “飢飽無度則傷脾，思慮過度則傷心，色欲過度則傷腎，起居過常則傷肝，喜怒悲愁過度則傷肺” 華佗

Text: Unlock new crops in Farms and Hydroponic Farms that provide better Food yields. The overall reputation of GMO grown foods has increased dramatically when the only other alternative for food is red dirt.
Translation: 解鎖 農場 與 水培農場 中的 新作物 ，可以提供更好的收成數量 在長期使用紅土種植作物後，我們發現作物的基因正在改變，植物學家研究後發展了更多有趣的作物

Text: Water consumption of Domes reduced by %. "No water, no life. No blue, no green." Sylvia Earle
Translation: 蒼穹頂 的耗水量 將減少%. "沒有水，就沒有生命、海洋與綠地" Sylvia Earle

Text: Farm, Hydroponic Farm & Fungal Farm Upgrade: Automation - Decreases number of workers. Now that we have adapted crops to the Martian environment we can mechanize some procedures.
Translation: 農場、水培農場 與 真菌農場 升級：自動化 - 減少所需的員工數 透過全國電子火星店的工程師阿德幫忙後，我們開發出可以協助農場自動化的裝置。

Text: New Spire Building: Hanging Gardens () - a beautiful park complex that greatly improves the Comfort of all Residences in the Dome. One of humanity’s most enduring and fanciful legends from the ancient past is made a reality on Mars.
Translation: 新尖端建築：空中花園活動中心 () - 一座非常夢幻漂亮的空中公園，可以有效的改善蒼穹頂中居民的舒適度 火星上最具意義的建設，不論是婚喪喜慶 、雜貨店老王光榮退休或者是酒吧春嬌的第27胎慶生，都可以在讓大家聚在這裡同樂

Text: Medical Center Upgrade (Holographic Scanner) - Increases birth rate in the Dome. Holographic technologies can significantly improve medical diagnostics and monitoring procedures.
Translation: 尖端醫療中心 升級 (四維超音波掃描) - 增加蒼穹頂居民的生育率 現在尖端醫療中心將提供全新超音波掃描服務，讓每位想懷孕的女孩們在還未懷孕之前就可以掃描出胎兒的影像

Text: New Building: Moisture Vaporator () - Produces Water from the atmosphere. Doesn't produce during Dust Storms. "What I really need is a drone that understands the binary language of moisture vaporators." Unknown Martian Colonist
Translation: 新建築：水氣蒐集站 () - 可以從大氣中蒐集到水資源。 無法在沙塵暴期間運作 "我需要一台可以跟這玩意兒溝通的無人機！." 不具名的火星殖民者

Text: Infirmary & Medical Center Upgrade (Rejuvenation Treatment) - Improves Service Comfort and provides Relaxation, allowing Colonists to visit and gain Comfort. You haven’t truly colonized a planet until you build the first Spa center on it.
Translation: 診所 與 尖端醫療中心 升級 (妙手回春) - 提升整體的服務品質，並且提供參訪者更好的 放鬆與舒適空間 在您還沒蓋一座舒服的SPA之前，都不算是真的殖民了這個星球！

Text: Retirement age and death from old age happen later in the Colonists' lifespan. "Live long and prosper" Vulcan Salute
Translation: 因年老而造成的 退休年齡 跟 死亡 的狀況將會延緩，增加殖民者的生命週期 "恭喜您已福如東海，壽比南山、長命百歲" 醫療床旁的仿生人
親愛的，我把地球搬過來了

Text: New Wonder: Geoscape Dome () - A slice of Earth on Mars, this Dome has high Comfort and increases the Sanity of its inhabitants on every Sol. "It's a fixer-upper of a planet but we could make it work." Elon Musk
Translation: 新世界奇觀：天頂蒼穹 () - 非常巨大的蒼穹頂，簡直看起來就是顆小地球。 可以提供居民非常好的舒適度 而且逐日恢復理智 "耶，環保評估終於通過了！." 弱G科技第87任執行長

Text: The Engineering field deals with Buildings, Domes and improves Rocket technology.
Translation: 工程學主要發展 設施建築 、蒼穹頂 和 加強火箭的研究

Text: Rocket Cargo Space increased by kg. The fuel section is by far the largest and, when full, the heaviest part of any rocket. This makes developing more compressed fuels especially important when striving to bring more to Mars with fewer rockets.
Translation: 貨運火箭 的酬載量將增加 kg. 火箭的油料重量一直以來都佔了整艘火箭的絕大部分。如果我們可以將燃料效率提高並加以濃縮，那將可以提高整體火箭的酬載量

Text: Allows the clearing of salvaged and destroyed buildings. We have reached the point where we must do away with old buildings on Mars to make way for new ones.
Translation: 可以完整的清除掉 已拆除 以及 被摧毀的建築 還給您完整可再利用的建地面積 有時候把東西炸掉不是出自於必要，而是想要

Text: New Building: Polymer Factory ( - Produces Polymers from Water and Fuel. New Building: Fuel Refinery () - Produces Fuel from Water. Resolving the obvious problems with water pressure in Low-G environments will allow for more complex hydro-synthetic procedures to be done on-site on Mars.
Translation: 新建築：聚合物工廠 ( - 可以使用水與燃料，生產出聚合物 新建築：燃料精煉廠 () - 可以從水資源中，提煉出可用的燃料 在火星上每天都覺得濕濕黏黏的，這時科學家才發現原來我們可以利用火星大氣提煉出可用的資源與材料

Text: Rockets and Shuttles require less Fuel. The scarcity of Martian-made rocket fuel options has made for our first true contribution towards rocket engine efficiency.
Translation: 火箭 及 客貨機 將減少燃料的需求 我們利用火星上的材料改進了引擎的結構，目前看起來更適合火星土產燃料，燃燒效率也更高了
弱G科技：萬丈高樓平地起

Text: New Building: Apartments () - A Residential Building that houses many Colonists. "I suggest that going to Mars means permanence on the planet - a mission by which we are building up a confidence level to become a two-planet species." Buzz Aldrin
Translation: 新建築：公寓 () - 可以容納較多居民的住宅 要在這麼小的空間裡，擠下這麼多的人口的問題對於來自於擁擠地價又貴的城市工程師而言，似乎不是什麼難題

Text: Passenger Rockets carry more Colonists. Better design patterns and lighter, tougher materials have all contributed to a more advanced and compact rocket passenger module.
Translation: 客運火箭 可以額外乘載 乘客 更經濟、更有效、更濃縮、更折疊的客艙模組推出了

Text: Water, Oxygen and Power storage capacity expanded by %. Life support reserves are essential for the survival of the Colony. Fortunately, a new method of compressing fluids in low-gravity environments can help us increase our reserve capacity greatly.
Translation: 水資源、氧氣 以及 電力 儲存 容量 將增加 %. 維生系統中的各項資源都是是否能生存下來的關鍵。科學家們發現了可以利用低重力的環境改造材料結構與設計，藉此發展出可以儲存更多資源的材料

Text: New Dome: Medium () - A medium-sized Dome. Gaining experience in actually building constructions on Mars rather than just hypothesizing has vastly advanced our off-Earth architectural capabilities.
Translation: 新蒼穹頂： 中型蒼穹頂 () - 中型尺寸的蒼穹頂 "雖然目前連設計圖都沒有，但有了基本蒼穹頂的建造經驗，我相信這個尺寸的蒼穹頂對我們而言也絕對不會是個問題的" 弱G科技第87任執行長

Text: In-Dome buildings require maintenance less often. Shifting focus away from "fixing it" to "avoiding it" is the natural step forward for any Martian habitat.
Translation: 蒼穹頂內的建築 將不太需要維護了 該是把重點放在如何"避免它"，而不是持續的"維護它"了。耐久性建築將是火星建築學上的一個里程碑

Text: New Buildings: Smart Homes () & Smart Complex () - Provides a very comfortable living space for Colonists. Residents will recover Sanity when resting. Perfecting the Martian household - for a better life beyond Earth.
Translation: 新建築：智慧住宅 () & 智慧豪宅 () - 提供居民很舒適的居住空間，居民可以從休息中恢復失去的理智 完美的火星住宅，肯定是地球之外最舒適的地方了

Text: New Building: Electronics Factory () - Produces Electronics from Rare Metals. "In the end, I hope there's a little note somewhere that says I designed a good computer." Steve Wozniak
Translation: 新建築：電子零件工廠 () - 利用稀有金屬來生產 電子零件 "In the end, I hope there's a little note somewhere that says I designed a good computer." Steve Wozniak

Text: New Spire Building: Arcology () - provides comfortable living space for many colonists. Martian settlements are becoming less just mere shelters and more of fully fledged cities –cities with unique vibes and even architecture.
Translation: 新尖端建築：雅卡蘿之城 () - 提供非常舒適的居住空間，可以容納很多殖民者 Martian settlements are becoming less just mere shelters and more of fully fledged cities –cities with unique vibes and even architecture.

Text: Building construction costs in Metals & Concrete reduced by % (excluding Domes). A mix of off-world pride, a unique and ambitious style, and inspired creativity has resulted in more efficient structural design.
Translation: 建築材料使用為 金屬 & 混凝土 的話，可以減少花費 % (除了蒼穹頂之外) A mix of off-world pride, a unique and ambitious style, and inspired creativity has resulted in more efficient structural design.

Text: Out-Dome buildings require maintenance less often. There is a difference between knowing that conditions on Mars will take a heavy toll on man-made buildings and actually experiencing and fixing the damage done. The latter paints a better picture for improvement.
Translation: 蒼穹頂 外的建築 將不再那麼常需要維護 There is a difference between knowing that conditions on Mars will take a heavy toll on man-made buildings and actually experiencing and fixing the damage done. The latter paints a better picture for improvement.

Text: Passenger Rockets carry more Colonists. Cutting edge methods in space optimization and Comfort-centric designs make for a more practical Passenger Module.
Translation: 客運火箭 可以額外乘載 的乘客 "儀錶板拆掉，不用椅子了， 下面挖個洞，上面還有空間，外殼拆掉，用帆布罩一罩就好了，都拆掉！" 地球火星任務指揮中心

Text: New Dome: Mega () - The most advanced and spacious Dome design. We have reached a proficiency in engineering that surpasses the most ambitious architectural achievements on Earth.
Translation: 新蒼穹頂：巨型蒼穹頂 () - 先進的巨大蒼穹頂，可以提供相當多的設計空間 We have reached a proficiency in engineering that surpasses the most ambitious architectural achievements on Earth.

Text: Rare Metals Extractor production increased by %. Introducing state of the art plasma torches to our Rare Metals Extractors show a great promise for boosts in production.
Translation: 稀有金屬挖掘站 產能將增加 %. Introducing state of the art plasma torches to our Rare Metals Extractors show a great promise for boosts in production.

Text: Drones can extract concrete from Waste Rock stored in Dumping Sites. The utilization of lots of waste rock by reprocessing it into becoming concrete-grade regolith as part of our "Nothing Is Wasted" efficiency policy.
Translation: 無人機 將可從棄置區中的 廢棄碎石 萃取出混凝土 The utilization of lots of waste rock by reprocessing it into becoming concrete-grade regolith as part of our "Nothing Is Wasted" efficiency policy.

Text: Wonder: Space Elevator () - Exports Rare Metals to Earth and offers resupply materials and prefabs at preferential prices. "The space elevator will be built about 50 years after everyone stops laughing." Arthur C. Clarke
Translation: 世界奇觀： 太空電梯 () - 一種更快進入軌道的方式，電梯可用更快的速度將貨物送入軌道、出口稀有金屬到地球 並且可以用更優惠的價格購買 各式補給與預製零件 "The space elevator will be built about 50 years after everyone stops laughing." Arthur C. Clarke

Text: The Robotics field deals with Drones, Rovers and Shuttles, as well as building automation.
Translation: 機器人科技 專研在各式 無人機、車輛及客貨機的發展，也包含了部分設施的自動化研究

Text: The RC Transport harvests resources faster and its maximum storage is increased by . The remote location of some resource deposits calls for Transport Rover optimizations.
Translation: 運輸車 採集資源的速度將會更快，並且單次載運量也增加 個單位 The remote location of some resource deposits calls for Transport Rover optimizations.

Text: Drones and Rovers move % faster. An engine design optimized for low-gravity environments.
Translation: 無人機 與車輛 的移動將會加快 % 完全針對低重力環境下，最佳化的四驅引擎設計

Text: Drone Hubs are constructed with additional Drones and the maximum number of Drones is increased by . Drones being the backbone for most of the heavy and dangerous labor on Mars, it is essential our Hubs have greater operating capacity in order to employ more Drones at any given time.
Translation: 無人機中心 自帶無人機數量將增加 ，並最大可遙控的無人機數量增加 . Drones being the backbone for most of the heavy and dangerous labor on Mars, it is essential our Hubs have greater operating capacity in order to employ more Drones at any given time.

Text: Generate per Sol for each RC Explorer vehicle. Multiple vehicles result in collaboration losses. AI specifically tailored for our Explorers will think for itself, gathering only the data they have deemed could be of interest. The above will greatly contribute to our research initiatives.
Translation: 探索者號 可以額外增加研究點數 當有多輛探索者號時，這個加成效果將會遞減。 特別為我們探索者打造人工智慧模組。現在他們將會開始自我思考，只收集它們感興趣的資料。這對我們的研究會大有助益。

Text: New Building: Drone Hub () - Controls Drones and allocates them to different jobs. We can now rely upon ourselves to build the complex Hubs that control our de facto heavy labor force.
Translation: 新建築： 無人機中心 () - 控制並分配不同工作給無人機。 我們終於可以自行生產這台複雜的控制站了.

Text: Drone battery capacity increased by %. Advances in power accumulator technology allow Drones to function longer before needing to recharge.
Translation: 無人機 電力容量增加 %. 進階的電力儲存科技，可以讓您的無人機更加持久，更帶勁兒！

Text: The RC Rover no longer needs recharging, starts with additional Drones and command limit increased by . Developing a specialized AI with greater autonomy and advanced multitasking capabilities will allow our rovers to control more drones simultaneously.
Translation: 漫遊者號 將不再需要電力了，且出廠自帶無人機數量也額外增加 台，可遙控單位數量上限擴充 台。 Developing a specialized AI with greater autonomy and advanced multitasking capabilities will allow our rovers to control more drones simultaneously.

Text: New Building: Drone Assembler () - Constructs Drone Prefabs from Electronics which can then be used in Drone Hubs to construct new drones. We may now print and assemble entire Drones on Mars with Martian-mined materials.
Translation: 新建築： 無人機裝配廠 () - 使用電子零件 製造無人機預製零件，預製零件可在無人機中心 裝配新的無人機。 看起來我們可以在火星組裝出首台 可以印上火星製造的無人機了

Text: New Building: Machine Parts Factory () - Produces Machine Parts from Metals. Mastering the peculiarities of Martian ores has allowed us to make 3D Metal Printers, which will serve as the foundation for all future Martian industry.
Translation: 新建築： 機械零件廠 () - 使用金屬生產 機械零件 在充分掌握火星礦石的特性後， 我們研發出可以切割金屬的3D列印機， 我相信這肯定火星殖民史上的首次工業革命！

Text: New Building: Shuttle Hub () - Houses and refuels Shuttles that facilitate long-range transportation of resources between Depots and resettling of Colonists between Domes. Adapting an air-breathing jet engine to work in the 95% carbon dioxide atmosphere of Mars is a challenge.
Translation: 新建築： 客貨機服務站 () - 提供客貨機停靠與加油的服務站 客貨機可用來 長途運輸 載運資源或者是 兩地之間的乘客 要讓噴射系統在高達95%二氧化碳大氣濃度的火星上飛起來，絕對是一大挑戰.

Text: Extractor Upgrade (Fueled Extractor) - Production increased by % as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. "We should not just consume hydrocarbon fuel but use it to develop nuclear energy, hydro power and renewable energy sources." Vladimir Putin
Translation: 挖掘站升級（ 燃料動力挖掘站 ）- 當建築物使用燃料當成動力的時候，產能將增加 % "We should not just consume hydrocarbon fuel but use it to develop nuclear energy, hydro power and renewable energy sources." Vladimir Putin

Text: Factory Upgrade (Factory AI) - performance increased by %. After extensive trials and the allocation of many resources to the program, a work-safe AI has been developed to optimize various Factory operations.
Translation: 工廠升級（工廠管理 AI）- 效率提升 %. 經過大量試驗而且投入了相當大的資源後，我們開發了一種可以安全工作的人工智慧系統，可以用來優化工廠內的運營

Text: Shuttle speed increased by %. Designing shuttles for flight in a low density/low pressure atmosphere is more efficient when designing them in a low density/low pressure atmosphere.
Translation: 客運機 飛行速度將增加 %. Designing shuttles for flight in a low density/low pressure atmosphere is more efficient when designing them in a low density/low pressure atmosphere.

Text: Can construct RC Rover (), RC Transport () and RC Explorer (). Machine-part printing devices have reached a fidelity high enough to print the intricate parts necessary to assemble state of the art Rovers.
Translation: 可以建造 漫遊者號 ()、運輸車 () 以及 探索者號 (). Machine-part printing devices have reached a fidelity high enough to print the intricate parts necessary to assemble state of the art Rovers.

Text: The maximum number of Shuttles that the Shuttle Hub can house is increased by . Reaching heights unheard of in parking space sciences.
Translation: 客貨機服務站 可停放的客貨機上限增加 台。 Reaching heights unheard of in parking space sciences.

Text: Shuttle cargo capacity increased by . Advanced shuttle drives deliver more thrust and allow for greater cargo capacity.
Translation: 客貨機 酬載能力增加 。 Advanced shuttle drives deliver more thrust and allow for greater cargo capacity.

Text: New Spire Building: Network Node () - increases the research output of all Research Labs and Science Institutes in the Dome. Rapid transfer of information and an easier access to it could speed up research several times-fold.
Translation: 新的尖端建築： 高速網路通訊中心 () - 增加蒼窮頂內 研究中心 與 科學機構的科研輸出。 Rapid transfer of information and an easier access to it could speed up research several times-fold.

Text: Wonder: Mohole Mine () - Extracts Metals, Rare Metals and Waste Rock without the need of a deposit, while heating the surrounding area. Moholes are shafts that dig exceptionally deep in the Martian crust, releasing heat as part of a potential terraforming effort and, as a bonus, mining ore.
Translation: 世界奇觀：莫霍礦井 () - 就算附近沒有資源點，仍然可以挖掘 稀有金屬、金屬 以及 廢棄碎石， 同時加熱附近的區域 Moholes are shafts that dig exceptionally deep in the Martian crust, releasing heat as part of a potential terraforming effort and, as a bonus, mining ore.

Text: Wonder: The Excavator () - Produces Concrete directly from the Martian soil without requiring a deposit. Martian concrete, made from equal parts regolith and sulfur, has some vast improvements over its Earth counterpart. Red concrete is stronger, more durable and can be recycled and reused simply by reheating it.
Translation: 世界奇觀： 霸王鑽 () - 就算附近沒有混凝土資源，也可以從火星地底中挖掘到 混凝土 Martian concrete, made from equal parts regolith and sulfur, has some vast improvements over its Earth counterpart. Red concrete is stronger, more durable and can be recycled and reused simply by reheating it.

Text: The Physics field deals with Power production, exploration and disaster safety.
Translation: 物理學 主要針對電力 產能, 探索 與 預防天然災害 的相關研究

Text: Extractor Upgrade (Amplify) - Increases production by % but also increases Power consumption by . "From the first day to this, sheer greed was the driving spirit of civilization." Friedrich Engels
Translation: 挖掘站升級 (超頻套件) - 增加產能 % ，不過同時也增加電力消耗 . "From the first day to this, sheer greed was the driving spirit of civilization." Friedrich Engels

Text: Sensor Towers no longer require Power or maintenance. Reliable sensor data is instrumental for the exploration of Mars.
Translation: 掃描塔 將不再需要電力與維護 Reliable sensor data is instrumental for the exploration of Mars.

Text: New Building: Subsurface Heater () - Increases the local temperature in cold areas and protects nearby buildings from Cold Waves. Consumes Water. Mars has an average surface temperature of −55 degrees Celsius, with inclinations to fall well beneath −130.
Translation: 新建築：地質加熱器 () - 增加地表的基礎溫度，可以保護附近的建築物不受 寒流的影響。 需要消耗水資源 Mars has an average surface temperature of −55 degrees Celsius, with inclinations to fall well beneath −130.
弱G科技： 渦輪機材料升級技術

Text: Wind Turbine Upgrade (Polymer Blades): Power production increased by %. Hands-on observations and problem solving in the low gravity environment of Mars have helped our engineers come up with solutions for increased Wind Turbine efficiency.
Translation: 風力發電機 升級 (聚合物葉片): 發電效率增加 %. 我們發現可以利用火星上特殊環境，改造我們葉片的材質，藉此提升風力發電機整體的效率

Text: Probes are cheaper and can deep scan. "The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you." Neil deGrasse Tyson
Translation: 衛星探測器 現在更便宜而且可以執行深層掃描 "The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you." Neil deGrasse Tyson

Text: New Building: Stirling Generator () - Generates Power. While closed the Generator is protected from dust, but produces less Power. The Stirling Radioisotope Generator is a generator based on a Stirling engine powered by a large radioisotope heater unit.
Translation: 新建築：斯特林發電機 () - 產生電力。關閉圓頂罩的時候可以避免入塵的損害，不過發電效率將會下降許多 The Stirling Radioisotope Generator is a generator based on a Stirling engine powered by a large radioisotope heater unit.

Text: New Building: Atomic Accumulator () - Stores electrical Power. Has huge capacity but charges slowly. "History will remember the twentieth century for two technological developments: atomic energy and space flight." Neil Armstrong
Translation: 新建築： 原子蓄電站 () - 可以儲存更多的電力，但充電速度較慢 "History will remember the twentieth century for two technological developments: atomic energy and space flight." Neil Armstrong

Text: Solar Panels are gradually cleaned from dust when closed, resulting in less frequent maintenance. Solar Panels are inherently vulnerable to dust, more so than any other equipment used on Mars. Thus automatic dust repulsion systems are put in place to spread out maintenance periods.
Translation: 太陽能板 將自動清除鏡面上的砂塵，這意味著可以大幅減少維護的頻率 Solar Panels are inherently vulnerable to dust, more so than any other equipment used on Mars. Thus automatic dust repulsion systems are put in place to spread out maintenance periods.

Text: Factory Upgrade (Amplify) - Increases production by % but also increases Power consumption by . Scaling power production to meet the needs of manufacturing is a challenge on Mars.
Translation: 工廠升級 (超頻套件) - 增加產能 % ，同時也會增加電力消耗 . Scaling power production to meet the needs of manufacturing is a challenge on Mars.

Text: Sectors can now be scanned again for deep deposits. Exploiting these deposits requires additional technologies. We've barely scratched the surface of what we can learn about the Martian environment.
Translation: 地圖區塊現在將可以再進行一次深層掃描，將可以發現深層的資源點。 要開採這些資源同時也需要對應的科技升級 We've barely scratched the surface of what we can learn about the Martian environment.

Text: Can exploit deep Water deposits. Water reserves the size of Lake Superior are predicted to be present deep beneath the surface of Mars.
Translation: 可以挖掘 深層水資源點. Water reserves the size of Lake Superior are predicted to be present deep beneath the surface of Mars.

Text: Can exploit deep Metal and Rare Metal deposits. Digging deep can be dangerous but it is necessary for sustained metal production.
Translation: 可以挖掘 深層金屬 以及 深層稀有金屬 資源點 Digging deep can be dangerous but it is necessary for sustained metal production.

Text: New Building: Fusion Reactor () - Generates Power. Out-Dome building which requires Workers to operate. "I would like nuclear fusion to become a practical power source. It would provide an inexhaustible supply of energy, without pollution or global warming." Stephen Hawking
Translation: 新建築：核融合反應爐 () - 產生電力。必須在建設再蒼穹頂外，並且由人員進行操作 "I would like nuclear fusion to become a practical power source. It would provide an inexhaustible supply of energy, without pollution or global warming." Stephen Hawking

Text: New Building: MDS Laser () - Destroys falling meteors in its range. The low density of the Martian atmosphere makes meteors especially dangerous; this is why installing a reliable defense system against meteors is critical for our Colony’s long term survival.
Translation: 新建築：MDS 雷射砲台 () - 將會催髓範圍內墜落的隕石 The low density of the Martian atmosphere makes meteors especially dangerous; this is why installing a reliable defense system against meteors is critical for our Colony’s long term survival.

Text: New Building: Triboelectric Scrubber () - Emits pulses which reduce the Dust accumulated on buildings in its range. While the triboelectric effect is not very predictable or precise, it can be entrusted with removing dust from our structures.
Translation: 新建築： 抗靜電除塵裝置 () - 藉著脈衝能量清理 範圍內被沙塵覆蓋的建築 While the triboelectric effect is not very predictable or precise, it can be entrusted with removing dust from our structures.

Text: Research Labs, Science Institutes and the Network Node Upgrade (Amplify) - Increases production by % but also increases Power consumption. The speed of the calculations and research efficiency grows with the amount of power invested.
Translation: 研究實驗室、科學機構 以及 高速網路通訊中心 將可升級 (超頻套件) - 增加產能 % ，不過同時也會增加電力消耗 The speed of the calculations and research efficiency grows with the amount of power invested.
核融合自動化管理系統

Text: Fusion Reactor Upgrade(Auto-regulator) - reduces the amount of workers. "Our present nuclear fusion reactors are classified by the methods used to support the nuclear fusion reaction, which takes place at a temperature much hotter than the surface of the Sun." Wilson Greatbatch
Translation: 核融合反應爐升級 (自我管理系統) - 減少所需要的員工 "Our present nuclear fusion reactors are classified by the methods used to support the nuclear fusion reaction, which takes place at a temperature much hotter than the surface of the Sun." Wilson Greatbatch

Text: Wonder: Artificial Sun () - Produces colossal amounts of Power. It provides light for nearby Solar Panels during the dark hours and heats the surrounding area. Consumes vast amounts of Water on startup. Unlocking the secrets of the stars is now within the grasp of humanity.
Translation: 世界奇觀：人造太陽 () - 可以產生巨大的能量，可以提供光源使附近的太陽能板在夜晚也能運作。 同時也會加熱附近的區域。 再啟動的時候將會消耗大量的水資源 Unlocking the secrets of the stars is now within the grasp of humanity.

Text: Wonder: Omega Telescope () - Gives access to new Breakthrough Technologies and boosts overall research. A milestone in human history has been achieved – feeling comfortable enough living on an alien world, so much so that some people are already turning their curiosity towards the endless expanse of space once more.
Translation: 世界奇觀：奧美加望遠鏡 () - 將可發現新的突破性科技 以及 加速科技的成長 A milestone in human history has been achieved – feeling comfortable enough living on an alien world, so much so that some people are already turning their curiosity towards the endless expanse of space once more.

Text: The Social field deals with Colonists, traits, Martian society and Funding.
Translation: 社交領域是著重於殖民者、性格、火星人的社會、以及資金 的發展

Text: More applicants will start to appear on Earth. PR research aimed at exposing the benefits and positive aspects of life as a Colonist on Mars.
Translation: 地球上將會有更多的 應徵者 開始報名您的火星計畫 PR research aimed at exposing the benefits and positive aspects of life as a Colonist on Mars.

Text: Engineers and Geologists have + performance when working in their specialty. "Geologists have a saying - rocks remember." Neil Armstrong
Translation: 工程師 與 地質學家 在他們的專業上工作時，將獲得 + 工作效率成長 "Geologists have a saying - rocks remember." Neil Armstrong

Text: Increases research provided by sponsor by . "Two planets, one human race – sharing knowledge and coexisting within the Solar System." Martian Scientist
Translation: 贊助機構 提供的研究點數 增加 . "Two planets, one human race – sharing knowledge and coexisting within the Solar System." Martian Scientist

Text: Scientists and Botanists have + performance when working in their specialty. "Hell yeah I'm a botanist! Fear my botany powers!" Andy Weir - The Martian
Translation: 科學家 與 植物學家 在他們的專業上工作時，將獲得 + 工作效率成長 "Hell yeah I'm a botanist! Fear my botany powers!" Andy Weir - The Martian

Text: Receive a one-time grant of funding. With the rising media hype about our mission, it is only a matter of social maneuvering to make the first interplanetary crowdfunding campaign a reality.
Translation: 獲得一次性的資金 收入 With the rising media hype about our mission, it is only a matter of social maneuvering to make the first interplanetary crowdfunding campaign a reality.

Text: New Building: Martian University () - Trains Scientists, Geologists, Botanists, Medic, Engineers or Security specialists. College education is always free on Mars.
Translation: 新建築: 火星大學 () - 可以訓練各項專長如 科學家、地質學家、植物學家、醫療人員、工程師以及保安 College education is always free on Mars.

Text: License Martian technology for use back on Earth. Earn funding. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "Economic exchange between Mars and Earth would be mostly in the form of intellectual property" Elon Musk
Translation: 將火星發展的科技專利販售回地球。 賺取 資金。 此為 可重複研發 的科技 "Economic exchange between Mars and Earth would be mostly in the form of intellectual property" Elon Musk

Text: Lowers the risk of colonists developing flaws after Sanity breakdown. "Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul like you." Shannon L. Alder
Translation: 降低殖民者在理智斷線.後，發展出性格缺陷的風險 "Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul like you." Shannon L. Alder

Text: Security Officers and Medics have + performance when working in their specialty. One can never be too prepared for the vast array of emergencies that could arise at any given moment on Mars.
Translation: 保安人員 與 醫療人員 在他們的專業上工作時，將獲得 + 工作效率成長 One can never be too prepared for the vast array of emergencies that could arise at any given moment on Mars.

Text: Colonists without the proper specialization suffer a lower work penalty.
Translation: 減少沒有適當專長的殖民者 工作效率損失

Text: New Building: Science Institute () - Generates Research faster than a Research Lab. With Martianborn science we will truly shift from being an experiment to being an equal to Earth, contributing to the scientific advancement of all of humanity.
Translation: 新建築: 科學機構 () - 研發科技的速度比研究實驗室快 With Martianborn science we will truly shift from being an experiment to being an equal to Earth, contributing to the scientific advancement of all of humanity.

Text: New Spire Building: Sanatorium () - treats colonists to remove flaws. "There are no constraints on the human mind, no walls around the human spirit, no barriers to our progress except those we ourselves erect." Ronald Reagan
Translation: 新尖端建築：尖端療養院 () - 可以治療殖民者，移除缺陷 "There are no constraints on the human mind, no walls around the human spirit, no barriers to our progress except those we ourselves erect." Ronald Reagan

Text: Decorations have increased Service Comfort. Reinforcing the notion of a separate and unique Martian culture makes our Colonists more positive and helps them find comfort in the uncertain world which is life on Mars.
Translation: 一些 裝飾物像是公園、水池類的，將可以增加居民 服務品質 Reinforcing the notion of a separate and unique Martian culture makes our Colonists more positive and helps them find comfort in the uncertain world which is life on Mars.

Text: Martianrborn don't take Sanity damage from disasters. Martianborn grow up in the reality of the everyday dangers of the Red Planet. It bestows upon them an inner strength that is truly a unique Martian quality.
Translation: 火星之子 不會因為天然災害而受到 理智上的影響 Martianborn grow up in the reality of the everyday dangers of the Red Planet. It bestows upon them an inner strength that is truly a unique Martian quality.

Text: Martianborn don't take Sanity damage when working in out-Dome buildings. We are born on the Red Planet. We do not fear stepping outside the safety of the Dome. We embrace it.
Translation: 火星之子 就算在 蒼穹頂外工作，也不會受到理智的影響 We are born on the Red Planet. We do not fear stepping outside the safety of the Dome. We embrace it.

Text: Residential Building Upgrade (Home Collective) - Increases the Service Comfort of the building by . A friendly and supportive community is the key to making life easier in the harsh reality of the Red Planet.
Translation: 住宅升級 (Home Collective) - 增加住宅 服務品質 . A friendly and supportive community is the key to making life easier in the harsh reality of the Red Planet.

Text: License Martian copyrights for use back on Earth. Earn funding. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "The conditions of extreme labor shortage combined with a technological culture will tend to drive Martian ingenuity to produce wave after wave of invention." Robert Zubrin
Translation: 將火星專利 出售回地球，以賺取 資金 這項科技是 可重複性的，可以被重複研究數次 "The conditions of extreme labor shortage combined with a technological culture will tend to drive Martian ingenuity to produce wave after wave of invention." Robert Zubrin

Text: Sanatorium Upgrade (Behavioral Melding) - replaces removed flaws with random Perks. A more benevolent and productive iteration of 18th century methods.
Translation: 尖端療養院升級 (行為矯正服務) - 移除性格缺陷，並且增加一個隨機的優點 A more benevolent and productive iteration of 18th century methods.

Text: Wonder: Project Morpheus () - Stimulates the development of new Perks in adult Colonists throughout the entire Colony. "You take the red pill - you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes."
Translation: 世界奇觀：莫非斯計畫 () - 刺激整個殖民地成人的新優點發展 "You take the red pill - you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes."

Text: Buildings construct themselves slowly without Drones. Nanites will seek out resources from nearby resource depots. With a payload of several molecules and an electronic instrument used for both navigating and knowing its purpose, Construction Nanites form slightly saturated winds which to the casual observer would seem to erect buildings as if by magic.
Translation: 建築物 可以不用無人機服務，就可以緩慢的自我建築。 建築將會自行尋找附近可用的資源使用 With a payload of several molecules and an electronic instrument used for both navigating and knowing its purpose, Construction Nanites form slightly saturated winds which to the casual observer would seem to erect buildings as if by magic.

Text: Buildings require maintenance less often. "Don't confound static electricity with ecstatic eccentricity. One will leave your hair up, the other will live up in the air!" Ana Claudia Antunes
Translation: 建築物將不太需要 維護 "Don't confound static electricity with ecstatic eccentricity. One will leave your hair up, the other will live up in the air!" Ana Claudia Antunes

Text: When a colonist dies there's a % chance he or she is reconstructed as youth with the same traits. Like the legend of the Phoenix, all ends with beginnings. Consciousness being an electrical charge within a specific neuron pattern, replicating it eventually comes down to data fidelity.
Translation: 當殖民者死亡後，將有 % 機率細胞體重構 成一個擁有相同性格的年輕人 Like the legend of the Phoenix, all ends with beginnings. Consciousness being an electrical charge within a specific neuron pattern, replicating it eventually comes down to data fidelity.
好東西 與好朋友分享

Text: Bodies of dead Colonists are converted to Food. "Soylent Green is made out of people. They are making food out of people and we know that. We are actually OK with that."
Translation: 死去的殖民者遺體， 將可以被利用轉換成食物，回饋給其它殖民者 "Soylent Green is made out of people. They are making food out of people and we know that. We are actually OK with that."

Text: Unlocks Rare Trait - Empath. Empaths raise the Morale of all Colonists in the Dome. The effect stacks with other Empaths. "`The human brain has 100 billion neurons, each neuron connected to 10 thousand other neurons. Sitting on your shoulders is the most complicated object in the known universe." Michio Kaku
Translation: 解鎖 稀有性格 - 體貼。 體貼的人可以提高同個蒼穹頂下所有殖民者的士氣。 這個效果可以疊加 "`The human brain has 100 billion neurons, each neuron connected to 10 thousand other neurons. Sitting on your shoulders is the most complicated object in the known universe." Michio Kaku

Text: Colonists need to sleep for only 1 hour and regain extra Sanity when sleeping. "Sleep, those little slices of death — how I loathe them." Edgar Allan Poe
Translation: 殖民者現在只需睡眠 1 小時，而且可以額外恢復理智. "Sleep, those little slices of death — how I loathe them." Edgar Allan Poe

Text: Allows the construction of Biorobots in the Drone Assembler. Biorobots eat and can gain traits but can't reproduce and never die from old age. The human body is basically a complex bio machine that could be easily replicated with the exception of one major component – the brain. Now that we have finally unlocked that secret we can manufacture human-like Biorobots the same way we manufacture cars.
Translation: 將可以在無人機組裝廠中 製造仿生人， 仿生人跟一般人沒兩樣， 但長生不老且無法生育 The human body is basically a complex bio machine that could be easily replicated with the exception of one major component – the brain. Now that we have finally unlocked that secret we can manufacture human-like Biorobots the same way we manufacture cars.

Text:
When a colonist suffers a Sanity breakdown, they fall asleep and wake up after <param1> hours with <param2> Sanity. Colonists can't commit suicide or gain flaws due to sanity breakdown.

<grey>Failsafe systems have been in place and used to prevent catastrophes in various fields for centuries. Until now we had no viable way of remotely detecting when the brain was headed towards a meltdown. A means to remotely render people unconscious, however, was already available.</grey>
Translation:
當有殖民者理智段線的時候，他們將會馬上進入睡眠狀態，接著會在 <param1> 小時後醒來，並且理智會維持在 <param2>。 殖民者將永遠不會在理智段線時選擇自殺

<grey>Failsafe systems have been in place and used to prevent catastrophes in various fields for centuries. Until now we had no viable way of remotely detecting when the brain was headed towards a meltdown. A means to remotely render people unconscious, however, was already available.</grey>

Text: Residents in the Arcology get a bonus to work performance based on the number of unique perks and specializations of colonists living in the Arcology. "The tools that a society uses to create and maintain itself are as central to human life as a hive is to bee life. Though the hive is not part of any individual bee, it is part of the colony, both shaped by and shaping the lives of its inhabitants." Clay Shirky
Translation: 居住於 雅卡蘿之城中的居民， 將可以獲得額外的工作效率加成， 加成效果將依照生活在城內的殖民者獨特優點和專長數量而有不同。 "The tools that a society uses to create and maintain itself are as central to human life as a hive is to bee life. Though the hive is not part of any individual bee, it is part of the colony, both shaped by and shaping the lives of its inhabitants." Clay Shirky

Text: Colonists have a % chance to lose a flaw on their journey to Mars. It is never too late to improve on oneself, and the months spent traversing the void between Mars and Earth gives ample opportunity to do so.
Translation: 殖民者將有 % 的機率，在前往火星的旅途中，移除一項性格缺陷 It is never too late to improve on oneself, and the months spent traversing the void between Mars and Earth gives ample opportunity to do so.

Text: Recharge Stations service Drones in a hex-range instantly. Tesla once predicted that wireless power would be obtainable anywhere on Earth, illuminating and powering vehicles in the most remote of places. Ultimately his prediction came true – he only got the planet wrong.
Translation: 充電站 將可以在範圍 六格狀內，提供無線充電的服務 Tesla once predicted that wireless power would be obtainable anywhere on Earth, illuminating and powering vehicles in the most remote of places. Ultimately his prediction came true – he only got the planet wrong.

Text: Allows Drones Prefabs to be constructed in the Drone Assembler using Metals instead of Electronics. Made entirely out of 2-dimensional nanomaterials, printed electronics combine effective electronic properties with low-cost production.
Translation: 允許 無人機預製零件 的原料中，將電子零件取代成一般金屬 Made entirely out of 2-dimensional nanomaterials, printed electronics combine effective electronic properties with low-cost production.

Text: Uncovers extremely rich underground Metal deposits. Increased detail in reading traces of tectonic activities from eons ago has enabled us to accurately predict where to find high-grade metals deep in the crust, only relatively recently pushed up from the Martian mantle.
Translation: 發現一個蘊藏量非常豐富的地底 金屬 資源點 Increased detail in reading traces of tectonic activities from eons ago has enabled us to accurately predict where to find high-grade metals deep in the crust, only relatively recently pushed up from the Martian mantle.

Text: Uncovers extremely rich underground Water deposits. Primordial underground lakes in the nethermost regions of Mars’s crust have been accurately hypothesized and successfully pinpointed due to advances in our understanding of the Martian geological past.
Translation: 發現一個蘊藏量非常豐富的地底 水資源 資源點 Primordial underground lakes in the nethermost regions of Mars’s crust have been accurately hypothesized and successfully pinpointed due to advances in our understanding of the Martian geological past.

Text: Uncovers extremely rich underground Rare Metal deposits. Applying new principles to chemical analysis of ancient crystallized magma has made it possible to locate several exceptionally potent Rare Metal veins deep underground.
Translation: 發現一個蘊藏量非常豐富的地底 稀有金屬 資源點 Applying new principles to chemical analysis of ancient crystallized magma has made it possible to locate several exceptionally potent Rare Metal veins deep underground.

Text: Instant and free power cable construction. Power cables do not suffer from power faults. A hydrogel of high conductivity and electrical self-healing properties, without any external stimuli and of great strength and flexibility, has been developed based on Nanostructured Conductive Polymers.
Translation: 建造 電線將不用任何花費，也不用再維護了。 再也不用受到斷電之苦了 A hydrogel of high conductivity and electrical self-healing properties, without any external stimuli and of great strength and flexibility, has been developed based on Nanostructured Conductive Polymers.

Text: Instant and free pipe construction. Pipes don't suffer from leaks. A pressure-induced, self-healing coating with remarkable insulation properties has been developed and field-tested to be used en masse on our pipe system.
Translation: 建造 管線將不用任何花費，也不用再維護了。 再也不用為了管線破洞而苦惱了 A pressure-induced, self-healing coating with remarkable insulation properties has been developed and field-tested to be used en masse on our pipe system.

Text: Uncovers new Anomalies – Alien Artifacts – which provide a boost to all research when scanned. Hard as it is to believe, our observations suggest that intelligent life has visited Mars long ago and that remnants of these visits could still be here. These artifacts could help us improve and expand our understanding of the universe.
Translation: 發現新觀測點 - 外星文物 - 掃描後加速所有研究。 Hard as it is to believe, our observations suggest that intelligent life has visited Mars long ago and that remnants of these visits could still be here. These artifacts could help us improve and expand our understanding of the universe.

Text: All colonists gain + performance during night shifts The greater distance from the Sun makes it so that all colonists have to cope with the psychological strain of receiving reduced sunlight. This fact, combined with newly discovered techniques allow us to considerably boost the productivity of those who work outright nightshifts.
Translation: 所有殖民者在 大夜班 工作效率 + The greater distance from the Sun makes it so that all colonists have to cope with the psychological strain of receiving reduced sunlight. This fact, combined with newly discovered techniques allow us to considerably boost the productivity of those who work outright nightshifts.

Text: Doubles the chance that a Colonist will have or gain a rare trait. Advanced and impeccably precise gene splicing instruments will now give us better control on the traits Colonists are born with on Mars.
Translation: 殖民者將有雙倍的機會可以獲得 稀有性格 。 Advanced and impeccably precise gene splicing instruments will now give us better control on the traits Colonists are born with on Mars.

Text: All Colonists consume % less Food. Radically changing eating habits that have been in place for centuries is made quite easier after changing the planet they were evolved on in the first place.
Translation: 所有殖民者的 食物 消耗減少 % 。 Radically changing eating habits that have been in place for centuries is made quite easier after changing the planet they were evolved on in the first place.

Text: Fusion Reactors Upgrade (Eternal Fusion) - Fusion Reactors no longer require workers and operate at performance. Our understanding of the once holy grail of energetics - Fusion Energy has reached the level where once a fusion reaction has been triggered, it can be left to regulate and sustain itself on its own… within a confined and safe medium of course.
Translation: 核融合反應爐升級 (無限核融合) - 核融合反應爐不再需要 員工操作，並自動以 效能運作。 Our understanding of the once holy grail of energetics - Fusion Energy has reached the level where once a fusion reaction has been triggered, it can be left to regulate and sustain itself on its own… within a confined and safe medium of course.
超級火星電腦運算計畫

Text: Converts unused Power into Research Points. The ultra-cold environment that is Mars, combined with several recent breakthroughs in super conductors, has made the concept of superconductor computing, while still quite costly in terms of power, now manageable, thus opening the doors to the extremely fast superconductor computers.
Translation: 將 未使用的電力 轉為研究點數 The ultra-cold environment that is Mars, combined with several recent breakthroughs in super conductors, has made the concept of superconductor computing, while still quite costly in terms of power, now manageable, thus opening the doors to the extremely fast superconductor computers.

Text: All Extractors continue to extract small amounts when their deposit is depleted. Leaving scattered molecules of the precious resource a mining facility was tasked with extracting has always bothered scientists as being just too cynically wasteful. Luckily, with new Nano Refinement precision tools, this wasteful tendency has been remedied.
Translation: 全部的挖掘站將可繼續挖掘已經 枯竭.的資源點 Leaving scattered molecules of the precious resource a mining facility was tasked with extracting has always bothered scientists as being just too cynically wasteful. Luckily, with new Nano Refinement precision tools, this wasteful tendency has been remedied.

Text: Drones carry two resources at once. Nature has long provided inspiration for technological advances. Muscles made from carbon fiber are the latest example of cutting-edge biotech and, mixed with Mars’s low gravity, our Drones have basically doubled their carrying capacity.
Translation: 無人機一次可攜帶 兩個資源 Nature has long provided inspiration for technological advances. Muscles made from carbon fiber are the latest example of cutting-edge biotech and, mixed with Mars’s low gravity, our Drones have basically doubled their carrying capacity.

Text: Colonists in Domes with a Spire have increased Morale. Even on the seemingly most ordinary of days, Colonists on Mars must never forget how extraordinary their lives actually are. Every time they pause from their newfound routines on this alien world and gaze upon the man-made spires that rise proudly towards the Martian sky, they will be reminded of the incredible feat their lives are part of.
Translation: 當蒼穹頂擁有 尖端建築 的時候，將會增加殖民者的士氣。 Even on the seemingly most ordinary of days, Colonists on Mars must never forget how extraordinary their lives actually are. Every time they pause from their newfound routines on this alien world and gaze upon the man-made spires that rise proudly towards the Martian sky, they will be reminded of the incredible feat their lives are part of.

Text: Unlocks giant crops which have an increased Food output. Gene editing the plant strains brought from Earth to Mars so they can better cope with some of the Martian environment’s peculiarities has allowed us to grow super-sized versions of their Earthling cousins.
Translation: 解鎖巨型作物，增加 食物收穫量. Gene editing the plant strains brought from Earth to Mars so they can better cope with some of the Martian environment’s peculiarities has allowed us to grow super-sized versions of their Earthling cousins.

Text: Dome Concrete costs reduced by %. Mixing recently discovered materials made from Martian polymers with the Martian regolith have unlocked the wonder material that is Neo-Concrete. It is vastly stronger, yet lighter than its predecessor.
Translation: 蒼穹頂的 混凝土消耗 將減少 % 。 混和了在火星發現的聚合物質與土壤，我們發現了可以加強混凝土特性，使其更輕更堅固的全新建築材料，我決定稱它為 新聚合混凝土

Text: Drones move % faster. Our engineers have unveiled the first motor design to replace the old engines of our drones that were created in Earth laboratories so long ago. This time we’ve combined all that is now known from having hands-on experience in dissecting a drone that has been doing field work on Mars for quite some time.
Translation: 將可以提升 無人機 移動速度 % 。 Our engineers have unveiled the first motor design to replace the old engines of our drones that were created in Earth laboratories so long ago. This time we’ve combined all that is now known from having hands-on experience in dissecting a drone that has been doing field work on Mars for quite some time.

Text: Water requirements of crops is reduced by %. By mixing lab-made chemicals with the Martian regolith we have created what passes for Martian soil, providing improved subsurface water retention and reducing the need for watering.
Translation: 作物的 水資源 需求將減少 % 。 By mixing lab-made chemicals with the Martian regolith we have created what passes for Martian soil, providing improved subsurface water retention and reducing the need for watering.

Text: Lowers Metals costs for building construction by %. The unique composition of Martian ore has finally been thoroughly understood and new smelting techniques have been developed accordingly.
Translation: 可以降低建築物的 金屬 消耗 % 。 The unique composition of Martian ore has finally been thoroughly understood and new smelting techniques have been developed accordingly.

Text: Moisture Vaporator Upgrade (Vector Pump) - Water production increased by 100%. A new atmosphere pump design that doubles the volume of air processed by our Vaporators in a single Sol.
Translation: 水氣蒐集站升級 (向量幫浦) - 水資源產能 增加100%。 全新設計的大氣幫浦 可以讓我們吸收雙倍的氣流，並加速我們每日的水氣蒐集效率

Text: Fungal Farm Upgrade (Superfungus) - Increases production while increasing Oxygen consumption. Historically, lab mistakes involving fungi have rarely been a cause for celebration. A recent mishap in the lab seems to be an exception, as we have created a new and breed of fungi which hold much promise.
Translation: 真菌農場升級 (超級真菌) - 增加氧氣消耗時增加產量。 Historically, lab mistakes involving fungi have rarely been a cause for celebration. A recent mishap in the lab seems to be an exception, as we have created a new and breed of fungi which hold much promise.

Text: Solar Panels and Large Solar Panels Power production increased by %. An abundance of field experience has culminated in our engineers creating the perfect solar cells made specifically for the Martian atmosphere dust consistency.
Translation: 太陽能板與大型太陽能板 電力生產 增加 % 。 An abundance of field experience has culminated in our engineers creating the perfect solar cells made specifically for the Martian atmosphere dust consistency.

Text: Wind Turbines Power production increased by %. Through clever application of graphene and carbon based frictionless materials, we have managed to maximize the push of the Martian wind while minimizing the friction which slows down the rotor’s rotation cycle, thus delivering far more bang for every buck of wind.
Translation: 風力發電機 電力生產 將增加 % 。 Through clever application of graphene and carbon based frictionless materials, we have managed to maximize the push of the Martian wind while minimizing the friction which slows down the rotor’s rotation cycle, thus delivering far more bang for every buck of wind.

Text: Research Lab & Science Institute Upgrade (Zero-Space Computing) - Research points production increased. Thinking outside the box, Martian mathematicians have begun developing a new mathematical apparatus which will open the doors to new scientific models and theories.
Translation: 研究實驗室 & 科學機構升級 (零度空間計算) - 增加研究點數產量。 Thinking outside the box, Martian mathematicians have begun developing a new mathematical apparatus which will open the doors to new scientific models and theories.

Text: New Dome: Oval Dome () - An elongated Dome which has space for two Spires. A new, domestic approach to construction provides the same structural safety of our Domes while providing additional space for Spires.
Translation: 新蒼穹頂： 橢圓蒼穹頂 () - 一個可以擁有兩座尖端建築的橢圓形蒼穹頂。 A new, domestic approach to construction provides the same structural safety of our Domes while providing additional space for Spires.

Text: Extractor Upgrade (Magnetic Extraction) - Production increased by %. We have progressed upon fringe mining technologies, developing safe ways to bring Magnetic Extraction to our mines on Mars.
Translation: 挖掘站升級 (磁性萃取設備) - 產能增加 %. We have progressed upon fringe mining technologies, developing safe ways to bring Magnetic Extraction to our mines on Mars.

Text: Doubles the performance bonus when Colonists are working on a heavy workload. When every citizen knows that their efficiency more or less impacts the survival chances of the entire Colony, it becomes a matter of pride to work hard.
Translation: 當殖民者處在 重度工作負荷 時獲得兩倍的表現加成。 When every citizen knows that their efficiency more or less impacts the survival chances of the entire Colony, it becomes a matter of pride to work hard.

Text: Seniors can work and have children. The golden years have officially been postponed indefinitely as a recent breakthrough has finally unlocked the fountain of youth. Every man and woman on Mars has now the ability to remain within their most productive and fertile age forever.
Translation: 年長者 的殖民者仍然可以工作，並且孕育下一代 The golden years have officially been postponed indefinitely as a recent breakthrough has finally unlocked the fountain of youth. Every man and woman on Mars has now the ability to remain within their most productive and fertile age forever.

Text: Martianborn gain performance. Growing up in a unique environment, combined with some creative gene therapy, makes people better problem solvers. Martianborn are brought up in a society which thrives on the idea that every extra effort counts and the smarter the effort, the better.
Translation: 火星之子 工作表現增加 Growing up in a unique environment, combined with some creative gene therapy, makes people better problem solvers. Martianborn are brought up in a society which thrives on the idea that every extra effort counts and the smarter the effort, the better.

Text: Passenger Rockets carry more Colonists. Putting our Colonists in a state of suspended animation for the duration of the flight to Mars greatly reduces the space needed for a single Colonist on the rocket. Cryo-tubes will allow us to transport more Colonists on a single rocket.
Translation: 客運火箭 可多運載 位殖民者。 Putting our Colonists in a state of suspended animation for the duration of the flight to Mars greatly reduces the space needed for a single Colonist on the rocket. Cryo-tubes will allow us to transport more Colonists on a single rocket.

Text: New Spire Building: Cloning Vats () - creates Clones over time. Cloned colonists grow and age twice as fast. "Clones can think creatively. You will find that they are immensely superior to drones." Unnamed Martian Scientist
Translation: 新尖端建築： 複製槽 () - 隨時間製造複製人，複製出的殖民者成長與衰老的速度是常人的兩倍。 "Clones can think creatively. You will find that they are immensely superior to drones." Unnamed Martian Scientist

Text: Domes restore Sanity to their inhabitants every Sol. Who knew that emitting a low level vibration could affect the human psyche in such a way?
Translation: 蒼穹頂 下的每個居民，將可以逐日恢復理智 有誰知道如何使用低頻功率去影響人類的心智行？

Text: Domes cost % less basic resources. Mastering of certain techniques, singled out to be crucial to the entire construction process, will result in the drop of Dome construction costs.
Translation: 蒼穹頂 基本資源花費減少 % 。 "我跟在座的各位保證品質絕對不會縮水，不會偷工減料" 弱G科技第87任執行長

Text: All Spires can be ordered as prefabs from Earth. The ever-increasing miniaturization of technology along with different modules has made it possible to transport the structural behemoths known as Spires all the way from Earth.
Translation: 所有的 尖端建築 預製零件 都將可直接向地球 訂購 透過全新的製程壓縮技術，我們將可以把全部尖端建築的預製零件搬上火箭了，火星終於可以有"地球製造"標籤的尖端建築了
挖掘站人工智慧自主系統

Text: Metals Extractors and Rare Metals Extractors can work without crews at performance. Extracting algorithms have been successfully implemented by new our Extractor AI, allowing for a certain degree of autonomy in mining operations.
Translation: 金屬挖掘站 和 稀有金屬挖掘站 將可以不再需要人員操作，並且持續以 效能運作。 我們已經成功把新的挖掘演算邏輯系統開發完成了，現在再也不用一直重複去幹那些重複的工作了

Text: Non-medical Service Buildings Upgrade (Service Bots) - service buildings no longer require workers and operate at performance. Freeing our colonists of dealing with the most mundane of chores.
Translation: 非醫療類服務性建築 升級（自動化服務系統） - 服務性建築物不再需要人員服務，並以效率 運作。 再也不用面對奧客了，耶！

Text: Amplify upgrades grant a bigger boost to production. "Power! Unlimited Power!" Sheev
Translation: 超頻套件 升級讓產線獲得較高的產能。 "力量！我需要更多的力量！" 希夫·白卜庭

Text: Stirling Generator Upgrade (Plutonium Core) - Increased Power production while opened. "Nor are we the culmination of evolution, except in the sense that there has never been another species so bizarrely ingenious that it could create both iambic pentameter and plutonium." David Quammen
Translation: 斯特林發電機升級 （鈽核） - 當完全展開圓頂罩的時候，將會有更好的發電效率。 "我知道，大部分的時候你們還是不願意打開我的" 斯特林發電機上的紙條

Text: Schools can train the Workaholic and Hippie traits. Taking student exchange programs to a whole other level.
Translation: 學校 將可以培訓出工作狂與嬉皮性格的年輕殖民者 "火星之子總是那麼的天真阿...." 星際酒吧的老司機

Text: Colonists gain bonus work performance when all their stats are in the green. "Frankly, though, I think most people can learn a lot more than they think they can." Elon Musk
Translation: 當殖民者的個人需求皆處在綠燈狀態時，將增加額外的工作表現 "Frankly, though, I think most people can learn a lot more than they think they can." Elon Musk

Text: Rocket travel time to and from Earth reduced by %. Plasma engines have numerous advantages over chemical rockets. All that is left to do is make sure they don't explode on launch.
Translation: 火箭往返地球的 飛行時間 減少 % 。 電漿火箭比起傳統化學燃料火箭有著更多的優點。但前提要確定起飛時不會引起爆炸/grey>
無人機中心自主化升級

Text: Drone Hubs no longer require Power or maintenance. Self-sustainable Drone Hubs are of paramount importance in expanding our presence on Mars.
Translation: 無人機中心 不再需要電力與維護。 在升級自主化元件後，我們從終端機上看到無人機中心更加嘮叨了

Text: Factory Upgrade (Automation) - Lowers the amount of Workers needed in factories. Robots are poised to take our jobs here on Mars as well.
Translation: 工廠升級 (自動化) - 降低工廠的勞工數量需求。 終將有天，機器人也可以幫我們吃飯了

Text: A "surface scratcher" step towards understanding the elusive chemical properties of the mystery Cubes, what dangers the Cubes might pose and how to manage them.
Translation: 透過「表面刮劃」程序來了解神秘立方體難以理解的化學特性、它的危險性與可能的管理方法。

Text: The Spontaneous High-Energy Particle Interception and Deflection technology allows our Sensor Towers to detect and guide the materialization of a Black Cube to a safe location.
Aims to find a way to capture and dismantle an alien Dredger by studying its structure and physical properties.
An attempt to decode the transmissions sent out by Dredgers in order to predict their behavior and landing sites.
